title: Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive
summary: The prestigious Padma Shri award has honored remarkable talents this year, including celebrated playback singer Jaspinder Narula, Arijit Singh, and Ricky Kej.
full_content: Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive Reported By : Titas Chowdhury News18.com Edited By: Yatamanyu Narain Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 22:09 IST The prestigious Padma Shri award has honored remarkable talents this year, including celebrated playback singer Jaspinder Narula, Arijit Singh, and Ricky Kej. reset Follow us on Google News In an exclusive chat with News18 Showsha, Jaspinder Narula, known for her hits like Ankhiyon Se Goli Maare and Bumbroo, expressed her elation at receiving Padma Shri. The winners of the coveted Padma Shri were announced a while back. Musicians who have been bestowed this honour include Arijit Singh, Jaspinder Narula and Ricky Kej, along with veteran actor Ashok Saraf and veteran theatre director Barry John. Speaking exclusively to News18 Showsha, Narula, who began her career with Judaai Judaai and Meri Zindagi Ek Pyaas from Sridevi, Anil Kapoor and Urmila Matondkar starrer Judaai (1997), says that she’s elated to have won this award. “Mehnat aur tapasya safal ho jaati hai jab mil jaata hai award," she tells us. Prior to films, she remained involved with singing bhajans and Sufiana compositions and earned acclaim for folk and devotional music. And now with the Padma Shri added to her list of awards and accolades, she feels that she has experienced the divine. “I’ve worked hard for 50 years and now I feel like god has come before me. Everybody wants to get an honour like this. Awards are meant to recognise your work and talent and they make you happy. This really means a lot and to get it from the Government of India is a very big deal," she remarks. related stories But does she believe that she should’ve received the Padma Shri years ago? “Samay ki baat hoti hai. Sabko apni samay pe milta hai. People used to tell me that I should’ve received an honour like this long ago but I never thought of it that way. I used to always tell them that when the right time comes, I too shall receive an award of the stature of Padma Shri," says the Taare Hain Baraati and Pyar To Hona Hi Tha singer. Narula, who has garnered immense appreciation for her distinctly raspy and textured voice, confesses applying for the awards as she adds, “There are so many artists who couldn’t receive it. So many deserving artists passed away before they could get a Padma Shri. I think time and destiny dictate everything. I had enrolled for it because yeh sab aaj kal toh karna hi padhta hai, uske bagair baat nahi hoti. But I was still surprised with the news." For the unversed, before training under Ustad Ghulam Sadiq Khan, she learnt music under the tutelage of her father, Kesar Singh Narula, a music director of the 1950s. Dedicating the award to him, she emotionally says, “If my father was alive, I would’ve dedicated it to him because he was everything to me. I’m really missing my dad and mom today. My dad was behind all this. He would help me with my riyaaz. He taught me what it means to work hard. I would tell him to not leave me because I’ve a lot left to achieve and he needs to see all of it. But unfortunately, four years ago, he left us." Narula’s career as a singer in films began after late music director Kalyanji of Kalyanji-Anandji fame heard her at a private gathering in Delhi and asked his son and music director, Viju Shah, to give her a break. Her discography includes popular songs like Ankhiyon Se Goli Maare (Dulhe Raja), Sabki Baaraten Aayeen (Jaanam Samjha Karo), Bumbroo (Mission Kashmir), Dulhe Ka Sehra (Dhadkan) and Bunty Aur Babli (Bunty Aur Babli), among others. tags : bollywood regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 22:09 IST News movies Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive Read More

title: Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies
summary: The upcoming historical drama Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, has generated excitement with its trailer release but also sparked conversations about historical accuracy.
full_content: Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 21:25 IST The upcoming historical drama Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, has generated excitement with its trailer release but also sparked conversations about historical accuracy. reset Follow us on Google News Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, is under scrutiny as Shivaji Maharaj’s descendant urges filmmakers to consult historians for accuracy. The highly anticipated historical drama Chhaava, based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, is drawing closer to its release. With Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna in lead roles, the film’s trailer was recently unveiled, garnering significant buzz. However, the movie has sparked a discussion about historical accuracy, as Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’s descendant has urged the filmmakers to consult historians to address potential inaccuracies. In an interaction with PTI, Sambhajiraje Chhatrapati, a descendant of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj and former Rajya Sabha MP, praised the film for spotlighting the legacy of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj. He revealed that director Laxman Utekar had shared the trailer with him, and while he appreciated the effort, he expressed his desire to watch the full film before its release. “I also offered to connect them with historians to address inaccuracies to ensure this significant story is presented authentically to audiences worldwide," he stated. related stories Sambhajiraje Chhatrapati also highlighted specific concerns about historical liberties, citing the lezim dance sequence shown in the trailer. While recognizing the cultural significance of lezim, he questioned its portrayal in the context of Sambhaji Maharaj’s dignity and legacy. He emphasized the need for experts to weigh in on the appropriateness of such creative choices. Prior to the trailer’s release, the makers had unveiled individual character posters, building anticipation among audiences. Vicky Kaushal steps into the role of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, Rashmika Mandanna portrays Maharani Yesubai, and Akshaye Khanna takes on the role of Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb. The film also features an ensemble cast including Ashutosh Rana, Divya Dutta, Vineet Kumar Singh, Diana Penty, and Santosh Juvekar. Directed by Laxman Utekar and produced by Dinesh Vijan under Maddock Films, Chhaava boasts a musical score by AR Rahman. With its Valentine’s Day release set for February 14, 2025, the movie has already created significant excitement among audiences eager to witness this grand historical drama on the silver screen. tags : bollywood Vicky Kaushal Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 21:25 IST News movies Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies Read More

title: Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’
summary: Farah Khan, who choreographed Pehla Nasha from Aamir Khan’s film Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar, opened up about choreographing Bollywood’s next gen Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa.
full_content: Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 21:13 IST Farah Khan, who choreographed Pehla Nasha from Aamir Khan’s film Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar, opened up about choreographing Bollywood’s next gen Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa. reset Follow us on Google News Farah Khan opened up about choreographing Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa. Aamir Khan’s son Junaid Khan, and Sridevi-Boney Kapoor’s younger daughter Khushi Kapoor, are all set to make their theatrical debut with their upcoming film ‘Loveyapa’. Choreographer-turned-director Farah Khan recently reflected on her remarkable journey in Bollywood, from choreographing Aamir Khan and Sridevi to now, doing the same for the next generation of actors Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor. Farah, who has been in the industry for decades, revealed the emotional connection she shares with the children of some of the biggest stars she once worked with. Speaking about choreographing Junaid Khan, the son of Aamir Khan, and Khushi Kapoor, daughter of the late Sridevi, Farah said, “It was a surreal experience because literally, I think I was working with Aamir in Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar and after that Junaid was born. We all had gone to his house with Mansoor and everybody to congratulate him. Same with Sridevi also, I was quite close to her, Boney, and the whole Kapoor family. For me, it was very wonderful." related stories Farah then added that it feels weird that she has been in this industry for so long. “I don’t feel it. It’s just that when I shoot with these guys, I realize that, oh my god, I started my career with Aamir and now I’m choreographing his son," she said. About Loveyapa ‘Loveyapa’ is a fresh take on Gen-Z relationships, blending romance with comedy. The plot revolves around a humorous challenge set by the lead characters’ parents, where Gaurav and Baani must exchange their phones for a day to prove their trust before deciding to marry. Apart from Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film also features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. tags : aamir khan bollywood Farah Khan Junaid Khan khushi kapoor Sridevi Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 21:13 IST News movies Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’ Read More

title: Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate
summary: Ram Gopal Varma recently addressed swirling rumors about the casting of his upcoming film Syndicate, which speculated names like Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, and Manoj Bajpayee.
full_content: Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:49 IST Ram Gopal Varma recently addressed swirling rumors about the casting of his upcoming film Syndicate, which speculated names like Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, and Manoj Bajpayee. reset Follow us on Google News Ram Gopal Varma quashes rumors about Amitabh Bachchan and Fahadh Faasil starring in his upcoming film Syndicate. Speculations had been running wild ever since director Ram Gopal Varma announced his upcoming project Syndicate, with reports linking Bollywood megastar Amitabh Bachchan and acclaimed actors Fahadh Faasil and Manoj Bajpayee to key roles. However, RGV has now stepped forward to dismiss these rumors, putting to rest the swirling buzz around the film’s cast. A report from Telugu 360 previously suggested that Syndicate would feature an ensemble cast bridging Bollywood and the South Indian film industry. It claimed that Amitabh Bachchan was slated for an extended cameo, while Tollywood actor Venkatesh Daggubati was in talks for a lead role with a 35-day shoot schedule. Additionally, Fahadh Faasil, Manoj Bajpayee, and Anurag Kashyap were reportedly being approached for pivotal roles. The report also speculated that the film would commence production in mid-February. related stories On Saturday, Ram Gopal Varma took to X (formerly Twitter) to quash these rumors. “There are all kinds of speculations going around the casting of Syndicate, which are all completely FALSE. Will share the details when ready," the filmmaker wrote, clearing the air. There are all kinds of speculations going around the casting of SYNDICATE film which are all completely FALSE ..Will share the details when ready— Ram Gopal Varma (@RGVzoomin) January 25, 2025 The announcement didn’t dampen fans’ excitement, as several took to the comments to express their eagerness and share their dream casting ideas. “Please cast Manoj Bajpayee and Anurag Kashyap," one user wrote, while another simply said, “Waiting, boss!" Ram Gopal Varma has revealed that Syndicate will delve into the rise of a chilling criminal organization that threatens India’s very fabric. Sharing insights about the film’s concept on X, he emphasized that while street gangs were once seen as a significant threat, the real danger today stems from the emergence of powerful syndicates. These groups, he explained, comprise a sinister nexus of political factions, law enforcement, ultra-wealthy business magnates, and even military operatives. The director also highlighted how today’s intense polarization in the country creates fertile ground for such an ominous syndicate to rise. Unlike a supernatural horror film, RGV described Syndicate as a terrifying exploration of human nature’s darkest truths and the cyclical nature of crime and terror. “Crime and terror never die; they keep coming back in deadlier forms," he remarked, shedding light on the chilling themes of the film. In a bold statement, RGV vowed to redeem his cinematic legacy with Syndicate. “I took a VOW to WASH AWAY all my CINEMA SINS that I committed over the PAST FEW YEARS with this JUST one SINGLE film called SYNDICATE," he wrote. Promising an intense and realistic narrative, he assured audiences that Syndicate would be a film that horrifies not with the supernatural, but with its unflinching portrayal of humanity’s potential for darkness. tags : amitabh bachchan bollywood fahadh faasil Ram Gopal Varma regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 20:49 IST News movies Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate Read More

title: Samantha Ruth Prabu Reacts To Female Driver Stereotype, ‘Women Are Great At Multi-Tasking’ | VIDEO
summary: At Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan 2025, actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu explained the importance of road safety, and also addressed the common stereotype about women being bad drivers.
full_content: Samantha Ruth Prabu Reacts To Female Driver Stereotype, ‘Women Are Great At Multi-Tasking’ | VIDEO Curated By : Lubna Khan Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:16 IST At Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan 2025, actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu explained the importance of road safety, and also addressed the common stereotype about women being bad drivers. reset Follow us on Google News Samantha Ruth Prabhu joined Amitabh Bachchan for Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan 2025. Actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu joined megastar Amitabh Bachchan, Union Minister of Road Transport and Highways of India, Nitin Gadkari, actor Vikrant Massey for the third edition of Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan, to champion the cause of road safety. During the event, Samantha Ruth Prabhu talked about the importance of road safety, and also addressed the common notion about women being bad drivers. Speaking at Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan 2025, Samantha Ruth Prabhu was asked what message she would want to give to people about road safety and awareness while travelling. She replied, “I think that it all starts with self-reflection. We are always fearful of abiding by rules, not getting caught. But I think it’s time for a moment of self-reflection as to ‘are you doing the right thing for yourself, your family?’ I think it’s time for us to value life a little more than we do." When asked about the common notion about women being bad drivers, Samantha initially expressed surprise, saying, “Is that a thing, really? I hear it but I really haven’t seen the proof of it." She then countered the stereotype by highlighting that women are great at multi-tasking, which actually makes them better drivers! related stories “Women are great ta multi-tasking so they are probably very good at focusing on the road as well," she said. Check out the video below! View this post on Instagram A post shared by News18.com (@cnnnews18) She was then asked whether she drives, to which she replied, “Not well. So, I choose not to." When asked what irks her the most about road safety, she mentioned that cutting lanes and excessive honking are the most frustrating. “Definitely cutting lanes and honking. I don’t see that in any other country. Not so much as I see it here. I think that road etiquette is something that…just because you can drive, I don’t think you should be on the road. You should also have a certain amount of driver etiquette," she said. tags : regional cinema Sadak Suraksha Abhiyan Samantha Ruth Prabhu Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 19:14 IST News movies Samantha Ruth Prabu Reacts To Female Driver Stereotype, ‘Women Are Great At Multi-Tasking’ | VIDEO Read More

full_content: Did Timothee Chalamet’s Sister Throw Shade At Kylie Jenner In New Post? Published By : Lubna Khan Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:55 IST Timothée Chalamet and Kylie Jenner have been dating for quite some time and have gone public with their romance. reset Follow us on Google News Chalamet's sister Pauline shared a scathing post about billionaires. (Photo Credit: Instagram) It has been quite some time since Hollywood actor Timothée Chalamet has been dating billionaire businesswoman Kylie Jenner. Their romantic outings to public PDAs are avid proof of them being deep in love with each other while also showing support for each other through thick and thin. While Chalamet and Jenner never fail to dish out major couple goals, it seems like the actor’s sister, Pauline Chalamet does not approve of their relationship. The Sex Lives of College Girls star recently shared a message about billionaires on social media, leaving fans speculating whether it was targeted at Kylie Jenner. Senior Democrat leader Bernie Sanders recently shared a cryptic post on the X, voicing his concerns about the political climate in the US, especially after Donald Trump’s return to power. “When the 3 wealthiest men in America sit behind Trump at his inauguration, everyone understands that the billionaire class now controls our government," a part of his tweet read. related stories When I started talking about Oligarchy, many people didn't understand what I meant. Well, that's changed. When the 3 wealthiest men in America sit behind Trump at his inauguration, everyone understands that the billionaire class now controls our government. We must fight… pic.twitter.com/NuC3hnskQi — Bernie Sanders (@BernieSanders) January 20, 2025 Many, including Chalamet’s sister Pauline, took quick notice of the post and reshared the same on her Instagram story with a sharp rant about billionaires. “Our system is so flawed that it allows billionaires to exist and accrue so much money and BARELY pay (and sometimes NOT PAY) ANY ANY ANY TAXES. This should not be possible. Billionaires do not need to exist. Bezos, Musk, and Zuckerberg SITTING IN FRONT OF the cabinet is NOT DEMOCRATIC. NOT. DEMOCRATIC," her post read as quoted by The Sun. The post was shared on Reddit (now deleted) with the caption, “Pauline Chalamet on billionaires; meanwhile, her brother is dating one." Social media users instantly chimed in with divided reactions. While some wondered if her post was directed at his brother’s girlfriend, others argued that she could have her own opinion. A user wrote, “We underestimate people’s cognitive dissonance, because yeah, she’s criticising billionaires, but nothing implies she’s targeting Kylie as well," while another added, “I mean, she’s not responsible for who her brother dates; it’s not like she can break up with Kylie." “If we’re all going to be judged by our relatives’ significant others or their political views, then not a single one of us is safe lol," another comment read. Despite the speculations, the pair were on friendly terms last October, sharing a warm hug at the Coperni afterparty. title: Why Sandra Bullock Has Been Dragged Into Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni Saga
summary: Blake Lively had reportedly insisted on an intimacy coordinator being present during her scenes with Baldoni.
full_content: Why Sandra Bullock Has Been Dragged Into Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni Saga Published By : Lubna Khan Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:34 IST Blake Lively had reportedly insisted on an intimacy coordinator being present during her scenes with Baldoni. reset Follow us on Google News Sandra Bullock has found herself in the middle of their legal dispute. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Sandra Bullock, the beloved Hollywood icon, has found herself in the middle of a heated legal dispute involving Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni . This has reportedly happened because of an unearthed post from months ago, sparking a bizarre twist in an already complicated saga. The drama started brewing just before Christmas when Blake Lively, 37, accused Baldoni, 40, of sexual harassment, kicking off a legal battle that quickly turned messy. To add fuel to the fire, The New York Times released an article based on Lively’s legal filings, which not only detailed her allegations but also claimed Baldoni had orchestrated a smear campaign against her. Not one to back down, Baldoni responded by suing The New York Times for defamation and filing a jaw-dropping $400 million lawsuit against Lively and her husband, Ryan Reynolds. He accused the Hollywood power couple of using their celebrity influence to sabotage his career and hijack his project. related stories So, where does Sandra Bullock fit into all of this? Flashback to July 2023: filming for It Ends With Us had just wrapped and Reynolds took to social media to post a cheeky birthday tribute to his The Proposal co-star. “Happy Birthday to the inimitable and stunning Sandra Bullock! For your birthday this year, I got us both intimacy coordinators. And an HR department. And clothing?" Reynolds had written. The post also included a clip from their infamous naked scene in the film. The actor’s fans now believe the caption held more meaning than what met the eye. At the time, it seemed like a typical Reynolds quip, but in light of Lively’s reported on-set demands, it feels almost prophetic. Check it out here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Ryan Reynolds (@vancityreynolds) Social media lit up with reactions. One fan commented, “The caption makes sense now," while others pointed out Reynolds’ apparent jab at Baldoni through the caption. According to leaked details, Lively had insisted on an intimacy coordinator being present at all times during her scenes with Baldoni. Among her 30 reported demands were strict boundaries like no improvising during kissing scenes, no biting or lip-sucking without explicit consent and ensuring all intimate interactions were “in character," informs Daily Mail. The drama reached new heights when Baldoni’s lawyer, Bryan Freedman, released a video exclusively obtained by DailyMail.com. The footage showed multiple takes of a dance scene between Lively and Baldoni, seemingly contradicting her claims of discomfort during filming. Lively, however, countered that the video only reinforced her unease, insisting it demonstrated the very behaviour she found objectionable. Meanwhile, she and Reynolds filed a legal motion requesting a gag order on Baldoni’s attorneys. In a court filing, the couple accused Freedman of running a “harassing and retaliatory media campaign" against them. With every twist and turn, this legal battle has managed to rope in unexpected players like Sandra Bullock and ignite a media frenzy. As Lively and Reynolds push for a protective order, Baldoni’s team shows no signs of backing down. tags : entertainment Ryan Reynolds Sandra Bullock Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:34 IST News movies Why Sandra Bullock Has Been Dragged Into Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni Saga Read More

title: Kid Cudi Opens Up About Shocking Home Invasion, Slams Trolls For Making Jokes Online
summary: Taking to Instagram Stories, the Ohio-born artist addressed the incident and the hurtful jokes circulating online.
full_content: Kid Cudi Opens Up About Shocking Home Invasion, Slams Trolls For Making Jokes Online Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:24 IST Taking to Instagram Stories, the Ohio-born artist addressed the incident and the hurtful jokes circulating online. reset Follow us on Google News An intruder reportedly broke into Kid Cudi's Los Angeles residence a few days earlier.  (Photo Credits: Instagram) Imagine coming home to find that a stranger has not only invaded your personal space but has made themselves remarkably comfortable, snacking in your kitchen, taking a shower and rummaging through your belongings. For Kid Cudi, this bizarre nightmare became a reality earlier this January when an intruder reportedly broke into his Los Angeles residence. The individual, described by the rapper as a “crazed fan," was eventually apprehended by L.A. County Sheriff’s deputies, but the experience left a mark on Cudi. What made matters worse was seeing people on social media making jokes about the situation. Taking to Instagram Stories and X on January 23, the Ohio-born artist addressed the incident and the hurtful jokes circulating online. He began by calling out the trolls and providing a clearer picture of the unsettling ordeal. related stories “I see the internet running with things and making jokes this s*** is not funny. The person who broke into my house was a crazed fan who had been stalking me for years without me knowing. He’s been to shows, events I’ve done in the States and overseas," he wrote. This wasn’t just an ordinary break-in. As Cudi explained, the man had gone to extreme lengths to get to him, driving across the country in hopes of sharing ideas and pitching collaborations. But what he did after breaking in crossed all boundaries of privacy. “He rummaged through personal things, my fiancee’s stuff, took a shower and ate, all while thinking he was gonna have a conversation with me. This was an unhinged 34-year-old man," Cudi shared. Adding to his frustration was the incorrect assumption by some online that the intruder was homeless. Cudi firmly shut down that speculation while emphasising how this violation of his privacy has made him rethink his safety measures moving forward. “There is nothing funny about this. My privacy was violated, and now I have to protect myself. I don’t feel safe now," he wrote. The Grammy-winning artist also warned that this experience may affect how he interacts with fans in public. “If I’m standoffish when you see me in public now, this is why," he admitted. Check out his post here: Hey, so I wanna clear this up cause I see the internets running w things and making jokes and this shit is not funny.  The person that broke into my house was a crazed fan that has been stalking me for years with out me knowing.  He's been to shows, events I've done in the states…— The Chosen One (@KiDCuDi) January 23, 2025 Thankfully, Cudi was not at home during the break-in. According to TMZ, he was already dealing with another crisis earlier in the month when he had to evacuate his L.A. home due to the ongoing wildfires. Despite the chaos, he reassured fans that he, his loved ones and his dogs were safe. “Hey guys, had to evacuate my crib. I’m safe, with my loved ones, dogs are safe. For all the folk who lost their homes and people who are dealing with this, my heart hurts for you and I’m praying for us all. I send ALL my love to you and yours. If you have to evacuate, get out immediately. Don’t hesitate. Be safe LA. Love you guys," he wrote in an Instagram Story at the time, informs Billboard. For Kid Cudi, the focus now is on reclaiming his sense of safety and finding peace after the series of unsettling events. tags : entertainment hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:24 IST News movies Kid Cudi Opens Up About Shocking Home Invasion, Slams Trolls For Making Jokes Online Read More

title: Junaid Khan Recalls Ira’s Husband Nupur Shikhare ‘Cuddled’ With Him After Drinking Contest: ‘He Was In My Bed’
summary: Aamir Khan’s son Junaid Khan revealed how he made sure Nupur Shikhare was right for Ira Khan. He joked that Nupur cuddled with him all night post a drinking contest.
full_content: Junaid Khan Recalls Ira’s Husband Nupur Shikhare ‘Cuddled’ With Him After Drinking Contest: ‘He Was In My Bed’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:07 IST Aamir Khan’s son Junaid Khan revealed how he made sure Nupur Shikhare was right for Ira Khan. He joked that Nupur cuddled with him all night post a drinking contest. reset Follow us on Google News Junaid Khan reveals how he made sure Nupur Shikhare was right for Ira Khan. Aamir Khan and Reena Datta’s son Junaid Khan is all set to make his big screen debut alongside Khushi Kapoor in their upcoming film ‘Loveyapa’. The actors have been busy promoting the film over the last few days. In a recent interview, Junaid revealed how he approved of his sister Ira Khan’s relationship with Nupur Shikhare. He revealed that he allowed her to date anyone, but had one condition- that the partner must have a drinking contest with him. This was a test so that Ira could see the guy at his most vulnerable, and decide whether she wants to date him. Junaid shared in detail about how the contest went, and how Nupur spent the rest of the night on the bathroom floor. He then joked that he put Nupur in bed and he ‘cuddled’ with Junaid all night. In a conversation with Hauterrfly, Junaid Khan said, “The only thing with my sister was, you can date whoever you want. But you must bring them home, and they have to have a drinking contest with me. They get to pick the liquor, and the rules are both to take a shot every 15 minutes. And if someone can’t take a shot, or someone throws up, or someone will not be able to take a shot. Those are the rules of the game, and as long as they beat me in a drinking contest, everything is fun." He added that the idea behind this contest was for Ira to see them at their drunkest. related stories Junaid Khan Reveals Nupur Shikhare ‘Cuddled’ With Him All Night Post Drinking Game When asked whether Nupur managed to beat Junaid, the latter replied, “Yeah! So, what happened was we started drinking, and at one point, Nupur was like, Junaid, I’m done. So, I said you take this shot and I’ll not take a shot, so then you won. He took the shot, he won and I took a video of it and it was very sweet. He spent the rest of the night on the bathroom floor with Ira next to him. That was also very sweet. Then I picked him up and I put him in bed and then he cuddled with me all night because he was in my bed." Ira Khan got married to Nupur Shikhare in January last year. While they registered their marriage on January 3, 2024, in Mumbai, they had a white wedding in Udaipur a few days later. About Loveyapa Directed by Advait Chandan (Laal Singh Chaddha), Loveyapa is set to hit theatres on February 7, 2025. The film, produced by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, is a remake of the 2022 Tamil hit Love Today. Apart from Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film also features Kiku Sharda, Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Devishi Mandan, Aaditya Kulshreshth, Nikhil Mehta, Jason Tham, among others. tags : aamir khan bollywood ira khan Junaid Khan Nupur Shikhare Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:07 IST News movies Junaid Khan Recalls Ira’s Husband Nupur Shikhare ‘Cuddled’ With Him After Drinking Contest: ‘He Was In My Bed’ Read More

title: Farah Khan Calls Bigg Boss 18 Winner Karan Veer Mehra Her 'Favourite' In Special Photo
summary: Farah Khan, who is also active on YouTube, recently filmed a new episode with Bigg Boss 18 winner Karan Veer Mehra.
full_content: Farah Khan Calls Bigg Boss 18 Winner Karan Veer Mehra Her 'Favourite' In Special Photo Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:01 IST Farah Khan, who is also active on YouTube, recently filmed a new episode with Bigg Boss 18 winner Karan Veer Mehra. reset Follow us on Google News Karan Veer Mehra won Bigg Boss 18 by defeating Vivian Dsena. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Karan Veer Mehra has been basking in love and admiration ever since winning Bigg Boss 18. Despite facing heavy criticism and frequent targeting by fellow contestants throughout the season, his resilience won over fans. During the Weekend Ka Vaar segment, host Farah Khan defended Karan Veer, likening his journey to that of the late Sidharth Shukla, the iconic winner of BB13. Farah went on to call this season the Karan Veer Mehra Show. Adding to the excitement, Farah, who is an active YouTuber, recently shared a heartwarming update with her Instagram followers—a picture of her hugging Karan Veer, hinting at an upcoming episode featuring him. After Farah shared the picture with Karan Veer, the comments section was flooded with positive messages from his fans, excited to see him on her show. In the photo, both of them are smiling. While Karan is overjoyed after taking home the BB trophy, Farah is equally thrilled, as her favourite contestant won despite facing many challenges in the show. Sharing the picture, the filmmaker wrote, “Coming soon on my YouTube channel. Me and my favorite contestant of Bigg Boss 18, Karan Veer Mehra." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Farah Khan Kunder (@farahkhankunder) During one of the weekend episodes of Bigg Boss 18, Farah Khan criticised some of the contestants but took the opportunity to praise Karan Veer Mehra and his gameplay. She said, “Welcome to Bigg Boss 18, as we know in the outside world, the Karan Veer Mehra show. This whole house is revolving around Karan. You only hear about Karan, Karan’s issues, Karan’s gossip, which is why I said this has become the Karan Veer Mehra show. Last I saw one contestant get targeted just like this, that was Sidharth Shukla and he won the show. Selective anger, whenever there’s a fight, it’s always about Karan. You need to be very careful, your humour doesn’t always sit well with everyone, but I love it. You’re the only one with a sense of humour, whether it’s grey, dark or whatever. But you have to be very careful because everyone has a target on your back." Karan Veer Mehra won Bigg Boss 18 by defeating Vivian Dsena, Rajat Dalal, Avinash Mishra, Chum Darang and Eisha Singh. tags : bollywood entertainment Farah Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:01 IST News movies Farah Khan Calls Bigg Boss 18 Winner Karan Veer Mehra Her 'Favourite' In Special Photo Read More

title: Jamie Foxx Opens Up About Leonardo DiCaprio’s Struggles On The Set Of Django Unchained
summary: The trouble began with one loaded word - one that DiCaprio’s character had to deliver multiple times throughout the film. Foxx himself also stepped in to help DiCaprio embrace the uncomfortable reality of his character.
full_content: Jamie Foxx Opens Up About Leonardo DiCaprio’s Struggles On The Set Of Django Unchained Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:56 IST The trouble began with one loaded word - one that DiCaprio’s character had to deliver multiple times throughout the film. Foxx himself also stepped in to help DiCaprio embrace the uncomfortable reality of his character. reset Follow us on Google News Samuel L Jackson helped DiCaprio on the sets. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Behind the scenes of Quentin Tarantino’s Django Unchained, a particularly intense challenge had Leonardo DiCaprio feeling deeply uncomfortable. Jamie Foxx , who starred in the 2012 hit, recently shed light on the internal conflict DiCaprio faced while playing the cruel plantation owner Calvin Candie. The trouble began with one loaded word—one that DiCaprio’s character had to deliver multiple times throughout the film. “Leonardo DiCaprio had a problem saying it," Foxx revealed in a candid interview. The actor reportedly confided in his co-stars, admitting, “It’s tough for me to say this." “The N-word, specifically. Leo had a hard time saying the N-word," Foxx revealed to Vanity Fair. He further said that at that moment, Samuel L Jackson, the seasoned actor who played Calvin’s disturbingly loyal slave, Stephen, helped him. Known for his no-nonsense approach, Jackson didn’t sugarcoat his advice. As Foxx recalled, Jackson firmly told DiCaprio, “Get over it, mother******! It’s just another Tuesday, mother******!" related stories Foxx himself also stepped in to help DiCaprio embrace the uncomfortable reality of his character. “I told Leo, ‘We are not friends. This is your property. These aren’t humans. This is your property,’" Foxx explained. Taking the advice to heart, DiCaprio took his preparation to the next level. The next day, he reportedly arrived on set and stayed completely in character, refusing to engage with anyone outside of his role. Tarantino’s habit of incorporating racial slurs into his scripts has been a long-standing point of controversy. According to The Independent, films like Django Unchained and The Hateful Eight have drawn criticism for their liberal use of the N-word. However, Jackson, a frequent Tarantino collaborator, has often defended the director’s choices, arguing that they’re rooted in authenticity. Jackson doubled down on this sentiment in an interview with Esquire, calling out the backlash against Tarantino’s scripts. “You can’t just tell a writer he can’t talk, write the words, or put the words in the mouths of the people from their ethnicities, the way that they use their words. You cannot do that, because then it becomes an untruth; it’s not honest. It’s just not honest," Jackson reportedly argued. In the end, DiCaprio overcame his discomfort and delivered a chilling performance as Calvin Candie, one that remains etched in cinematic history. Thanks to the combined efforts of Foxx, Jackson and Tarantino, the film achieved a raw authenticity that sparked conversation and controversy in equal measure. tags : entertainment hollywood jamie foxx Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:56 IST News movies Jamie Foxx Opens Up About Leonardo DiCaprio’s Struggles On The Set Of Django Unchained Read More

title: Angelina Jolie, Brad Pitt's Son Pax Met With Another E-Bike Accident Within Six Months
summary: Reportedly, Pax was flaunting his motor skills by riding the e-bike without using his hands when he rammed into the passenger door of the white hatchback.
full_content: Angelina Jolie, Brad Pitt's Son Pax Met With Another E-Bike Accident Within Six Months Published By : Lubna Khan Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:55 IST Reportedly, Pax was flaunting his motor skills by riding the e-bike without using his hands when he rammed into the passenger door of the white hatchback. reset Follow us on Google News Angelina Jolie adopted Pax in 2007 when he was 3 years old. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Just six months after an e-bike crash, Brad Pitt and his ex-wife Angelina Jolie’s son Pax met with another similar accident. This time, the 21-year-old managed to escape without any injuries. The incident happened on Friday (January 24) in the Los Feliz neighbourhood in Los Angeles. According to reports, Pax was riding his purple-and-black BMX-style electric bicycle when he rammed into the passenger door of a white four-wheeler. He was riding the motorbike hands-free when the accident occurred. The crash left a major dent in the hatchback’s passenger door. As per TMZ, Pax was flaunting his motor skills by riding the e-bike without using his hands. The star kid was, however, wearing a helmet. He ran into the car after taking a turn. In a video obtained by the outlet, Pax was seen talking to the couple who were inside the car and inspected the damage. Pax’s e-bike did not face much damage and he rode off after re-aligning his handlebars. related stories Last year in July, Pax, the eldest child of Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, sustained a head injury after his e-bike collided with a car. The collision took place at the Los Feliz Boulevard in Los Angeles. Pax was not wearing a helmet at that time. He was rushed to the hospital after complaining about a head injury and pain in the hip. The young adult was treated in the ICU before the hospital authorities discharged him on August 5. Sources close to TMZ claimed that the impact was caused when Pax approached an intersection. He crashed into the vehicle which was waiting at a red light. Reportedly, the driver stepped out of the car to check on Pax before emergency services arrived. These two were not the only accidents. Last year in May, Pax was involved in a Tesla crash, reported TMZ. His car crashed into a truck parked outside RED Studios Hollywood. Pax, however, did not sustain any wounds. The police issued him a warning after confirming he was not under the influence of drugs at the time of the crash. Angelina Jolie adopted Pax in 2007 when he was three years old. Additionally, Angelina and Brad Pitt are parents to Shiloh, Zahara, Maddox, and twins Knox and Vivienne. tags : Angelina Jolie entertainment hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:55 IST News movies Angelina Jolie, Brad Pitt's Son Pax Met With Another E-Bike Accident Within Six Months Read More

title: 'Har Har Gange': Guru Randhawa Takes Holy Dip In Triveni Sangam At Maha Kumbh Mela
summary: Apart from Guru Randhawa, other renowned faces who visited Maha Kumbh 2025 include Anupam Kher, Gautam Adani and Sudha Murthy.
full_content: 'Har Har Gange': Guru Randhawa Takes Holy Dip In Triveni Sangam At Maha Kumbh Mela Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:47 IST Apart from Guru Randhawa, other renowned faces who visited Maha Kumbh 2025 include Anupam Kher, Gautam Adani and Sudha Murthy. reset Follow us on Google News Guru Randhawa took a holy dip at Triveni Sangam. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Maha Kumbh 2025, the biggest of all Kumbhs, is being held at the meeting point of the sacred rivers Ganga, Yamuna and Saraswati in Prayagraj. The biggest spiritual gathering has captured the attention from all around the world, with several renowned faces traveling to the popular city of Uttar Pradesh to seek the blessings of the deity. Among others, actor and singer Guru Randhawa also took a holy dip in the Triveni sangam at the ongoing Maha Kumbh. Taking to Instagram, Guru dropped a collage video from Prayagraj in which he could be seen taking a dip in the Sangam, enjoying a boat ride and watching the aarti in the evening. Not just this, the singer also delighted his fans by taking selfies with them. related stories Interestingly, the video was attached to singer Kailash Kher’s song Jay-JayKaara from the film Baahubali 2. Sharing the video, Guru wrote in the caption, “Blessed to take a sacred dip in Maa Ganga at Prayagraj, where faith flows and spirituality thrives. Starting my new journey with God’s blessing. Har har Gange!" The singer’s caption also hinted towards his upcoming project. However, details regarding the same are yet to be revealed. As soon as the singer dropped the video online, it captured the attention of the audiences. An Instagram user stated, “Stay safe, stay blessed." Another one mentioned, “Maa Ganga always blesses you." One of them chimed in, “So inspiring to see such devotion. May Maa Ganga always guide and protect you! Wishing you success and peace on this new journey." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Guru Randhawa (@gururandhawa) Apart from him, other renowned faces who visited Maha Kumbh 2025 include Anupam Kher, Gautam Adani and Sudha Murthy. Guru Randhawa is popular for delivering chartbuster tracks like Patola, High Rated Gabru, Suit Suit, Ishare Tere, Ban Jaa Tu Meri Rani and Lagdi Lahore Di among others. He made his acting debut last year with the romantic drama film Kuch Khattaa Ho Jaay co-starring Saiee Manjrekar and Anupam Kher. Helmed by G Ashok, the film received decent responses from fans and critics alike. His last appearance was in the Punjabi film titled Shahkot which was released in October last year. Directed by Rajiv Dhingra, the film also featured Isha Talwar, Raj Babbar and Gurshabad Singh in lead roles. He will be next seen in another Punjabi film Shaunki Sardar which will hit the theatres in May 2025. tags : bollywood entertainment guru randhawa Maha Kumbh Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:47 IST News movies 'Har Har Gange': Guru Randhawa Takes Holy Dip In Triveni Sangam At Maha Kumbh Mela Read More

title: Ajith Kumar’s Wholesome Moment With Fan Singing Kandukondain Kandukondain Track Goes Viral; Watch
summary: Ajith Kumar's heartwarming interaction with a fan in Dubai has gone viral, showcasing the superstar's humility and charm.
full_content: Ajith Kumar’s Wholesome Moment With Fan Singing Kandukondain Kandukondain Track Goes Viral; Watch Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:44 IST Ajith Kumar's heartwarming interaction with a fan in Dubai has gone viral, showcasing the superstar's humility and charm. reset Follow us on Google News Ajith Kumar's sweet moment with a fan in Dubai singing the Kandukondain Kandukondain title song has gone viral. Ajith Kumar recently made headlines after a heartwarming video of him interacting with a fan in Dubai went viral. The clip captures the superstar graciously standing by as his fan sang the iconic title song from Kandukondain Kandukondain. Dressed in his signature suave white attire, Ajith listened attentively as the fan poured his heart out through the song. After the performance, Ajith warmly hugged him, creating a moment that left fans across the internet buzzing. But the surprise didn’t end there—when the actor asked for the fan’s name, he discovered it was also Ajith. The revelation brought a chuckle from the real AK, adding a charming twist to the encounter. related stories Latest Video Of THALA #AjithKumar From Dubai! 🌟🇦🇪A Lucky Fan Pays Tribute To AK By Singing A Song From Kandukondain Kandukondain 🎶 What A Moment To Cherish! ❤️ #VidaaMuyarchi | #GoodBadUgly pic.twitter.com/b4sS5U4mva — AJITHKUMAR FANS CLUB (@ThalaAjith_FC) January 25, 2025 The song, originally featured in the 2000 hit film Kandukondain Kandukondain, was directed by Rajiv Menon. A musical adaptation of Jane Austen’s Sense and Sensibility, the film starred Ajith Kumar alongside Mammootty, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, and Tabu. The film also stars Trisha Krishnan, Arjun Sarja, and Regina Cassandra. Adding to the excitement, Ajith’s much-anticipated film Good Bad Ugly is slated for release on April 10, 2025. Fans have plenty to look forward to as the beloved superstar continues to make waves both on and off the screen. tags : Ajith Kumar regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:44 IST News movies Ajith Kumar’s Wholesome Moment With Fan Singing Kandukondain Kandukondain Track Goes Viral; Watch Read More

title: Ruuh And Joh Talk 'Gumshudah' And Their Iconic Legacy: 'Being Siblings Makes Music Easier' | Exclusive
summary: Ruuh and Joh, the sibling duo redefining the Indian music scene, are making waves with their soulful melodies and cinematic flair. From chart-topping soundtracks like Call Me Bae and Mismatched Season 3 to their viral hit Gumshudah, these dynamic composers are blending modern rhythms with heartfelt lyrics.
full_content: Ruuh And Joh Talk 'Gumshudah' And Their Iconic Legacy: 'Being Siblings Makes Music Easier' | Exclusive Reported By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:41 IST Ruuh and Joh, the sibling duo redefining the Indian music scene, are making waves with their soulful melodies and cinematic flair. From chart-topping soundtracks like Call Me Bae and Mismatched Season 3 to their viral hit Gumshudah, these dynamic composers are blending modern rhythms with... Read More reset Follow us on Google News Discover how sibling duo Ruuh and Joh are revolutionizing Indian music with hits like Gumshudah, Tere Dil Ka Raaz, and Yaara Tere Bin. What do you get when you combine a sibling duo with a knack for heartfelt melodies, a dash of cinematic flair, and a legacy rooted in India’s iconic disco era? Meet Ruuh and Joh, the dynamic composers behind the hit tracks of Call Me Bae, Mismatched Season 3 and creators of soulful anthems like Tere Dil Ka Raaz and Yaara Tere Bin. With their first tentpole releases for Amazon Prime, Netflix India and Dharmatic, this duo is making waves in the music world—and they’re just getting started. Ruuh and Joh’s story is more than just about crafting great music; it’s about carrying forward a family tradition. Their father, Vijay Benedict, was the voice behind legendary disco hits like I Am A Disco Dancer and Zindagi Meri Dance—tracks that defined an era. Inspired by his incredible legacy, Ruuh and Joh grew up immersed in music, learning early on to balance humility with the drive to seize opportunities. “My father’s music is iconic," Ruuh reflects. “If I achieve even a quarter of what he did, I’ll consider it a success." related stories The duo’s sound is a masterful blend of contemporary vibes and classic influences, creating music that resonates across generations. Whether it’s their soulful singles or their chart-topping soundtrack for Call Me Bae, Ruuh and Joh bring a unique energy to everything they produce. Tracks like Baatein and Yaara Tere Bin highlight their chemistry, while their collaboration with singer-songwriter Shai on Tere Dil Ka Raaz showcases their versatility. But their journey isn’t just about chart-topping hits. Ruuh has a rich portfolio of work that includes award-winning projects like the Cannes Lions-winning Thomas Cook campaign, viral TikTok tracks, and documentaries for Nat Geo and Discovery. From the glamorous world of fashion and comedy to soundtracking heartfelt stories, Ruuh and Joh’s career reflects their dedication to crafting music that leaves an impact. In this exclusive interview with News18 Showsha, Ruuh and Joh open up about their creative process, their father’s influence, and their plans to shape the future of music. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Reuel (@ruuhmusic) Here are the excerpts: How did you come up with the idea for Gumshudah? What inspired the melody and lyrics? The idea for Gumshudah started with  JOH working on the music and beat first. Once that foundation was set, we developed the lyrics and melody. We wanted to incorporate both English and Hindi, and that duality really shaped the concept of the song. It was a very free-flowing and immediate process—one of those moments where everything just clicks. In fact, we ended up writing and composing the entire piece in just a couple of hours, which is always a great sign. After that, we sent it over to Smithy, our lyricist, to refine the lyrics. And that’s how the idea and composition of Gumshudah came to life. You mentioned that Gumshudah was initially created just for yourselves. How did it transition into becoming a part of Mismatched Season 3? Yes, we originally wrote Gumshudah as a song we wanted to release ourselves because it had a completely fresh sound—something that doesn’t exist in India, especially in Hindi. We really wanted to push this new vibe out there. Then, by some twist of fate, someone happened to play it for the showrunners of Mismatched. They listened to it and absolutely loved it! In fact, they had gone through several songs before coming across Gumshudah and immediately asked if they could use it for the show. It was all so serendipitous! What’s even crazier is that they didn’t give us any brief or ask for a single change. The song was used exactly as it was, in its original form. The song blends modern rhythms with heartfelt lyrics. How did you approach achieving this balance during the composition process? We actually came up with the melody first, even before working on the beat. The beat we ended up writing to was incredibly exciting—fresh, new, and youthful. It had this vibrant, young energy that we wanted to capture. At the same time, we aimed to make the song’s entry feel deep and emotionally resonant, while still being relatable to a younger audience. That’s why we included words like ‘forever maybe,’ which evoke a unique mental space. But then, when the song kicks in, it’s something you can totally dance to, you know! So, I think ...

title: Vivek Agnihotri On Mumbai Fare Hike: 'Everything Is Increasing Except Quality Of Life'
summary: The ticket prices for MSRTC buses have risen by 15 per cent. In addition to that, the fares for rickshaws and taxis will rise by Rs 3 from February 1.
full_content: Vivek Agnihotri On Mumbai Fare Hike: 'Everything Is Increasing Except Quality Of Life' Published By : Lubna Khan Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:38 IST The ticket prices for MSRTC buses have risen by 15 per cent. In addition to that, the fares for rickshaws and taxis will rise by Rs 3 from February 1. reset Follow us on Google News Vivek Agnihotri is gearing up for the release of his next, The Delhi Files. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The Maharashtra government recently announced a hike in auto-rickshaw and taxi fares, leaving Mumbaikars extremely furious. The decision has met with widespread criticism, with many residents voicing concerns about the affordability of their daily commute. Adding to the growing chorus of dissent, Bollywood director Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri also voiced his disapproval regarding the fare hike. The filmmaker, who is quite vocal about various social and political issues, took to social media to express his frustration with the increasing prices of the most used transportation in Mumbai. On January 25, Vivek Agnihotri dropped a news article on his official X handle, regarding the hike in auto-rickshaws and taxi fares. Along with the post, he wrote, “By and by, everything is increasing in Mumbai. Prices, traffic, potholes, chaos, sea level, filth, population, stress, pollution… the only thing that is not increasing in proportion is the quality of life. I hope dead @mybmc resurrects someday." related stories By and by, everything is increasing in Mumbai. Prices, traffic, potholes, chaos, sea level, filth, population, stress, pollution… only thing that is not increasing in proportion is the quality of life. I hope dead @mybmc resurrects some day. pic.twitter.com/YhQaib53vC — Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri (@vivekagnihotri) January 25, 2025 For those unaware, the State Transport Authority has recently announced a significant fare increase for Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (MSRTC) buses, raising ticket prices by 15 per cent. The revised bus fare will start today, January 25. In addition, Maharashtra Transport Minister Pratap Sarnaik declared the fares for rickshaws and taxis will rise by Rs 3. It will come into effect from February 1. A State Transport Department official claimed, “The fare for blue-and-silver AC Cool Cabs will now start at Rs 48, compared to the current Rs 40 for the first 1.5 kilometres. Additionally, beyond the 1.5 km basic fare, the per-kilometer charges will also rise," as reported by the Free Press Journal. Filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri last directed The Vaccine War, which hit the theatres in 2023. The film boasted an ensemble cast, including Nana Patekar, Anupam Kher, Pallavi Joshi, Raima Sen, Girija Oak and Nivedita Bhattacharya. Now, he is gearing up for the release of his upcoming film, The Delhi Files. The project will be in two parts. The first part, the Bengal Chapter, is scheduled to be released on August 15. The film will be bankrolled by Abhishek Agarwal under his banner, Abhishek Agarwal Arts, in collaboration with Agnihotri’s wife, Pallavi Joshi. It features a talented cast, including Mithun Chakraborty, Anupam Kher, Govind Namdev, Puneet Issar, Babbu Maan, Pallavi Joshi and Palomi Ghosh. tags : bollywood entertainment Vivek Agnihotri Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:38 IST News movies Vivek Agnihotri On Mumbai Fare Hike: 'Everything Is Increasing Except Quality Of Life' Read More

title: Is Taylor Swift's Version Of Reputation Coming Soon? Fans Speculate After Albums Disappear From Spotify
summary: Swifties immediately started speculating about the cause of the strange disappearance.
full_content: Is Taylor Swift's Version Of Reputation Coming Soon? Fans Speculate After Albums Disappear From Spotify Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:35 IST Swifties immediately started speculating about the cause of the strange disappearance. reset Follow us on Google News This latest mystery added fuel to the ongoing saga of Taylor Swift’s efforts. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Taylor Swift’s fans were sent into an absolute frenzy Friday morning when they noticed something shocking: both her 2006 debut album and 2017’s Reputation had reportedly vanished from Spotify. As the news spread, Swifties immediately started speculating about the cause of the strange disappearance. Some fans jumped to the conclusion that the albums had been pulled to make way for the re-recorded versions of Taylor Swift (name of her debut album) and Reputation, both albums she’s hinted at releasing for some time now. Others, more sceptical, suggested that it was all just a technical glitch, a bug in the system causing the albums to temporarily disappear. One Swiftie posted on X (formerly Twitter), “There’s no Reputation or Debut stolen version on Spotify OMG What is happening? Everybody calm down." In the clip, they showed the currently empty Spotify page where the albums used to be listed. Another fan account joined in saying, “’Debut’ and ‘Reputation’ were REMOVED from Taylor Swift’s Spotify page!" And just like that, the fan base exploded with theories, questions and concerns. related stories THERE’S NO REPUTATION OR DEBUT STOLEN VERSION ON SPOTIFY OMG WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING EVERYBODY CALM DOWN pic.twitter.com/IT0R5sbo4f — TAYLA (@Ponar15) January 24, 2025 ? | “Debut" and “reputation" were REMOVED from Taylor Swift’s Spotify page! pic.twitter.com/2Z9AXDoqol — Taylor Swift News (@blessedswifty) January 24, 2025 By the time news outlets picked up on the situation, Swift’s debut album had reportedly reappeared on her page, but Reputation remained absent. This latest mystery adds fuel to the ongoing saga of Taylor Swift’s efforts to regain ownership of her music. Following a heated dispute with Big Machine Records and former manager Scooter Braun, Swift took the step of re-recording several of her albums to reclaim her work. So far, she’s released Fearless (Taylor’s Version), Red (Taylor’s Version), Speak Now (Taylor’s Version) and 1989 (Taylor’s Version). Fans are eagerly waiting for the next in line. Given that Reputation is one of the last albums she hasn’t re-recorded yet, many fans believe that its mysterious removal could signal that the re-recorded version is finally on its way. It’s no secret that Swift has been teasing this release for months and some speculate that the announcement could come at the Grammy Awards next month, much like her surprise reveal of The Tortured Poets Department (TTPD) album at last year’s ceremony, reports Page Six. In fact, Swift’s fashion choices during the 2024 Grammy red carpet sparked more Reputation speculation. Fans noted her dark, goth-punk-inspired outfit as a nod to her Reputation era, which she once described as her “goth-punk moment of female rage." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Bookish Swifties Club💜 (@bookishswiftiesclub) While it’s unclear whether the re-recorded Reputation album is dropping soon, Swift’s trademark Easter Eggs or hidden clues dropped in her music and public appearances have only added to the excitement. Fans are holding onto hope that the Grammy Awards will bring the announcement they’ve all been waiting for, especially considering that Swift used the same stage last year to drop some major news about her projects. For now, Swifties will have to stay tuned and keep a watchful eye on her every move. Could this be the calm before the storm of Reputation (Taylor’s Version)? Only time will tell. tags : entertainment music Taylor Swift Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:35 IST News movies Is Taylor Swift's Version Of Reputation Coming Soon? Fans Speculate After Albums Disappear From Spotify Read More

title: Harnoor Opens Up About His Journey From ‘Waalian’ To ‘Famous’: 'I Want My Songs To Speak For Me' | Exclusive
summary: Harnoor, the Punjabi music sensation behind hits like Waalian and Parshawan, is back with his latest single, Famous. Known for blending modern R&B with Punjabi melodies, Harnoor opens up about his journey from his breakout debut in 2019 to his new era of music that dives into themes of love, change, and nostalgia.
full_content: Harnoor Opens Up About His Journey From ‘Waalian’ To ‘Famous’: 'I Want My Songs To Speak For Me' | Exclusive Reported By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:21 IST Harnoor, the Punjabi music sensation behind hits like Waalian and Parshawan, is back with his latest single, Famous. Known for blending modern R&B with Punjabi melodies, Harnoor opens up about his journey from his breakout debut in 2019 to his new era of music that... Read More reset Follow us on Google News Punjabi music sensation Harnoor talks about his latest single Famous, his journey from Waalian to a new musical era, and how his roots and global influences shape his artistry. If you’ve ever swayed to the soulful vibes of Waalian or lost yourself in the dreamy melodies of Parshawan and Tareefan, you’re already familiar with Harnoor—the young Punjabi music sensation whose silky voice has made hearts flutter since his breakout debut in 2019. Based in Texas but firmly rooted in his Punjabi heritage, Harnoor has become a household name, garnering over 200 million audio streams for Waalian alone and building an enviable catalog of hits that blend modern R&B with timeless Punjabi melodies. Now, Harnoor is back with Famous, a poignant and ambitious two-part single that dives deep into themes of love, change, and the bittersweet ache of nostalgia. With its upbeat Pop-R&B rhythms transitioning into a reflective Lofi soundscape, Famous isn’t just a song—it’s an emotional journey. For Harnoor, this track, along with his recent songwriter debut on Letter to My Ex, marks the beginning of a new era in his career, one where his artistic evolution takes center stage. related stories In this exclusive interview with News18 Showsha, Harnoor opens up about his musical journey, the inspirations behind Famous, and what fans can expect from his upcoming EP. As he prepares to unveil a fresh chapter in his promising career, get ready to meet the artist who’s redefining Punjabi music with his unmistakable charm, heartfelt lyrics, and an innate ability to make every note feel personal. View this post on Instagram A post shared by HARNOOR (@harnoorhere) Here are the excerpts: “Famous" is such a heartfelt exploration of love and nostalgia. What inspired you to write this song, and how does it reflect your personal journey? I made this song back when I was in a relationship, my partner used to doubt me a lot so I decided to write this song to win her trust and let her know what I think about her. The song transitions from a Pop-R&B rhythm to a Lofi soundscape. How did you decide on this two-part structure, and what message are you trying to convey through it? I made this song in Mexico a few years back, Arsh had made that switch and it just went crazy. My composition was fitting really well on the beat. You’ve mentioned that ‘Famous’ captures the simplicity of past moments. Can you share a specific memory that influenced the song’s lyrics or emotions? A specific memory from the song lyrics are when she told me that she talks to the moon when she’s lonely and I’m with the stars. How was the experience of working with Arsh Heer, Shraban, Mike Tucci, and the creative team for this track? We never interfere with each other’s work, we know our parts in the song and we beleive everyone knows their part the best. The visualizer for ‘Famous’ offers a glimpse into your daily life. How important is it for you to bring authenticity into your visuals, and what do you want fans to take away from them? I beleive in honesty, the industry in the west don’t usually hide their flaws and people spend a lot of money just to show off the streets This song was initially going to be just an audio release but I personally wanted a visualizer, I met my friends Pj and tej in Toronto and they killed the visualizer and this is my daily routine whenever I’m not home this is what I do. With your recent venture into songwriting, starting with “Letter to My Ex," how has the transition been? How does writing your own lyrics shape your connection with your music? “Letter to my ex" is the first song I have written in a single day so it’s pretty important to me and this song is also about my first ex, it’s all about connectivity, Shraban made the melody and everything just happened next i didn’t put much effort into it, it was like my mind and heart automatically aligned with the song and the song and the things I have been wanting to say finally came out Do you find songwriting more challenging or liberating compared to performing songs written by others? I don’t feel it’s challenging, I think it’s easier writing a song by yourself, composing and singing but when you make a song with multiple minds like “sicko mode" for example with Travis & Drake that song has a lot of writers, so I feel if there’s more people on a song it’s gonna be better. Can we expect more self-written tracks in your upcoming EP? If so, how are you pushing your boundaries as a songwriter? 100%, in the ne...

title: The Teskey Brothers On Analog Sounds, Soulful Music And The Mahindra Blues Stage: 'Blues Knows No Borders' | Exclusive
summary: The Teskey Brothers, Australia’s soulful blues sensation, are bringing their signature blend of nostalgia and authenticity to the Mahindra Blues Festival 2025.
full_content: The Teskey Brothers On Analog Sounds, Soulful Music And The Mahindra Blues Stage: 'Blues Knows No Borders' | Exclusive Reported By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:14 IST The Teskey Brothers, Australia’s soulful blues sensation, are bringing their signature blend of nostalgia and authenticity to the Mahindra Blues Festival 2025. reset Follow us on Google News From Warrandyte to the Mahindra Blues Festival 2025, The Teskey Brothers to bring their soulful blues and Australian charm to India. From the sleepy, soulful town of Warrandyte to the dazzling stage of the Mahindra Blues Festival 2025, The Teskey Brothers are bringing their unmistakable blend of nostalgia-drenched blues and soul to India—and they’re doing it with style. Formed in 2008 by brothers Josh and Sam Teskey, this Australian band has been rewriting the blues playbook, infusing it with their own heartfelt authenticity and a generous dash of Aussie charm. They’re not just making music; they’re creating an experience that lingers long after the last note fades. Their story begins on the banks of the Yarra River, where they first started busking for local crowds. With nothing more than raw talent, a love for Otis Redding and Ray Charles, and a knack for crafting melodies as smooth as the river itself, they quickly captured hearts. Drawing inspiration from their picturesque surroundings, their music flows with the same emotional current—both powerful and tranquil—that defines the best of the blues. related stories Their debut album, Half Mile Harvest, is proof of their love for old-school sound. Recorded in their home studio using analog equipment, it’s as warm and timeless as a vinyl record spinning on a turntable. The album propelled them from local gigs to global acclaim, proving that their dedication to authenticity was exactly what the world was waiting for. Their sophomore effort, Run Home Slow, solidified their standing, debuting at number 2 on the ARIA Charts and earning them a well-deserved spot as one of Australia’s most cherished musical exports. What makes The Teskey Brothers stand out is their unshakable commitment to staying true to their roots. In an age dominated by digital perfection, they’ve embraced the imperfections of analog gear and the spontaneity of live performance, resulting in music that feels honest, raw, and alive. Their grassroots approach to building their career—no label, no manager, just passion and perseverance—has fostered a deep bond with their fans and earned them multiple ARIA Awards. Now, the Mahindra Blues Festival 2025 is their next big stage, and they couldn’t be more excited. For The Teskey Brothers, it’s not just about playing music; it’s about celebrating the enduring spirit of the blues and connecting with new audiences across continents. Their performance promises to be a soulful journey, blending the vintage charm of the genre with a fresh, modern perspective. In this exclusive interview with News18 Showsha, Josh Teskey dives into the band’s evolution, their connection to the blues, and what it means to bring their Australian soul to the Mahindra Blues Festival. Get ready for a story as compelling as their sound—where resilience meets rhythm, and hope finds its harmony. View this post on Instagram A post shared by The Teskey Brothers (@theteskeybrothers) Here are the excerpts: The Mahindra Blues Festival celebrates both resilience and hope. How do these themes align with your musical philosophy? Josh Teskey: Blues music, rhythm and blues music, soul music—whatever you want to call it—is a music that’s always been with us. It’s always been here, as long as you can remember, people have been singing rhythm and blues. And it’s going to stay here too. It’s never been the most popular of all music, it’s never at the very top of the pop charts, but it’s always had its place and its support. It’s timeless. That’s why we love it and can’t wait to see how the people respond to it in India firsthand. Blues has universal appeal but distinct regional flavors. What excites you most about bringing your Australian take on blues to an Indian audience? Josh Teskey: The town of Warrandyte is situated on the banks of the Yarra River, a beautiful river that influences our music in many ways. There always seem to be river analogies creeping into our lyrics and songwriting. Also, the incredible mentors and musicians of the area, of course, have played a great influence on us. Growing up in Warrandyte, how did your environment and community shape your love for soul and blues music? Josh Teskey: Artists like these are what influenced me to sing at all. The raw emotion that resonates in these voices—there’s just nothing like it. We also love the production and sounds on these records; it’s a sound we’ve always tried to aim for. What do you remember about those early days busking and performing at local venues? Are there any standout moments that you look back on fondly? Josh Teskey: It was never...

title: Miley Cyrus And Family Are Focusing On New Beginnings In 2025: Report
summary: Despite rumours that suggested tension within the family following Trace Cyrus’s open letter to Billy Ray, a source has insisted that the idea of a family feud was far from the truth.
full_content: Miley Cyrus And Family Are Focusing On New Beginnings In 2025: Report Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:10 IST Despite rumours that suggested tension within the family following Trace Cyrus’s open letter to Billy Ray, a source has insisted that the idea of a family feud was far from the truth. reset Follow us on Google News A source clarified that Billy Ray’s album announcement was a planned move. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The Cyrus family is determined to avoid drama, especially when it comes to their public image. Despite rumours that suggest tension within the family following Trace Cyrus’s open letter to Billy Ray, which was sent after the singer’s performance at the inauguration, a close source insists that the idea of a family feud is far from the truth. “They’ve put the 2024 drama behind them, and it’s a fresh start. Miley, Noah, Braison and Tish don’t want any part of a public feud. They don’t find that kind of attention enjoyable," the insider reportedly explained. Billy Ray Cyrus , aged 63, is the father of five children: sons Trace (35) and Braison (30) and daughters Brandi (37), Miley (31) and Noah (25). He shares these children with Tish, 57, whom he divorced in 2022. Billy Ray is also the father of Christopher, 32, from another relationship. related stories On January 24, Billy Ray announced his upcoming album, set for release this summer, which was produced by Braison. The announcement came after his performance at the inauguration, which garnered attention due to technical issues. This led to Trace’s open letter, which was shared on Instagram, expressing concern over his father’s well-being, reports People. However, the source clarified to the news outlet that Billy Ray’s album announcement was a planned move, one that had been decided upon months ago in the fall and wasn’t tied to the week’s events. Braison, who made his Grand Ole Opry debut last July alongside his father, spoke highly of Billy Ray, sharing his excitement for the album. “This past year, I’ve gotten to know my dad better than I ever have," he said. “I’ve heard stories, jokes, and songs that no one else has. This project lets me tell his story through music, and I’m fortunate to do that. Music, family, and stories are what matter most to him, so to bring those elements together is a full circle moment," Braison added. Billy Ray, in return, expressed his pride in collaborating with his son, calling the album something “special."In Trace’s letter, he revealed a deep concern for his father’s health, writing, “Me and the girls have been genuinely worried about you for years, but you’ve pushed all of us away… You’re not healthy, Dad, and everyone is noticing it." Trace also shared his personal journey with sobriety, adding, “We haven’t talked in a while, but I’m over a year and a half clean from alcohol. Guess what? I feel amazing," informs People. Meanwhile, in June, Billy Ray posted a heartfelt tribute to Noah on Instagram, sharing an old photo of the two and lyrics from their 2022 duet, “Noah (Stand Still)." Noah replied in the comments, saying, “Love my daddy so much." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Billy Ray Cyrus (@billyraycyrus) Miley, too, addressed her relationship with Billy Ray during an interview with David Letterman that same month. When Letterman asked if the two were estranged, Miley responded, “There’s no estrangement with your father. It’s just the way things are played out." She went on to express her deep appreciation for her parents’ sacrifices, saying, “What’s beautiful is that my parents served their children. I know that. They sacrificed so much for us. Whatever we dreamed of, they made it possible." Despite the rumours and public speculation, the Cyrus family appears to be focused on healing, supporting each other and moving forward together. tags : entertainment hollywood miley cyrus Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:10 IST News movies Miley Cyrus And Family Are Focusing On New Beginnings In 2025: Report Read More

title: Shraddha Kapoor And Hrithik Roshan Pose With Morgan Freeman, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Hans Zimmer In VIRAL Photo
summary: Hrithik Roshan, Shraddha Kapoor attended Joy Awards in Riyadh. A group picture shows them posing with Hollywood legends Morgan Freeman, Amanda Seyfried, Hans Zimmer, Sir Anthony Hopkins, others.
full_content: Shraddha Kapoor And Hrithik Roshan Pose With Morgan Freeman, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Hans Zimmer In VIRAL Photo Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:09 IST Hrithik Roshan, Shraddha Kapoor attended Joy Awards in Riyadh. A group picture shows them posing with Hollywood legends Morgan Freeman, Amanda Seyfried, Hans Zimmer, Sir Anthony Hopkins, others. reset Follow us on Google News Hrithik Roshan and Shraddha Kapoor recently graced the Joy Awards in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Bollywood actors Hrithik Roshan and Shraddha Kapoor recently graced the Joy Awards in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. While Hrithik was honoured at the prestigious ceremony to commemorate his 25 years in the film industry, Shraddha was one of the presenters at the event. Now, a group picture from the event is going viral on social media, and it shows Hrithik and Shraddha posing with Hollywood legends such as Morgan Freeman, Amanda Seyfried, Hans Zimmer, Matthew McConaughey, among many others. The official Instagram account of Joy Awards shared a group picture which shows Shraddha Kapoor sitting next to Amanda Seyfried. The Stree 2 actress dazzled in a black abaya-inspired corset gown by designer label Torani. The picture also features Hrithik Roshan on the other side, while Morgan Freeman is seen standing behind Matthew McConaughey. The group photo also features Sir Anthony Hopkins, Oscar-winning composer Hans Zimmer, Cuba Gooding Jr, Christina Aguilera, Andrea Bocelli, singer Michael Bublé, Guy Ritchie, Mike Flanagan, Martin Lawrence, and others. The picture has taken social media by storm. Check it out below! related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Joy Awards (@joyawards) Fans were pleasantly surprised to see Hrithik Roshan and Shraddha Kapoor posing with the Hollywood icons. While one Instagram user wrote, “I see shraddha kapoor the Queen of Bollywood," while another one commented, “I can see 2 Indian beauties here." For the occasion, Hrithik Roshan donned a red formal suit with black shirt. While accepting the award, the ‘Fighter’ actor said, “Thank you. I am humbled, and I am grateful for this, and so encouraged. Look at who I am with. Me holding an award amidst the great legends here; this doesn’t make sense." He further added, “"It’s been 25 years. It seems like a long time, but unfortunately, it’s taken me 25 years to start understanding what acting is, and it’s just about now that I feel ready to take my flight as an actor, so I take this as a symbol for the hope I have in my heart and promise for the next 25 years. Hopefully, when I am back, if I am back, if you will have me again, I will feel a little bit more deserving of being amidst such greatness and for such honours. Thank you so much, Shukran. May peace be upon you all." tags : Amanda Seyfried bollywood hans zimmer hrithik roshan matthew mcconaughey morgan freeman Shraddha Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:09 IST News movies Shraddha Kapoor And Hrithik Roshan Pose With Morgan Freeman, Sir Anthony Hopkins, Hans Zimmer In VIRAL Photo Read More
