title: Anil Kapoor Marks 1 Year Of Fighter: 'Journey Filled With Hard Work’
summary: Backed by Viacom 18 and Marflix Pictures, the film also featured celebs like Akshay Oberoi, Karan Singh Grover, Rishabh Sawhney, Sanjeeda Shaikh and Ashutosh Rana in pivotal roles.
full_content: Anil Kapoor Marks 1 Year Of Fighter: 'Journey Filled With Hard Work’ Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 12:49 IST Backed by Viacom 18 and Marflix Pictures, the film also featured celebs like Akshay Oberoi, Karan Singh Grover, Rishabh Sawhney, Sanjeeda Shaikh and Ashutosh Rana in pivotal roles. reset Follow us on Google News Anil played Commanding Officer Rocky in Fighter. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Fighter, the Siddharth Anand-directorial aerial action thriller film featuring Hrithik Roshan, Deepika Padukone and Anil Kapoor in the lead is celebrating its first anniversary today, January 25. To mark the special occasion, Anil, who played Commanding Officer Rakesh ‘Rocky’ Jai Singh in the film, took a stroll down memory lane and re-read the critic’s reviews for Fighter, a ritual which he follows for some of his films on their anniversaries. This time, the actor shared them with his Instafam. Taking to Instagram, Anil shared a string of pictures featuring the film’s reviews, his look from the film and a poster of Fighter introducing him as Rocky. related stories Sharing the post, he wrote in the caption, “Looking back with immense pride as Fighter completes 1 year. It’s almost a ritual for me to look at reviews of some films on their anniversaries. This time, I thought I’d share the ritual with everyone." Talking about the film, he added, “This was a journey filled with hard work, dedication, and unforgettable moments. I’m so grateful to the incredible team and the love from all of you that made it so special. Here’s to pushing boundaries and creating magic together! #1YearOfFighter." View this post on Instagram A post shared by anilskapoor (@anilskapoor) Backed by Viacom 18 and Marflix Pictures, the film also featured celebs like Akshay Oberoi, Karan Singh Grover, Rishabh Sawhney, Sanjeeda Shaikh and Ashutosh Rana in pivotal roles. In no time, the comment section was flooded with reactions from fans and celebs alike. Fighter co-producer Mamta Anand wrote, “Was truly an honour for us all, to work with you @anilskapoor Your unparalleled brilliance, depth and discipline as an actor is something we will forever look up to." Actor Rishabh Sawhney also shared his experience of working with Anil in Fighter and wrote, “It is such an honour to have shared screen with you, sir. Thank you for all the advice." In Fighter, Anil played Commanding Officer Rakesh Jai Singh. Hrithik and Deepika played squadron leader Shamsher Pathania, aka Patty and squadron leader Minal Rathore, aka Minni, respectively. The plot of the film is against the background of a terror attack in Srinagar. The film received positive feedback from fans and critics alike and also was among the highest-grossing films of 2024. tags : Anil Kapoor bollywood entertainment Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:33 IST News movies Anil Kapoor Marks 1 Year Of Fighter: 'Journey Filled With Hard Work’ Read More

title: Wamiqa Gabbi ‘Looking Forward’ To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava And So Are We
summary: Wamiqa Gabbi shared the trailer of Chhaava and wrote, “Wow, really looking forward to this story.”
full_content: Wamiqa Gabbi ‘Looking Forward’ To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava And So Are We Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 12:49 IST Wamiqa Gabbi shared the trailer of Chhaava and wrote, “Wow, really looking forward to this story.” reset Follow us on Google News Chhaava is all set to release on February 14. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Wamiqa Gabbi joined the list of celebrities like Arjun Kapoor, Katrina Kaif and Kriti Sanon to pour in wishes and praises for Vicky Kaushal’s Chhaava trailer. Dropping a post on Instagram stories, Wamiqa called the glimpse of the film ‘wow’, lauding the impressive depiction of the Maratha Empire and the screen presence of the protagonist. Chhaava is all set to release on February 14. Besides Vicky, the film also stars Rashmika Mandanna and Akshaye Khanna in lead roles. On Friday, Wamiqa Gabbi shared the trailer of Chhaava on social media. Along with it, she wrote, “Wow, really looking forward to this story." related stories Kriti Sanon, too, posted the trailer on Instagram stories, writing, “MASSIVE Mega Blockbuster Loading… Goosebumps! Laxman Utekar sir!! Kya baat hai!! Killing it! #Dinoo Maddock Films Maddock films, Laxman Utekar, rashmika_mandanna, vickykaushal09 and 07 sonymusicindia Vicky Kaushal looks like your best so far!!! outstanding!! Rashmika Mandanna love the marathi avatar! Royal, elegant and absolutely stunning! Good luck to the entire team!" Arjun Kapoor, too, reacted to the trailer, writing, “It promises a grand historical spectacle with powerful storytelling and breathtaking visuals… This one deserves to be experienced on the big screen! Don’t miss Chhaava in cinemas on 14th February." Coming back to Wamiqa Gabbi, the actress was recently seen alongside Varun Dhawan in Baby John. For her next, she has joined the cast of the upcoming spy thriller G2. It is directed by debutant Vinay Kumar Sirigineedi. The film is a sequel to the 2018 hit spy thriller Goodachari, written by and starring Adivi Sesh. Wamiqa plays an essential role in the film which takes forward the story of Sesh’s character from Goodachari. In a statement, Wamiqa shared her excitement to be a part of the film. She said, “The first film set a remarkable benchmark, and stepping into this world is both thrilling and challenging. Working with such a talented cast and crew inspires me to push boundaries and bring fresh energy to my character. I can’t wait for the audience to experience what we’re crafting – it’s going to be extraordinary." Apart from Adivi Sesh and Wamiqa Gabbi, Emraan Hashmi is also expected to play a key role in the film. Murali Sharma, Supriya Yarlagadda and Madhu Shalini will also join the lead cast for supporting roles. tags : bollywood Wamiqa Gabbi Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:22 IST News movies Wamiqa Gabbi ‘Looking Forward’ To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava And So Are We Read More

title: Fan Meets SEVENTEEN’s The8 And Mingyu At Singapore Bar: 'I Even Hugged Them'
summary: "I even had a drink with them. I’m really crying," the fan recalled meeting SEVENTEEN’s The8 And Mingyu.
full_content: Fan Meets SEVENTEEN’s The8 And Mingyu At Singapore Bar: 'I Even Hugged Them' Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 12:17 IST "I even had a drink with them. I’m really crying," the fan recalled meeting SEVENTEEN’s The8 And Mingyu. reset Follow us on Google News SEVENTEEN are in Singapore for their Right Here World Tour. (Photo Credits: Instagram) SEVENTEEN members The8 and Mingyu are enjoying their time in Singapore ahead of their Right Here World Tour on January 25 and 26. While fans eagerly await their performances, one lucky fan claims to have had an unforgettable encounter with the idols. According to her, she visited a bar called Celavi to celebrate her birthday and unexpectedly met The8 and Mingyu there. She shared that she spent some time with them, had drinks, and even hugged Mingyu three times. However, no photos were taken, as their bodyguards reportedly requested her not to capture the moment. In a Threads post (Now Deleted), the fan, as per KoreaBoo wrote, “Who could believe it? I came to Singapore for SEVENTEEN’s concert. The night before that, I came to Celavi for my birthday party and ran into The8. He even chugged a drink with me. But his bodyguard said no photos allowed. We’re drinking alcohol with The8’s bodyguard now and Mingyu, too. Mingyu is here, too. I even had a drink with him. I’m really crying. It’s my birthday party with The8 and Mingyu. I even hugged Mingyu and The8. I hugged Mingyu three times. He smelled so good, he’s so soft, tall and handsome. I have no regrets now." related stories After their performances in Singapore, which will be their fifth time in the country, SEVENTEEN will head to Jakarta for shows on February 8 and 9. The group will wrap up their Right Here World Tour in Bangkok on February 15 and 16. Before these dates, the South Korean boy band performed in various cities, including Goyang, Rosemont, Belmont Park, San Antonio, Oakland, Los Angeles, Nagoya, Tokyo, Osaka, Fukuoka and Bulacan. While SEVENTEEN continues its world tour, one member, Yoon Jeonghan, is missing as he is currently serving his mandatory military service in South Korea. The other members, S Coups, Joshua Hong, Wen Junhui, Hoshi, Wonwoo, Woozi, DK, Mingyu, The8, Seungkwan, Vernon and Dino, are still waiting for their enlistment dates to be confirmed. tags : korean Korean Entertainment Seventeen Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:17 IST News movies Fan Meets SEVENTEEN’s The8 And Mingyu At Singapore Bar: 'I Even Hugged Them' Read More

Another wrote, “So beautiful you are." Keeping her look minimal yet striking, Malaika accessorized with a bun hairstyle. Her flawless makeup, complete with a bold lip and smoky eyes, added the perfect finishing touch. related stories Take a look here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Malaika Arora (@malaikaaroraofficial) Recently, exes Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor reunited at a mutual friend and philanthropist Seema Singh’s daughter Meghna Singh’s engagement ceremony. Malaika turned heads in a red hot saree, elegantly paired with a plunging blouse and statement jewellery, while Arjun looked dapper in a classic black suit. title: 'Ten Years Later, I Still Do': Soha Ali Khan's Anniversary Wish For Kunal Kemmu Screams Love

title: J Hope Represents BTS At French Charity Event, Performs Tracks From Upcoming Album
summary: J Hope was recently invited to perform at the charity event in Paris, where the K-Pop star thrilled the audience by performing not just his solo tracks, but also BTS songs.
full_content: J Hope Represents BTS At French Charity Event, Performs Tracks From Upcoming Album Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 11:36 IST J Hope was recently invited to perform at the charity event in Paris, where the K-Pop star thrilled the audience by performing not just his solo tracks, but also BTS songs. reset Follow us on Google News J Hope will be going on his first ever solo tour, Hope on the Stage from February. (Photo Credits: Instagram) As most of the BTS members, including Suga, RM, Jimin, V and Jungkook, are fulfilling their military services, J Hope is keeping the fans, aka ARMY, entertained with various public appearances. Recently, the K-pop sensation was invited by French First Lady Brigitte Macron to perform at the charity event Le Gala des Pieces Jaunes in Paris. The South Korean star thrilled the audience by performing his solo tracks, such as On the Street from his upcoming special album Hope On The Street and More from his 2022 album Jack In The Box. To everyone’s surprise, the idol also performed BTS’ iconic song MIC Drop, leaving the crowd in awe. J Hope lit up the stage with his powerful vocals and impressive choreography, while the massive crowd sang along, who added energy to the atmosphere. While his hit tracks kept fans entertained, his fashion choices also turned heads. For the performance, the singer wore a stylish brown and black jacket paired with matching brown shorts and black leather gloves. He completed the look with jewellery, enhancing his overall bold and trendy appearance. related stories As per Billboard, J Hope in a statement said, “It’s been such a long time since I performed in Europe, and I’m so happy to have been invited to such a meaningful event. I’ve once again realised how incredible it is to bring hope and comfort to people through music and dance. I’m beyond grateful to ARMY for their unwavering support, and I’d love to return to perform again whenever I get the chance." View this post on Instagram A post shared by BTS INFO (@bts_fabuloso) Earlier this month, J Hope thrilled fans by announcing his first ever solo tour, Hope on the Stage. The tour will kick off with three shows in Seoul, South Korea, on February 28, followed by multiple shows in Brooklyn, Chicago, Mexico City, San Antonio, Oakland, Los Angeles, Manila, Saitama, Singapore, Jakarta, Bangkok, Macau and Taipei. The tour will wrap up in Osaka on May 31 and June 1. View this post on Instagram A post shared by jhope (@uarmyhope) Alongside announcing his solo tour, J Hope also surprised fans by teasing a new music project, which will release in March. The upcoming project will be his first release since completing his military service in October last year. View this post on Instagram A post shared by jhope (@uarmyhope) Other than J Hope, the third edition of Gala des Pieces Jaunes also featured Katy Perry, Gims, John Legend, BLACKPINK’s Rose, Aya Nakamura, J Balvin, G Dragon, Pretty Yende, Burna Boy, Lang Lang and Gautier Capucon. The event included performances by the Lamoureux Orchestra, conducted by Adrien Perruchon and Maxime Pascal. tags : J-Hope korean Korean Entertainment Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 11:32 IST News movies J Hope Represents BTS At French Charity Event, Performs Tracks From Upcoming Album Read More

title: BTS Star J-Hope Spotted With BIGBANG Members; Fans Can’t Keep Calm
summary: Joining J-Hope on stage were fellow global sensations, including BLACKPINK’s Rose, Katy Perry, John Legend and BIGBANG’s iconic members, G-Dragon and Taeyang.

Held on January 23, 2024, at the Paris La Defense Arena, this star-studded event reportedly brought together some of the biggest names in music, both from South Korea and beyond, for a noble cause. Joining J-Hope on stage were fellow global sensations, including BLACKPINK’s Rose, Katy Perry, John Legend and BIGBANG’s iconic members, G-Dragon and Taeyang. The charity gala, also known as the French Charity Gala Show, donates proceeds to the Fondation des Hopitaux, making it a night filled with not just star power but also a meaningful mission. J-Hope kicked off the evening as the opening act, immediately setting the tone with his explosive stage presence. Performing solo hits like On the Street and MORE, alongside the ever-energetic BTS anthem MIC Drop, he left the audience in awe. Though it was just a fleeting moment, the pairing quickly became the talk of social media, with fans thrilled to see two of K-pop’s most prominent figures together. title: Priyanka Chopra And Mahesh Babu REACT To SS Rajamouli's Cryptic Post Hinting At SSMB29: 'Finally...'
summary: SS Rajamouli's SSMB29, starring Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra, is highly anticipated. Rajamouli's Instagram post with a lion named Bob Jr. and an Indian passport caught attention.
full_content: Priyanka Chopra And Mahesh Babu REACT To SS Rajamouli's Cryptic Post Hinting At SSMB29: 'Finally...' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 11:11 IST SS Rajamouli's SSMB29, starring Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra, is highly anticipated. Rajamouli's Instagram post with a lion named Bob Jr. and an Indian passport caught attention. reset Follow us on Google News Priyanka Chopra is in Hyderabad reportedly for the shoot. SS Rajamouli’s upcoming film SSMB29 is highly anticipated. Starring Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra, it promises to be an exciting adventure. Recently, Rajamouli shared a post on Instagram that caught attention. The post featured a picture of a lion named Bob Jr., holding an Indian passport. The photo also showed the lion behind bars, symbolising how the lead actors are now committed to the film. “Captured," he captioned the photo. No sooner had he posted than Priyanka Chopra and Mahesh Babu dropped comments on his post. While the actress wrote, “Finally," Mahesh Babu on the other hand, commented, “Okkasaari commit ayithe naa maata nene vinanu (If I commit once, I will listen to my word)." related stories Mahesh Babu and SS Rajamouli’s highly anticipated film SSMB29 is officially underway. While the spotlight has been on this exciting pairing of Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra, the film promises to bring together a diverse array of talented artists from around the world. However, the full list of cast and crew is yet to be revealed, leaving fans eagerly awaiting more updates. View this post on Instagram A post shared by SS Rajamouli (@ssrajamouli) Meanwhile, Priyanka Chopra is already in Hyderabad for the shoot of the film. Earlier this week, she visited the Chilkur Balaji Temple to seek blessings before beginning this new project. She took to Instagram to drop a series of photos from her darshan. In one of the photos, she is seen conversing with a temple priest. For the visit, Priyanka wore a beautiful turquoise salwar suit, draping her dupatta over her head as a mark of respect. She was also given a red uttariyam, adorned with prints of Lord Venkateswara, a traditional gesture extended to devotees at the temple. In her caption, she expressed gratitude, writing that with the blessings of Sri Balaji, she is starting a new chapter. tags : Mahesh Babu regional cinema SS Rajamouli Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 11:06 IST News movies Priyanka Chopra And Mahesh Babu REACT To SS Rajamouli's Cryptic Post Hinting At SSMB29: 'Finally...' title: Accused In SEVENTEEN Mingyu’s Photo Leak Scandal Walks Free Post Investigation
summary: An employee leaked shirtless pictures of SEVENTEEN member Mingyu in September last year, prompting a police case in the matter.
full_content: Accused In SEVENTEEN Mingyu’s Photo Leak Scandal Walks Free Post Investigation Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:53 IST An employee leaked shirtless pictures of SEVENTEEN member Mingyu in September last year, prompting a police case in the matter. reset Follow us on Google News Mingyu was shooting for a brand commercial when the pictures were clicked. (Photo Credits: Instagram) In September last year, the French luxury brand, L’Occitane, came under fire after one of its employees happened to leak some inappropriate and private pictures of K-pop star Mingyu from SEVENTEEN, stirring legal trouble. While fans at large came out in support of Mingyu, demanding action against the employee in question, the brand ended up issuing an official apology statement at the time. As per reports, the L’Occitane employee secretly took pictures of the SEVENTEEN artist during the brand’s commercial shoot, wherein he was in a shirtless state. Despite an apology from the brand, the employee was suspended from work and even reported to the police over suspicions of secretly filming the artist without consent. After months of police investigation in regard to leaking Mingyu’s inappropriate pictures, the accused has been set free. As per a Koreaboo report, the investigation concluded that leaked pictures did not constitute any naked body without consent, considering that the idol was shirtless for the shoot’s purpose. Additionally, they also determined that there was no illegal filming, as the pictures did not cause Mingyu any “humiliation," adding that the photoshoot was to advertise a certain product. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by 김민규 (@min9yu_k) While SEVENTEEN’s fandom aka CARATs fumed over the artist’s invasion of privacy after the leaked pictures, a section of fans have been now calling out AI-generated pictures of the artist. A couple of AI-generated pictures have been circulating on social media lately, showing him without a shirt which has left fans frustrated. A fan wrote, You ppl are crazy, you’ve seen Mingyu shirtless countless of times yet you will hype up an AI GENERATED image? Do you not know how insane it is to AI generate someone shirtless?" while another added, “Almost 40k likes on an AI-generated pic of Mingyu shirtless and y’all don’t worry about AI and how it’s going to be used against women." “That Mingyu AI shirtless photo is so weird on so many levels. Not to mention so uncomfortable to see too," another comment read. Amid all the discussions, the K-pop artist recently sparked excitement among his fans with his latest appearance, flaunting a sudden hair transformation. Dressed in an all-black ensemble, Mingyu’s dyed blonde hair did not go unnoticed as he appeared at the airport. View this post on Instagram A post shared by 김민규 (@min9yu_k) Later, he even posted pictures of himself with the new hair colour, which left fans wondering whether it was for his future military enlistment or an upcoming music video. On the work front, SEVENTEEN members are now in Singapore for the group’s highly awaited Right Here world tour. tags : K-Pop Seventeen Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 10:53 IST News movies Accused In SEVENTEEN Mingyu’s Photo Leak Scandal Walks Free Post Investigation Read More

title: Saba Pataudi Thanks Fans For Wishing Saif Ali Khan A Speedy Recovery, Says ‘Relaxed After A Long Week’
summary: Saif Ali Khan was attacked on January 16. He was admitted to Lilavati Hospital for the treatment
full_content: Saba Pataudi Thanks Fans For Wishing Saif Ali Khan A Speedy Recovery, Says ‘Relaxed After A Long Week’ Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:20 IST Saif Ali Khan was attacked on January 16. He was admitted to Lilavati Hospital for the treatment reset Follow us on Google News Saba Pataudi shares an update about Saif's health Saif Ali Khan has been discharged from the hospital following the stabbing incident. The actor was stabbed multiple times during a robbery attempt at his residence on January 16. Well, today his sister Saba Pataudi shared an update about his health and thanked all fans for asking about his health. Taking to her Instagram stories, Saba shared a photo of herself with a note reading, “RELAXED AFTER A LONG WEEK! SO MOVED BY THE KIND CONCERN FROM SO MANY PEOPLE WHO CHECKED IN TO KNOW HOW I AM, FROM ALL ACROSS THE WORLD, AND WISHING BHAI A SPEEDY RECOVERY AND THE FAMILY LOVE AND STRENGTH, WITH THEIR SUPPORT. BLESSED N GRATEFUL. THANK YOU!" related stories Take a look here: Recently, Ibrahim Ali Khan was spotted in the city making an exit post-workout. A paparazzo was seen asking him about Saif’s health. The video has gone viral. In the video, shared by Filmygyan, we can see Ibrahim walking towards the car when suddenly the paparazzi surrounded him. He was asked about his father’s health, “Dad ki tabiyat kaisi hai?" On this, he did not reply them and just nodded his head. He did not pose for the media.  Khan was stabbed multiple times in the wee hours of January 16 at his Bandra residence. Later, the police arrested Shariful Islam Shehzad Mohammad Rohilla Amin Fakir (30) alias Vijay Das, a Bangladesh national staying illegally in India, for the incident. Days after Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his Bandra home, sources with the Mumbai Police have said the actor’s statement was recorded late on Thursday night. Sources also said that Saif Ali Khan gave full details of the incident to the police at his residence, narrating the entire sequence of events on how he was stabbed. According to the details, Saif Ali Khan told the police that he held the attacker tight. However, his grip loosened after he stabbed him more than once. “I held the assailant tight, but after he stabbed me again and again in my back, my grip loosened," the actor told the police. “Seeing all this, my family as well as the staff working in the house were scared," the actor added. On the night of the attack, Saif Ali Khan came out after hearing his younger son Jeh’s cries. As soon as he saw the assailant assaulting Jeh’s staff nurse Eliam Philip, Saif jumped on the accused and held him, the Mumbai Police sources said. tags : bollywood kareena kapoor Saba Pataudi Saif ali khan Sara Ali Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 10:20 IST News movies Saba Pataudi Thanks Fans For Wishing Saif Ali Khan A Speedy Recovery, Says ‘Relaxed After A Long Week’ Read More

title: Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 1: Akshay Kumar And Veer Pahariya's Film Mints Rs 11.25 Crore
summary: Sky Force opened with Rs11.25 crore on Friday but dropped to ₹0.81 crore on Saturday, totaling Rs 12.06 crore in two days.
full_content: Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 1: Akshay Kumar And Veer Pahariya's Film Mints Rs 11.25 Crore Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:08 IST Sky Force opened with Rs11.25 crore on Friday but dropped to ₹0.81 crore on Saturday, totaling Rs 12.06 crore in two days. reset Follow us on Google News Sky Force released on January 24. Sky Force had a solid opening on its first day at the box office, earning an estimated ₹11.25 crore (India net) on Friday. The film received a positive response, especially in key regions like Mumbai and Bengaluru, where the evening and night shows had the highest occupancy. The film performed decently across various areas, with the Hindi 2D version contributing significantly to the overall earnings. The total occupancy on Day 1 was highest in Mumbai, followed by Bengaluru, indicating strong interest from the audience in major metropolitan areas. However, the film saw a drop in its collections on Day 2 (Saturday), with the earnings falling to Rs 0.81 crore (India net) as per Sacnilk. This brought the total earnings after two days to Rs 12.06 crore. While Sky Force had a promising start, the dip in Day 2 collections suggests that maintaining consistent audience engagement will be crucial for its box office longevity. related stories On Day 1, the occupancy in regions like Mumbai was at 26.75%, with the evening and night shows leading the charge. Other regions like NCR and Bengaluru also saw moderate occupancy, indicating that the film managed to attract a broad audience. The film delves into A B Devayya’s unyielding spirit and pivotal role in one of history’s most significant conflicts. Directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani and produced by Dinesh Vijan, Jyoti Deshpande, and Amar Kaushik, Sky Force is set to release in theatres on January 24, 2025. Produced by Jio Studios and Maddock Films, Sky Force releases in theatres this Republic Week on January 24, 2025 News18 Showsha gave it 4 stars. An excerpt from the review read, “The aerial saga is a true Republic Day treat and it deserves a watch for its execution and treatment. It packs a punch without trying too hard and sets a precedent for a modern-day patriotic film where friendship and loyalty take a precedence over politics and ultra-nationalism." tags : Akshay Kumar bollywood veer pahariya Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 10:08 IST News movies Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 1: Akshay Kumar And Veer Pahariya's Film Mints Rs 11.25 Crore Read More

title: Kim Soo-hyun Responds To Fan Urging Him To Marry Queen Of Tears Co-Star Kim Ji-won
summary: Kim Soo-hyun recently broke his silence about dating rumours with Kim Ji-won after a fan encouraged him to make his relationship public and even get married.
full_content: Kim Soo-hyun Responds To Fan Urging Him To Marry Queen Of Tears Co-Star Kim Ji-won Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:03 IST Kim Soo-hyun recently broke his silence about dating rumours with Kim Ji-won after a fan encouraged him to make his relationship public and even get married. reset Follow us on Google News Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Ji-won impressed fans with their chemistry in Queen of Tears. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Queen of Tears quickly captured hearts and gained recognition at major award shows in South Korea. While the intriguing plot kept viewers engaged, it was the perfect chemistry between Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Ji-won that stole the spotlight. Fans couldn’t help but wonder if the two had something more than just on screen magic and wished for them to be a real life couple. Although the two have never given importance to the speculations, Soo-hyun recently responded after a fan encouraged him to make his relationship with Ji-won public and even get married. Putting an end to the dating rumours, Kim Soo-hyun simply reminded the person to “watch dramas as dramas." Taking to the Bubble app, a fan asked, “Please marry Ji-won quickly and post lovestagrams online. Make your relationship public and show us more that you guys are together. Please announce to everyone that you only have each other and that you love each other so much. Hurry and sign the marriage certificate and make Ji Won yours. Please get married. Kim Soo-hyun’s wife, Kim Ji-won, and Kim Ji-won’s husband, Kim Soo-hyun." Responding to the fan’s query, Kim Soo-hyun stated, “Please watch dramas as dramas." related stories This isn’t the first time Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Ji-won’s relationship has come into the limelight. Last year, dating rumours resurfaced after a deleted post by Soo-hyun went viral. The actor shared several photos on Instagram, but fans quickly noticed similarities in their posts. Both were dressed in matching all black outfits and posed in a similar way, leading many to believe they were sharing a Lovestagram. Just as the dating gossip started escalating, Soo-hyun sparked even more confusion by deleting the photos, leaving fans puzzled about the real story. dad is living up to his words from 12 years ago. y'know dad is the type to say and declare his love publicly. not him suddenly and subtly making a way to publicize and and talk about it. 🤭🤭🤭 #SooWon #KimSooHyun #KimJiWon pic.twitter.com/f1FbmpVs5a — To: Baileyboo | my momma's beshie is Taengoo 💜✨ (@goodboii_bailey) July 1, 2024 According to Sports Donga, during the time, Kim Soo-hyun’s agency, GOLD MEDALIST, dismissed the claims, mentioning that it was a “forced Lovestagram" and chose not to elaborate further. Meanwhile, Kim Ji-won’s agency, High Zium, stated that they would not respond to such speculations. Queen of Tears revolves around Hong Hae-in played by Kim Ji Won, a third generation leader of the Queens Group, and Kim Soo-hyun’s character Baek Hyun-woo, the son of a village chief. The story explores a challenging phase in their relationship and how they fall in love all over again. The series also features Park Sung-hoon, Kwak Dong-yeon and Lee Ju-bin. tags : entertainment K-Pop Korean Drama Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 10:03 IST News movies Kim Soo-hyun Responds To Fan Urging Him To Marry Queen Of Tears Co-Star Kim Ji-won Read More

title: Ram Gopal Varma Recalls Sascha Sippy’s Sholay Remake Idea: ‘Gabbar Singh And Helen’s Character Have Sex…’
summary: Sascha Sippy proposed a Sholay sequel featuring Jackie Chan and a storyline involving Gabbar Singh's son. Ram Gopal Varma dismissed the idea and instead created RGV Ki Aag, a Sholay remake.
full_content: Ram Gopal Varma Recalls Sascha Sippy’s Sholay Remake Idea: ‘Gabbar Singh And Helen’s Character Have Sex…’ Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 09:41 IST Sascha Sippy proposed a Sholay sequel featuring Jackie Chan and a storyline involving Gabbar Singh's son. Ram Gopal Varma dismissed the idea and instead created RGV Ki Aag, a Sholay remake. reset Follow us on Google News Sholay is a 1975 film directed by Ramesh Sippy. Sholay is undeniably one of the most iconic films in Indian cinema, with a legacy that still cements its place as a cinematic masterpiece. Directed by Ramesh Sippy, the film never had an official sequel. However, Sippy’s nephew, Sascha Sippy, once proposed the idea of creating one. His ambitious plan included casting Jackie Chan in a key role. At the time, Sascha was embroiled in a legal dispute with other members of the Sippy family over the film’s rights. In an interview with Galatta India, Ram Gopal Varma revealed that Sascha had approached him to direct the sequel. When RGV questioned the feasibility of a sequel, considering some characters and actors were no longer alive, Sascha pitched a “grand plan." However, RGV quickly dismissed the idea and instead went on to create RGV Ki Aag, a remake of Sholay. related stories Ram Gopal Varma remembered Sascha Sippy’s idea for a Sholay sequel. Sascha suggested that after the ‘Mehbooba’ song, Gabbar Singh and Helen’s character had a son. “He said Gabbar Singh and Helen (her character did not have a name in the film) have sex after ‘Mehbooba’ song and they give birth to Junior Gabbar. Hema Malini (Basanti) and Dharmendra (Veeru) go away and now hey have two grown-up children. Now, Dharmendra and Hema come to meet Jaya (Radha). There, they are kidnapped by Junior Gabbar. And then their sons come to rescue them. This is broadly the story he told me." RGV recalled Sascha Sippy’s idea and said, “And then he told me we also have a character of Jackie Chan. I thought he was joking. He said but Jackie Chan is the biggest brand in China, Hong Kong. Sholay is the biggest brand in India so we can capture all the markets. That was his grand plan. This is the proposal they gave me and I said no." tags : bollywood Ram Gopal Varma Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 09:41 IST News movies Ram Gopal Varma Recalls Sascha Sippy’s Sholay Remake Idea: ‘Gabbar Singh And Helen’s Character Have Sex…’ Read More

In the past, Shah Rukh Khan has been avoiding showing his face and always hides it in a hoodie. Main toh nahi jaanta because I’m not working for him anymore. So, unka internally kya wajah hai, kyu kar rahe hain, that’s his call. I have no idea." title: BTS ARMY Call Out Event Organisers For Being 'Biased And Disrespectful' Towards J-Hope
summary: BTS star J-Hope was one of the performers at the Le Gala des Pieces Jaunes charity concert.
full_content: BTS ARMY Call Out Event Organisers For Being 'Biased And Disrespectful' Towards J-Hope Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:31 IST BTS star J-Hope was one of the performers at the Le Gala des Pieces Jaunes charity concert. reset Follow us on Google News J-Hope opened the musical concert with hit tracks. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The Le Gala des Pieces Jaunes charity concert was recently held at the Paris La Defense Arena, drawing likes of popular K-pop artists like BTS star J-Hope, BIGBANG’s G-Dragon and Taeyang, and even BLACKPINK diva Rose . J-Hope, who has been recently busy with his work commitments following his discharge from the military, also marked his first live stage performance at the event, leaving the audiences enthralled. The K-pop idol opened the charity gala with a three-song set of his solo and group hits, including On the Street from 2024’s Hope on the Street Vol. 1 mini-LP and More from his debut solo album, Jack in the Box. Despite J-Hope’s thrilling appearance at the Le Gala des Pieces Jaunes, a section of fans called out the event organisers for being disrespectful towards the artist and the ARMY. Many pointed out an unsettling pattern of the singer being left out of some key moments, like avoiding his name during performance rundowns and even remaining ignorant toward the BTS fans. related stories #jhope slays at the Gala Des Pieces Jaunes performing #MICDROP ! ??????❤️‍? #jhope_at_GalaDesPiècesJaunes pic.twitter.com/UgJC8yxBun — World Music Awards (@WORLDMUSICAWARD) January 23, 2025 The ARMY concluded that the actions were not just a small oversight but rather intentional, leaving them upset and angry. Fans took to social media platforms and slammed the event for biased behaviour. A fan wrote, “The host on TikTok live is so biased. She’s supposed to interview fans but went straight to 3 GD fans and then went to a bunch of fans without lightsticks, and when they screamed, J-Hope left straight to the one with BP lightsticks… She seems pissed when fans claim J-Hope," pointing out the stark difference between the treatment toward fans. Another added, “The amount of disrespect they are giving to J-Hope and ARMY is insane. They intentionally skip mentioning his name and don’t interview ARMYs with lightsticks, which is obviously the majority of the crowd. Are you going to piss me off right now?" A fan also shared a detailed post, chalking the number of disturbing instances toward J-Hope, BTS music and his fandom. The user even accused the event host of remaining biased towards BLACKPINK singer Rose. I don't speak the french to confirm or judge certain things. Turning the gala into JHOPE/BTS concert. ?? #Jhope_at_GalaDesPiecesJaunes @BTS_twt pic.twitter.com/R0Btpm8pZ4 — FrannLovesBTS ⁷? ²⁰²⁵??? ???? (@Frances39411513) January 23, 2025 A fundraising event, which aims to support hospitalised children and teenagers, is organised by the Operation Pieces Jaunes Foundation. title: When Kareena Kapoor Said Saif Ali Khan Was Too 'English' To Make A Move On Her: 'I Pushed The Right Buttons...'
summary: Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor's romance began on the sets of Tashan in 2008. They married in 2012 and have two sons. Recently, Saif was injured in a home robbery.
full_content: When Kareena Kapoor Said Saif Ali Khan Was Too 'English' To Make A Move On Her: 'I Pushed The Right Buttons...' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 08:43 IST Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor's romance began on the sets of Tashan in 2008. They married in 2012 and have two sons. Recently, Saif was injured in a home robbery. reset Follow us on Google News Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan got married in 2012. Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor’s love story is one of Bollywood’s most-celebrated romances. The couple first crossed paths on the sets of Tashan in 2008, a time when Kareena was still in a relationship with Shahid Kapoor. According to reports, while filming, Kareena and Saif grew close, eventually leading to the end of her relationship with Shahid. In a old chat with Niranjan Iyer, Kareena opened up on how she made the first move because Saif was ‘restrained’. She had said, “I was the one who kind of pushed all the right buttons. Saif actually is the kind of guy who is not very forthcoming towards any woman. He will never make the first move. He is too English and restrained in that way. And plus, when I made the first move, he was like, ‘I can’t believe that Kareena Kapoor is doing this’. He was like, ‘why?’ I mean, it was like an entire building had crumbled on his head. So I don’t know what he meant by that, whether he thought he was very lucky or what. But well, eventually it all worked out. And I think it was, I was responsible for it." related stories After a few years of dating, they tied the knot on October 16, 2012. The couple is now proud parents to two sons—Taimur Ali Khan, born in 2016, and Jehangir Ali Khan, born in 2021. Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Incident Meanwhile, Saif Ali Khan, who sustained multiple injuries during a robbery incident at his residence, is finally back home after being discharged from hospital. The actor received a warm welcome from Kareena Kapoor and family. Saif Ali Khan was stabbed by an intruder at his Mumbai residence in the wee hours of January 16. It was reported that at around 2 AM, the actor heard noises when one of his female employees was attacked in Jeh’s room. This prompted Saif to intervene, which led to an altercation between the two and the attacker injured both Saif and the female employee. The Bollywood star was stabbed six times by the robber following which he was rushed to the hospital. tags : kareena kapoor Saif ali khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 08:43 IST News movies When Kareena Kapoor Said Saif Ali Khan Was Too 'English' To Make A Move On Her: 'I Pushed The Right Buttons...' title: Kajol’s Throwback Photo Of Anjali’s Bridal Look From Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Goes Viral, Fans React
summary: In 2024, the film completed 26 years. Taking to his Instagram handle, Karan Johar had shared a video in which we can see different scenes
full_content: Kajol’s Throwback Photo Of Anjali’s Bridal Look From Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Goes Viral, Fans React Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 08:33 IST In 2024, the film completed 26 years. Taking to his Instagram handle, Karan Johar had shared a video in which we can see different scenes reset Follow us on Google News Kajol shares new throwback photo Kajol is one of the most versatile actresses and has created a niche for herself through powerful roles. Recently she treated her fans by sharing a nostalgic throwback photo of herself as Anjali from the iconic movie Kuch Kuch Hota Hai . The image, featuring her bridal look from the film, instantly went viral, sparking a wave of excitement and fond memories among fans on social media. Taking to her Instagram handle, Kajol shared a bridal look from the film and wrote, “Is it bridal season still? Hey I got married onscreen quite a few times and ditched as well! Which did I do more of??" One of the fans wrote, “Good old days of Bollywood". Another wrote, “U know this poster i have pasted 4 places in my study room, one day i have beaten by my father but i naver remove ur this poster." related stories Take a look here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kajol Devgan (@kajol) In 2024, the film completed 26 years. Taking to his Instagram handle, Karan Johar shared a video in which we can see different scenes and how he is seen explaining to the actors. “Of cool neck chains, neon shirts, pink head bands, summer camp with only dancing involved, wishing on toota taaras, cheating in basketball, dosti that turns into pyaar and characters that live through time and beyond!! To my first film as a director. To the best cast & crew on set. To taking that feeling of day one and keeping it alive….26 years later!," read the caption. Kuch Kuch Hota Hai became a massive success, both at the box office and in terms of its music. The film went on to achieve cult status, and its soundtrack sold eight million copies in India, becoming the best-selling Bollywood album of the year. The film also stars Salman Khan. On the work front, Kajol was last seen in Do Patti with Kriti Sanon. The film was released on OTT and received positive response. She will be seen in Sarzameen in which Saif Ali Khan’s son Ibrahim Ali Khan is also making debut. Kajol will be soon seen in Maharagni – Queen of Queens,’ with Prabhu Deva. This action-packed thriller marks the long-awaited reunion of these actors after nearly three decades since their collaboration in Rajiv Menon’s ‘Minsaara Kanavu’ (1997). tags : bollywood Kajol Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Rani Mukerji Shah Rukh Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 08:33 IST News movies Kajol’s Throwback Photo Of Anjali’s Bridal Look From Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Goes Viral, Fans React Read More

title: Khushi Kapoor Makes BIG Confession Amid Vedang Raina Dating Rumours: 'I Have Not Been...'
summary: Khushi Kapoor, debuting in Loveyapa with Junaid Khan, revealed she has never been proposed to, despite dating rumors with Vedang Raina. Loveyapa releases on February 7, 2025.
full_content: Khushi Kapoor Makes BIG Confession Amid Vedang Raina Dating Rumours: 'I Have Not Been...' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 15:39 IST Khushi Kapoor, debuting in Loveyapa with Junaid Khan, revealed she has never been proposed to, despite dating rumors with Vedang Raina. Loveyapa releases on February 7, 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Khushi Kapoor is rumoured to be dating Vedang Raina. Khushi Kapoor, gearing up for her debut in Loveyapa opposite Junaid Khan, recently revealed an unexpected detail about her love life. Rumoured to be dating Vedang Raina, the actress admitted she has never been proposed to, leaving fans curious. During a rapid-fire interview with Connect Cine, Khushi was asked which romantic moment she’d like to capture on her phone. She replied, “Not necessarily, but if I had to choose one thing, then I think I would say a proposal." When asked if any past proposal had left an impact on her, she candidly confessed, “I have not been proposed to yet." Khushi Kapoor is rumoured to be dating her ‘The Archies’ co-star Vedang Raina. Khushi and Vedang have been spotted together on numerous occasions. Recently, Vedang was seen at Khushi’s pyjama birthday party, which was attended by her best friends. He was seen posing along with Boney Kapoor, Khushi, and her girl squad. Khushi and Vedang often make headlines for their rumoured relationship, however, neither of them has confirmed or acknowledged it. related stories Khushi Kapoor and Vedang Raina starred together in Zoya Akhtar’s musical romantic-comedy ‘The Archies’. This film marked their acting debut. While Khushi played the role of Betty Cooper, Vedang was seen as Reggie Mantle in the film. Khushi Kapoor will be next seen in Loveyapa, co-starring Aamir Khan’s son, Junaid Khan. It is a fresh take on Gen-Z relationships, blending romance with comedy. The plot revolves around a humorous challenge set by the lead characters’ parents, where Gaurav and Baani must exchange their phones for a day to prove their trust before deciding to marry. In addition to Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. tags : bollywood khushi kapoor Vedang Raina Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 08:07 IST News movies Khushi Kapoor Makes BIG Confession Amid Vedang Raina Dating Rumours: 'I Have Not Been...' The first two seasons were instant hits, offering viewers a peek into the extravagant and sometimes chaotic lives of Bollywood wives. title: Aamir Khan's Son Junaid Khan Says Shooting For Loveyapa 'More Intense' Than Maharaj: 'They Are Worlds Apart'
summary: Junaid Khan, son of Aamir Khan, will debut in Loveyapa, a romantic comedy with Khushi Kapoor. Directed by Advait Chandan, it releases on February 7, 2025.
full_content: Aamir Khan's Son Junaid Khan Says Shooting For Loveyapa 'More Intense' Than Maharaj: 'They Are Worlds Apart' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 07:31 IST Junaid Khan, son of Aamir Khan, will debut in Loveyapa, a romantic comedy with Khushi Kapoor. Directed by Advait Chandan, it releases on February 7, 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Loveyapa will release on February 7. Junaid Khan, son of Bollywood superstar Aamir Khan, is gearing up for his theatrical debut with Loveyapa, a romantic comedy featuring Sridevi and Boney Kapoor’s daughter, Khushi Kapoor, as his co-star. In a recent interview, Junaid shared insights on the key differences between his OTT debut Maharaj and his upcoming film Loveyapa. “They are worlds apart. Even how the films were made," he said. Talking about the stark difference between his previous work and his theatrical debut, Junaid added, “I actually found the experience of shooting Loveyapa more intense." related stories Junaid shared that the energetic atmosphere on the Loveyapa sets was due to its young team. The crew included a first-time Director of Photography (DOP) and Production Designer, with Phantom Films making a comeback after a long break. “We had a very young crew with a first-time DOP, first-time Production Designer, and Phantom Films. That brought a lot of energy and enthusiasm on set," he said. Loveyapa is a fresh take on Gen-Z relationships, blending romance with comedy. The plot revolves around a humorous challenge set by the lead characters’ parents, where Gaurav and Baani must exchange their phones for a day to prove their trust before deciding to marry. In addition to Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. Before the upcoming rom-com, Khushi was seen in The Archies, co-starring Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda, Vedang Raina and a few others. The film, directed by Zoya Akhtar, was released on Netflix and earned mixed responses from the audience. As for Junaid, Aamir Khan’s son was last seen in Maharaj alongside Shalini Pandey, Jaideep Ahlawat and Sharvari. tags : aamir khan bollywood Junaid Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 07:31 IST News movies Aamir Khan's Son Junaid Khan Says Shooting For Loveyapa 'More Intense' Than Maharaj: 'They Are Worlds Apart' Read More

title: Vinta Nanda Reacts To Credit War, Criticises Oscars: 'Priyanka, Guneet Didn't Even Partake In Making Anuja’ | Exclusive
summary: Vinta Nanda feels Anuja's Oscar nod may be 'biased' and adds Priyanka Chopra and Guneet Monga are part of Oscars 'flawed system'.
full_content: Vinta Nanda Reacts To Credit War, Criticises Oscars: 'Priyanka, Guneet Didn't Even Partake In Making Anuja’ | Exclusive Reported By : Titas Chowdhury News18.com Edited By: Shrishti Negi Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 04:50 IST Vinta Nanda feels Anuja's Oscar nod may be 'biased' and adds Priyanka Chopra and Guneet Monga are part of Oscars 'flawed system'. reset Follow us on Google News Guneet Monga and Priyanka Chopra serve as producer and executive producer on Anuja. On Friday, television producer Vinta Nanda took to social media and called out the Oscars’ system of nominating films. Without name-dropping, she wrote, “Systems are so flawed now. Curators walk away with the Oscar nominations and awards as producers and the struggle of the artists and their producers is completely eclipsed. What kind of a world are we living in?" The post met with a lot of attention, including filmmaker-actor Ananth Mahadevan, who pointed fingers at ‘influential ones’ with ‘connections/networking’. Through her post, Vinta took a jibe at Anuja, which secured a nomination for Best Live Action Short at the 97th Academy Awards. Speaking exclusively to News18 Showsha, Vinta says, “The producers of Anuja are featured nowhere near Guneet Monga (Kapoor) and Priyanka Chopra (Jonas). Theirs are the first two names featured in the list of producers. I’m sure Anuja is a brilliant film much like The Elephant Whisperers. But it’s becoming a norm year after year that after a film gets made, well-recognisable names with great network suddenly come and become producers." related stories She further adds, “What they’re actually doing is curating and becoming part and parcel of the profits and business of the film. Technically, they aren’t the producers. They shouldn’t be going up on the stage and collecting those awards. People involved with marketing, taking the film from the producers – after it’s ready – to festivals and lobbying, get credit for the film, which they haven’t even partaken in. They should be making sure that the team that has actually produced the film takes the honour." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Vinta Nanda (@vintananda) However, she isn’t the one to be blaming Guneet or Priyanka. “No offense to them because they’re brilliant in their own right and have done stellar work in their lives. They’re part of a system that’s so flawed. Why should festivals be seeking their approval? They think the media won’t give them coverage if a Priyanka Chopra doesn’t come on top of the product? I’ve put my post questioning this. What’s happening in the bargain is that real writers, directors and producers don’t come in notice," Vinta states. She further points out that Anuja’s Oscars nod and Guneet’s induction into the Academy is a ‘conflict of interest’. She opines, “The Oscars share a symbiotic relationship with Guneet. She has done some great work and she has brought home the Oscars. Even for The Elephant Whisperers, she only came into it at the editing stage. She didn’t have anything to do with it till the first cut was already ready. She was able to bridge the gap between the filmmaker and the Oscars." Vinta continues, “What the Oscars organisers and Guneet need to introspect is, if this is a good thing that they’re doing. What if certain films don’t come to Guneet’s notice? A producer already making films may not be the right conduit because there may be biases there. I’m sure she or Priyanka isn’t biased and is very fair but it’s not the right way to go. As it is, the lesser names are where the material is because they’re the ones to be actually making a film." At the same time, Vinta reiterates how this process often ‘puts too much responsibility’ on people like Guneet and Priyanka. “Awards, festivals and funders need to find the right talent. There must be 20-30 other good films in the market, which they don’t even know exist. They can’t say that Guneet likes a film and so, I also like it. It’s an unhealthy kind of a space we’re getting into and it’s going to be a harmful and unhealthy ecosystem for creative storytellers to exist. The pressure is going to be so much. It’s so oppressive already," she exclaims. tags : bollywood guneet monga Oscars priyanka chopra Showsha Exclusives Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 04:50 IST News movies Vinta Nanda Reacts To Credit War, Criticises Oscars: 'Priyanka, Guneet Didn't Even Partake In Making Anuja’ | Exclusive Read More

title: Actor Sahiba Bali Recalls 'Horrible' Things Said About Her: 'I Use People For Success' | Exclusive
summary: Sahiba Bali says women 'bear the brunt' of link-up rumours. She adds being 'mansplained' by viewers for being a cricket presenter.
full_content: Actor Sahiba Bali Recalls 'Horrible' Things Said About Her: 'I Use People For Success' | Exclusive Reported By : Titas Chowdhury News18.com Edited By: Shrishti Negi Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 04:21 IST Sahiba Bali says women 'bear the brunt' of link-up rumours. She adds being 'mansplained' by viewers for being a cricket presenter. reset Follow us on Google News Sahiba Bali recently confessed having a crush on Pat Cummins. Over the years, Sahiba Bali has become a popular name in the fields of acting, cricket presenting, influencing and content creation. And along with fame and success has come brutal trolling. Often, she has also been linked up with her contemporaries like stand-up comics Kullu aka Aaditya Kulshrestha and Samay Raina. In an exclusive chat with News18 Showsha, she sets the record straight and reflects, “People think I’m married with a child also. I think this happens because I’m not married. This happens to a lot of women who’re single and works with peers, who’re mostly men." So, how does she deal with link-up rumours? “I’ve been linked with comedians, cricketers and actors, and when I read such reports, I always find it funny. It never bothers me. Only if they knew what our relationship is like! What I do is take screenshots and send them ahead to the person I’ve been linked with. Half of those boys are either like my brothers or share a super platonic relationship with me. They’re people with who I cannot have a relationship with," Sahiba states. related stories However, there’s one thing that bogs her down. “What bothers me is when they say that I’m working or hanging out with a person because I want to be with them, and that’s really unfair. Some people I’ve been linked with has also spoken out about how it’s the woman in the equation who always gets targeted. What people say about me, they won’t ever say about the guy and that hurts. The meanest thing I’ve heard about myself is that I use people and that’s why I’m successful. Such a horrible thing to say!" Sahiba further adds, “I may have more followers than them and have worked more but I still bear the brunt. But as long as those around me and I know my truth, it’s fine. Moments like these remind me of what I used to hear while growing up that even bad PR is PR. So, when people talk about me or my personal life, I tell myself that they’re at least interested in me, so it’s good." A while back, India’s Got Latent’s Kullu, who also happens to be Sahiba’s frequent collaborator, took to social media to call out trolls attacking Sahiba for ‘using’ him for views and engagement. As Sahiba discusses the flipside of popularity, she also emphasises on what it means to be navigating a male-dominated space. “I haven’t been mansplained by the men I’m working with but by my viewers. Being a woman in cricket brings with it a lot of questions. Main technical baatein karti nahi hoon ki kab off-spinner ko aana hai, kab fast bowler ko aana chahiye ya ball off-side jaa rahi hai because I know that I don’t have that kind of credibility. But they don’t understand that I’m not a commentator or an analyst," the Laila Majnu and Amar Singh Chamkila actor remarks. tags : bollywood Showsha Exclusives Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 04:21 IST News movies Actor Sahiba Bali Recalls 'Horrible' Things Said About Her: 'I Use People For Success' | Exclusive Read More

title: Jennifer Aniston, Barack Obama 'Obsessed With Each Other': Shocking Magazine Cover Claim Resurfaces
summary: A magazine cover and recent events have reignited wild affair rumours linking Jennifer Aniston and Barack Obama.
full_content: Jennifer Aniston, Barack Obama 'Obsessed With Each Other': Shocking Magazine Cover Claim Resurfaces Curated By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 03:03 IST A magazine cover and recent events have reignited wild affair rumours linking Jennifer Aniston and Barack Obama. reset Follow us on Google News Jennifer Aniston and Barack Obama affair rumours take the internet by storm. Speculation surrounding Jennifer Aniston and Barack Obama’s alleged romantic affair has resurfaced, months after it first grabbed headlines. While there is no credible evidence that Obama and his wife, Michelle Obama , are facing marital issues, rumours continue to circulate online. How Did The Rumours Begin? related stories The affair rumours started in August 2024, when InTouch magazine published a cover story with the eye-catching headline, “The Truth About Jen & Barack!" The cover suggested that Michelle Obama felt “betrayed" and alleged that Barack Obama and Jennifer Aniston were “obsessed with each other." Magazine’s Provocative Headline The tabloid’s front page drew attention with its bold claims, including sub-headers like “MICHELLE BETRAYED AS ANISTON STEALS HER HUSBAND’S ATTENTION." Another sub-header insisted the two were “obsessed with each other," further fuelling speculation. Jimmy Kimmel holds InTouch magazine cover on his show. (Courtesy: YouTube) Inside the issue, the magazine quoted an anonymous source claiming that Aniston and Obama had been spending more time together. “With the election coming up in November, Jen has gotten very political, so sheʼs found herself in Barackʼs world a lot lately," the source claimed. “Heʼs gone Hollywood, so heʼs now in Jenʼs world. He has production deals going [with Netflix]. They have found they have a lot in common — and are talking more and more." Jennifer Aniston Responds to the Speculation Jennifer Aniston addressed the rumours during an October appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live! When Kimmel held up the InTouch cover, Aniston laughed off the allegations. “Of all the calls you get from your publicist where you’re just like, Oh no, what’s it gonna be," she said, “and then it’s that… I was not mad." Jennifer Anniston had spoken about Barack Obama and Michelle Obama in the late night show with Jimmy Kimmel pic.twitter.com/ICPqWdX7lz — Movie Loverr (@LoverrofMovies) January 24, 2025 The Friends star dismissed the claims as “absolutely untrue," revealing she has only met Obama once. “I know Michelle more than him," she quipped. Meanwhile, Obama has remained silent on the matter and has not issued any statements regarding the rumours. Why Are the Rumours Back? The gossip has resurfaced following Michelle Obama’s noticeable absence at two recent public events—Jimmy Carter’s funeral and Donald Trump’s inauguration. Despite Barack Obama sharing a heartfelt message for Michelle’s birthday on January 17, speculation about their relationship continues. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Barack Obama (@barackobama) A recent Daily Mail headline fuelled speculation, reading, “Obama Arrives to D.C. Restaurant Alone on Inauguration Eve Amid Wild Rumours About Jennifer Aniston After Michelle No-Show." While there is no concrete evidence to support the claims, the rumours surrounding Aniston and Obama continue to thrive in the gossip mill. tags : barack obama hollywood jennifer aniston Michelle Obama Location : Los Angeles, United States of America (USA) First Published: January 25, 2025, 02:47 IST News movies Jennifer Aniston, Barack Obama 'Obsessed With Each Other': Shocking Magazine Cover Claim Resurfaces Read More

title: Grammys 2025: Sabrina Carpenter, Billie Eilish, Shakira Among Star-Studded Performers
summary: Hosted by Trevor Noah for the fifth consecutive year, the 2025 Grammys aim to support wildfire relief efforts in Los Angeles.
full_content: Grammys 2025: Sabrina Carpenter, Billie Eilish, Shakira Among Star-Studded Performers Curated By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 01:50 IST Hosted by Trevor Noah for the fifth consecutive year, the 2025 Grammys aim to support wildfire relief efforts in Los Angeles. reset Follow us on Google News Billie Eilish, Shakira and Sabrina Carpenter to perform at the 2025 Grammys. On Friday, January 24, the Recording Academy announced a stellar lineup of performers for the 2025 Grammy Awards. Nominees Benson Boone, Billie Eilish, Chappell Roan, Charli XCX, Doechii, RAYE, Sabrina Carpenter, Shakira, and Teddy Swims are set to take the stage at this year’s ceremony. The list features a mix of first-time nominees, best new artist contenders, and seasoned Grammy winners, including artists who shaped the iconic brat summer of 2024. related stories Boone, 22, is nominated for best new artist, propelled by his viral hit “Beautiful Things," one of Spotify’s most-streamed songs last year. Eilish, 23, who has already amassed nine Grammy wins, is nominated in seven categories this year, including record of the year, album of the year, and song of the year. First-time nominee Roan, 26, has earned six nods, including album of the year and best new artist. She previously joked about making a “controversial" statement if she wins. Charli XCX, 32, a major force in the pop and electronic scene, secured eight nominations, including best dance/electronic album and best music video for her acclaimed album Brat. Doechii, 26, is celebrating her first Grammy nods with nominations in three categories, including best new artist and best rap performance for her track “NISSAN ALTIMA." RAYE, 27, is in the running for best new artist and songwriter of the year, non-classical, marking a significant milestone in her career. Carpenter, whose song “Espresso" became a global sensation, received six nominations, including record of the year and best new artist, marking her debut as a Grammy contender. Shakira, 47, a three-time Grammy winner, is nominated for best Latin pop album. The ceremony, coinciding with her birthday, will be a double celebration for the music icon. Swims, 32, earned his first Grammy nomination for best new artist, following the massive success of his singles like “Lose Control" and “The Door." title: Kudumbasthan Review: A Middling Comedy That Struggles To Balance Humour And Emotion
summary: Kudumbasthan Movie Review: The film fails to deliver the laugh riot it aspires to be, often resembling a series of YouTube sketches stitched together.
full_content: Kudumbasthan Review: A Middling Comedy That Struggles To Balance Humour And Emotion Written By : Kirubhakar Purushothaman News18.com Edited By: Shrishti Negi Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 01:08 IST Kudumbasthan Movie Review: The film fails to deliver the laugh riot it aspires to be, often resembling a series of YouTube sketches stitched together. reset Follow us on Google News Kudumbasthan is a Tamil-language comedy drama film directed by Rajeshwar Kalisamy. Kudumbasthan U 2.5 /5 24 January 2025 | Tamil 2 hrs 35 mins | Comedy, Drama Starring: Manikandan, Saanve Megghana, Guru Somasundaram Director: Rajeshwar Kalisamy Watch Trailer Kudumbasthan Movie Review: Kudumbasthan’s premise taps into an evergreen theme in Tamil cinema, which is the struggles of a middle-class protagonist trying to make ends meet. The film’s title itself evokes memories of classics from filmmakers like Bhagyaraj, Visu, and actor Saravanan, who have explored similar themes in their comedy dramas across generations. The story revolves around Naveen (Manikandan), a typical middle-class youngster from a small town in Coimbatore, who is newly married to Vennila (Saanve Megghana). Naveen works as a designer at a local marketing company, earning just enough to sustain their modest life. Meanwhile, Vennila prepares for the UPSC exams while managing household responsibilities and battling caste-based discrimination from her mother-in-law. Their lives take a turn when Naveen, in a moment of self-respect, slaps a client and loses his job. What follows is a downward spiral of financial struggles, debt, and deception, with no apparent way out. related stories Debutant director Rajeshwar Kalisamy, known for his work with the popular YouTube channel Nakkalites, brings his signature comedic style and familiar faces from the channel to the big screen. However, the transition yields mixed results. While the comedy segments occasionally land well, Kudumbasthan fails to deliver the laugh riot it aspires to be, often resembling a series of YouTube sketches stitched together rather than a cohesive narrative. The film unfolds in disconnected segments—starting with Naveen and Vennila’s marriage against their families’ wishes, moving on to Naveen’s conflicts with his brother-in-law Rajendran (Guru Somasundaram), a chaotic wedding anniversary celebration for Naveen’s parents and his misadventures in real estate. Each segment feels like a standalone skit, lacking seamless flow and emotional depth. When the humour works, it does so effectively, but the success rate is inconsistent. The film constantly strives for laughs in every scene, often at the expense of emotional beats that needed space to resonate. Even during the climax, the makers introduce parallel comedic tracks that undercut the film’s emotional weight. Additionally, Kudumbasthan struggles with tonal consistency – one moment portraying moneylenders as menacing villains, and the next reducing them to caricatures. A fatherly boss is turned into a clown with a slap, only to be redeemed via a phone call. Ultimately, Kudumbasthan sacrifices narrative coherence for humour at every opportunity. The film attempts to balance comedy with serious themes like caste discrimination but handles them with an uneven, lighthearted approach. It wants viewers to empathise with Naveen’s plight while simultaneously mocking him, making it difficult to stay emotionally invested. While such an approach might work for short online sketches, as a full-length feature, Kudumbasthan needed to take itself more seriously because comedy, after all, is serious business. tags : Movie Reviews regional cinema Location : Chennai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 01:08 IST News movies Kudumbasthan Review: A Middling Comedy That Struggles To Balance Humour And Emotion Read More

title: Jennifer Aniston 'Liked' Barack Obama's Wedding Anniversary Post For Wife Michelle Obama Last Year
summary: Barack Obama's anniversary post featured a sweet photo of the couple hugging at a museum in New York.
full_content: Jennifer Aniston 'Liked' Barack Obama's Wedding Anniversary Post For Wife Michelle Obama Last Year Curated By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 00:42 IST Barack Obama's anniversary post featured a sweet photo of the couple hugging at a museum in New York. reset Follow us on Google News Jennifer Aniston's affair rumours with Barack Obama resurface. Jennifer Aniston has been following Barack and Michelle Obama on Instagram for years, and the Friends star has ‘liked’ nearly all of their romantic posts celebrating each other. Most recently, Aniston hit the like button on Barack Obama’s 32nd wedding anniversary post dedicated to Michelle Obama . She also liked Michelle’s heartfelt post for Barack, shared on October 23, 2024. Barack’s anniversary post featured a sweet photo of the couple hugging at a museum in New York. “I couldn’t have asked for a better partner and friend to go through life with," he captioned the image. Michelle shared the same picture on her account, writing, “32 action-packed years with my honey! Through it all, thank you for always having my back, being by my side, and finding ways to make me smile. I love you, @BarackObama." related stories ALSO READ | Jennifer Aniston BREAKS Silence On Affair Rumours With Barack Obama: ‘I Know Michelle…’ | Viral A screenshot of Barack Obama’s Instagram post. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Michelle Obama (@michelleobama) Jennifer Aniston has long been an admirer of the Obamas and was an outspoken supporter of Barack’s presidential campaign back in 2007. She even attended a high-profile Hollywood fundraiser organised by influential figures such as Steven Spielberg and Jeffrey Katzenberg in support of his candidacy. However, late last year, Aniston, 55, was at the centre of unexpected rumours linking her to former US President Barack Obama, 63. A sensational front-page story by In Touch Weekly magazine claimed to reveal “the truth about Jen & Barack," sparking widespread chatter. Aniston wasted no time addressing the speculation during an appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live! in October 2024. She candidly shared, “Of all the calls you get from your publicist where you’re just like ‘Oh, no, what’s it gonna be?’ or you get an email saying some cheesy tabloid is gonna make up a story—and then it’s that." She continued, “I was not mad at it," before firmly stating, “It’s absolutely untrue." When Kimmel probed further, Aniston clarified, “I’ve met him [Obama] once. I know Michelle more than him." The host jokingly asked, “Is there a truth about you and Michelle?" to which Aniston responded with a smile, “That is not true." tags : barack obama hollywood jennifer aniston Michelle Obama Location : Los Angeles, United States of America (USA) First Published: January 25, 2025, 00:36 IST News movies Jennifer Aniston 'Liked' Barack Obama's Wedding Anniversary Post For Wife Michelle Obama Last Year Read More

title: Amid Barack Obama Affair Rumours, A Look At Jennifer Aniston's Past Marriages And Relationships
summary: Jennifer Aniston's complete dating history, from Brad Pitt to Justin Theroux, amid resurfaced affair rumours with former US President Barack Obama.
full_content: Amid Barack Obama Affair Rumours, A Look At Jennifer Aniston's Past Marriages And Relationships Written By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 22:46 IST Jennifer Aniston's complete dating history, from Brad Pitt to Justin Theroux, amid resurfaced affair rumours with former US President Barack Obama. reset Follow us on Google News Jennifer Aniston’s complete dating history amid resurfaced rumours of affair with Barack Obama. Jennifer Aniston has once again found herself at the centre of media speculation as resurfaced rumours suggest an alleged romance with former U.S. President Barack Obama. Although the Friends star had previously dismissed the rumours, they have gained traction amid ongoing speculation surrounding Barack and Michelle Obama’s marriage. Concerns about the couple’s relationship intensified after Michelle Obama skipped significant public events, including Jimmy Carter’s funeral and Donald Trump’s presidential inauguration. While the Obamas have neither confirmed nor denied any separation, online chatter continues to fuel speculation. She further clarified, “I was not mad at it… I know Michelle [Obama] more than him." As the rumours persist, let’s take a look at Jennifer Aniston’s notable relationships over the years. Justin Theroux (2010–2018) Aniston’s most recent long-term relationship was with actor Justin Theroux. The couple first crossed paths in 2007 but reconnected in 2010 while filming Wanderlust. Their romance quickly blossomed, and by August 2011, they had moved in together. They tied the knot in an intimate ceremony at their Bel Air, California, home on August 5, 2015. View this post on Instagram A post shared by People Magazine (@people) However, in early 2018, the pair announced their split in a joint statement. “In an effort to reduce any further speculation, we have decided to announce our separation," they wrote. “This decision was mutual and lovingly made at the end of last year. We are two best friends who have decided to part ways as a couple, but look forward to continuing our cherished friendship." Despite their breakup, the two have maintained a close friendship and have been seen publicly supporting each other. John Mayer (2008–2009) Jennifer Aniston and singer John Mayer met at an Oscars party in early 2008 and embarked on an on-and-off romance that lasted about a year. “It’s funny when you hit a place in a relationship and you both realize, we maybe need to do something else, but you still really, really love each other," Aniston said post-breakup. “It’s painful. I deeply, deeply care about him; we talk, we adore one another. And that’s where it is." Vince Vaughn (2005–2006) Following her highly publicised split from Brad Pitt, Aniston found solace in actor Vince Vaughn while filming The Break-Up. The relationship provided a much-needed distraction from her divorce, and Aniston later credited Vaughn with helping her move forward. “He brought me back to life," she admitted in a candid interview. However, the relationship ended in late 2006 on amicable terms. Brad Pitt (1998–2005) One of Aniston’s most high-profile relationships was with Hollywood A-lister Brad Pitt. The former couple first met through their managers in 1994 but didn’t start dating until 1998. They made their red carpet debut at the 1999 Emmy Awards and got engaged the same year at a Sting concert. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Jen and Brad (@anistonpitt) The duo tied the knot in a lavish Malibu wedding on July 29, 2000. In 2001, Pitt made a memorable guest appearance on Friends, playing a character who despised Aniston’s Rachel Green. However, cracks in their marriage began to show in 2004, when rumours swirled that Pitt had developed feelings for Angelina Jolie on the set of Mr. & Mrs. Smith. By January 2005, the couple announced their divorce, shocking fans worldwide. Tate Donovan (1995–1998) Aniston dated actor Tate Donovan for over two years following his breakup with Sandra Bullock. Ironically, Donovan was cast as Rachel Green’s love interest on Friends shortly after their real-life split, which made for some awkward moments on set. Adam Duritz (1995) Before dating Courteney Cox, Counting Crows frontman Adam Duritz briefly dated Aniston after they met through mutual friends. However, their relationship was short-lived and ended on good te...

title: Javed Akhtar Relieved After Saif Ali Khan Returns Home Post Knife Attack: 'Happy He’s Back’
summary: Renowned writer Javed Akhtar expressed relief over Saif Ali Khan’s recovery following a shocking knife attack at his Bandra residence.
full_content: Javed Akhtar Relieved After Saif Ali Khan Returns Home Post Knife Attack: 'Happy He’s Back’ Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 21:56 IST Renowned writer Javed Akhtar expressed relief over Saif Ali Khan’s recovery following a shocking knife attack at his Bandra residence. reset Follow us on Google News Javed Akhtar shares relief over Saif Ali Khan’s recovery after a knife attack during an attempted robbery at his Bandra home. Renowned writer Javed Akhtar expressed his relief on Friday following the recovery of Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan, who was recently injured in a shocking knife attack at his Bandra residence. Speaking at the Whistling Woods convocation ceremony, Akhtar shared with PTI, “We were all deeply worried. It’s a relief to know he has returned home from the hospital." The horrifying incident occurred during an attempted robbery in Khan’s 12th-floor apartment. The 54-year-old actor suffered multiple stab wounds and underwent two surgeries at Lilavati Hospital. He was discharged on Tuesday and is now recovering at home. related stories Mumbai Police have apprehended the attacker, identified as Shareeful Islam Shehzad Mohammad Rohilla Amin Fakir, a 30-year-old Bangladeshi national who illegally entered India last year under the alias Vijay Das. The accused is in police custody, with authorities set to request an extension of his remand in court on Friday. Details of the incident have come to light through the actor’s statement to the police. Saif reportedly recounted that he intervened after hearing his young son Jeh’s cries. He discovered the intruder attacking Jeh’s nurse, Eliam Philip, and immediately tackled the assailant. However, after being repeatedly stabbed in the back, Saif’s grip loosened. “My family and staff were terrified witnessing the chaos," the actor shared. Despite the traumatic episode, the family is beginning to return to normalcy. Saif’s son, Ibrahim Ali Khan, has resumed work on his debut film, Diler. Directed by Kunal Deshmukh and produced by Dinesh Vijan, the sports drama pairs Ibrahim with South Indian star Sreeleela, generating significant buzz around his Bollywood debut. Saif Ali Khan’s bravery during the ordeal has been widely praised, and his quick recovery has brought relief to fans and industry insiders alike.
