title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu Turns Heads In Team Jersey As She Cheers For Chennai Super Champs; Watch Here
summary: Samantha Ruth Prabhu was recently spotted cheering for her pickleball team, Chennai Super Champs, at the inaugural World Pickleball League (WPBL).
full_content: Samantha Ruth Prabhu Turns Heads In Team Jersey As She Cheers For Chennai Super Champs; Watch Here Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 21:07 IST Samantha Ruth Prabhu was recently spotted cheering for her pickleball team, Chennai Super Champs, at the inaugural World Pickleball League (WPBL). reset Follow us on Google News Samantha Ruth Prabhu cheers for her team Chennai Super Champs at the World Pickleball League, donning their vibrant jersey. Actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu is expanding her horizons, balancing her thriving acting career, ventures as a producer, and her role as the proud owner of Chennai Super Champs, a pickleball team competing in the inaugural World Pickleball League (WPBL). Recently, the Citadel actress was spotted cheering for her team, donning their vibrant yellow-and-red jersey, as the games kicked off. Samantha’s presence brought an electrifying energy to the event, showcasing her dedication to promoting the sport on a global stage. A video shared by popular paparazzo Sneh Zala captured Samantha in high spirits as she represented her team ahead of the league’s commencement. Samantha was the first franchise owner to invest in the WPBL, firmly rooting Chennai Super Champs as a symbol of her love for the city. Her vision is to put Chennai on the world pickleball map, celebrating the sport’s inclusivity across all ages and genders. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Snehkumar Zala (@snehzala) In an exclusive interview with News18 Showsha, Samantha expressed her deep connection to her city. She shared, “Chennai Super Champs was a no-brainer. The first team that I wanted was immediately Chennai. I had to have Chennai. From playing on the streets of Chennai to representing the city—it has been a journey. Chennai gave me my never-die attitude, resilience, and an equal playing field. That’s why I always come back and give back to the city." Samantha also reflected on the difference between playing a game and owning a team. She admitted with a laugh, “Yeah, I am gutsy like that. As an actor, for 15 to 16 years, everything has been about me. Now, it’s time to be part of something bigger. I believe anything I invest in—whether it’s money or my heart—has to have a greater impact on society. If not now, then when? Most of my business projects centre around physical fitness, and this ties in perfectly." Samantha recently returned to the screen in the Prime Video series Citadel: Honey Bunny, where she starred alongside Varun Dhawan in an action-packed role as Honey, opposite Dhawan’s Bunny. Created by Raj and DK, the series marked her comeback after a health-related hiatus. Looking ahead, Samantha will appear in Rakt Brahmand – The Bloody Kingdom, a fantasy-action series by Raj and DK, where she will star alongside Aditya Roy Kapur, Wamiqa Gabbi, Ali Fazal, and Nikitin Dheer. With these ambitious projects and her entrepreneurial pursuits, Samantha continues to prove she’s a force to be reckoned with both on and off the screen. tags : bollywood OTT regional cinema Samantha Ruth Prabhu Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 21:07 IST News movies Samantha Ruth Prabhu Turns Heads In Team Jersey As She Cheers For Chennai Super Champs; Watch Here Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor On Wife Mira Rajput Prioritizing Motherhood Over Career: 'Worked In Her Favor'
summary: Mira Kapoor Career: Shahid Kapoor said that he is rooting for wife Mira Rajput's career.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor On Wife Mira Rajput Prioritizing Motherhood Over Career: 'Worked In Her Favor' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 20:52 IST Mira Kapoor Career: Shahid Kapoor said that he is rooting for wife Mira Rajput's career. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput. Shahid Kapoor Talks About Mira Rajput: Shahid Kapoor married Mira Rajput in 2015. Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput’s marriage has been a topic of admiration as the couple often talks fondly about one another publically. In a recent chat with SCREEN, Shahid opened up about Mira’s choice to prioritize their kids over her career. Shahid said that he is proud of his wife and is rooting for her success. Shahid Kapoor said, “I think Mira has her own personality and I have mine. Definitely, she has begun to do a lot of things lately. She had made a very strong decision of first having her kids and then chasing her career. And I think that has worked in her favour." related stories He added, “Now our kids are much older and she has a lot of time for herself. She is building on things and she did do what she thought she wanted to do as a mother and she dedicated her time. Now, she can slowly feel freer and do things she wants to do. I feel prouder and rooting for her." Expressing his admiration for his wife, Shahid said, “She has been there as a friend, partner, and support system to me and now it’s my turn so I am more than happy to be there for her in whatever way. I am very proud of her." Previously, on The Faye D’Souza Show, Shahid reflected on how their union shaped his life and brought him a sense of responsibility. “Arranged marriage is the best thing to happen in my life. I have the best life partner in Mira… When we got married, I thought that I would have to protect her because she is this 20-year-old girl who’s just coming from Delhi. And this is a big bad world of movies and glamour, and everybody is so judgy," said Shahid. However, Shahid revealed that it was Mira who turned out to be more protective of him. “She has recognised that he (Shahid) is an actor, but I am more socially comfortable. She got more comfortable in the parties that I had been attending for years… even before I got comfortable in there. I was like, she’s already more comfortable than I was," he shared. Shahid and Mira’s marriage was arranged by their families. While Shahid liked Mira from their very first meeting, it took Mira about six months to agree to the marriage. Despite their 13-year age difference, the couple has built a beautiful life together. Shahid and Mira welcomed their first child, Misha, in 2016, and their son, Zain, followed in 2018. The couple often shares glimpses of their family life on social media, giving fans major relationship goals with their candid posts and public appearances. tags : bollywood Mira Rajput Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 20:52 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor On Wife Mira Rajput Prioritizing Motherhood Over Career: 'Worked In Her Favor' Read More

title: Actor Mamta Kulkarni Becomes 'Mahamandleshwar' Of Kinnar Akhara At Mahakumbh
summary: Acharya Mahamandleshwar of Kinnar Akhada Laxmi Narayan confirmed to ANI that the induction rituals are currently underway.
full_content: Actor Mamta Kulkarni Becomes 'Mahamandleshwar' Of Kinnar Akhara At Mahakumbh Curated By : Shrishti Negi News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 20:43 IST Acharya Mahamandleshwar of Kinnar Akhada Laxmi Narayan confirmed to ANI that the induction rituals are currently underway. reset Follow us on Google News Mamta Kulkarni is a popular Bollywood actress from the 1990s. Former Bollywood actor Mamta Kulkarni has assumed the title of Mahamandleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara at the ongoing Mahakumbh festival in Prayagraj. Acharya Mahamandleshwar of Kinnar Akhada Laxmi Narayan confirmed to ANI that the induction rituals are currently underway, and Kulkarni has been given the spiritual name Yamai Mamta Nandgiri. “Kinnar Akhada is going to make Mamta Kulkarni (former Bollywood actress) a Mahamandleshwar. She has been named as Shri Yamai Mamta Nandgiri. As I am talking here, all the rituals are underway," said Laxmi Narayan. related stories According to the Acharya, Mamta Kulkarni has been associated with the order for the past one and a half years. “She has been in touch with Kinnar Akhada and me for the last one and a half years… She is allowed to perform the character of any devotional figure if she wants as we do not prohibit anyone from performing their art…" she added. #WATCH | Prayagraj | Acharya Mahamandleshwar of Kinnar Akhada, Laxmi Narayan says, "Kinnar akhada is going to make Mamta Kulkarni (former Bollywood actress) a Mahamandleshwar. She has been named as Shri Yamai Mamta Nandgiri. As I am talking here, all the rituals are underway. She… pic.twitter.com/gF25BlKcEh — ANI (@ANI) January 24, 2025 Kulkarni was also seen performing the traditional ‘Pind Daan’ at Sangam Ghat in Prayagraj. Photos circulating online show her in saffron attire and rudraksh mala, accompanied by spiritual leaders Dr. Laxmi Narayan Tripathi and Swami Jai Ambanand Giri. “…This was the order of Mahadev, Maha Kaali. This was the order of my Guru. They chose this day. I didn’t do anything," Mamta Kulkarni told reporters. Mamta Kulkarni बनीं संन्यासी, महाकुंभ में ली दीक्षा, Acharya Laxmi Narayan ने दी जानकारी pic.twitter.com/N0tKQGJUlB — अधिवक्ता Sanjeev Yadav (@Sanjeevkyadav2) January 24, 2025 The Kinnar Akhada, a monastic order of transgender sadhus, is affiliated with the ancient Juna Akhada and has set up camp in sector 16 (Sangam Lower East Marg) of the Mahakumbh tent city. What is a Mahamandaleshwar? The title of Mahamandaleshwar is granted to Hindu monks of the Dashanami order. It translates to ‘chief of great or numerous monasteries.’ As Mahamandaleshwar, the role involves spreading the teachings of Sanatana Dharma and promoting righteousness and social contributions. Who is Mamta Kulkarni? Mamta Kulkarni, a popular Bollywood actress from the 1990s, made a return to Mumbai last month after years of absence. She gained fame through films like Karan Arjun and Baazi, starring alongside top actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan. Last year, the Bombay High Court quashed criminal proceedings against Kulkarni in a Rs 2,000 crore drugs case, citing a lack of evidence. tags : bollywood mahakumbh mamta kulkarni Prayagraj Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 20:35 IST News movies Actor Mamta Kulkarni Becomes 'Mahamandleshwar' Of Kinnar Akhara At Mahakumbh Read More

title: Sanjay Dutt Set To Return As Raghu In Vaastav 2? Here's What We Know
summary: Sanjay Dutt and Mahesh Manjrekar are reuniting for the highly anticipated sequel to Vaastav: The Reality. The 1999 cult classic, known for its gritty portrayal of Mumbai’s underworld, left a lasting impact on Indian cinema.
full_content: Sanjay Dutt Set To Return As Raghu In Vaastav 2? Here's What We Know Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 20:20 IST Sanjay Dutt and Mahesh Manjrekar are reuniting for the highly anticipated sequel to Vaastav: The Reality. The 1999 cult classic, known for its gritty portrayal of Mumbai’s underworld, left a lasting impact on Indian cinema. reset Follow us on Google News Sanjay Dutt and Mahesh Manjrekar reunite for Vaastav 2, the sequel to the 1999 cult classic? In 1999, Sanjay Dutt and Mahesh Manjrekar delivered the hard-hitting gangster drama Vaastav: The Reality, a film that resonated deeply with audiences and became a landmark in Indian cinema. Sanjay Dutt’s portrayal of Raghu, a common man-turned-gangster, earned widespread acclaim and achieved cult status over the years. Widely regarded as the OG gangster film of Indian cinema, Vaastav left an indelible mark on the genre. Now, 26 years later, the iconic duo is gearing up to reunite for the much-anticipated sequel to Vaastav. Sources close to PinkVilla reveal that Mahesh Manjrekar has conceptualized a fresh narrative set within the gritty world of Vaastav. “It’s a franchise film, not a direct continuation of the original story," said an insider. “Mahesh has developed an idea in sync with the essence of Vaastav and has shared it with Sanjay Dutt, who is thrilled to reprise the role of Raghu. The screenplay is currently in the works, and Sanju is eagerly awaiting the final narration," added the source. related stories The sequel will be produced by Subhash Kale, with the team planning to begin production by late 2025. The film is said to be a two-hero project, with the creators aiming to cast a prominent actor from the younger generation as the parallel lead. “Casting decisions will likely be finalized by mid-2025, once the script is fully developed. Mahesh and his team are crafting a high-octane gangster drama with larger-than-life dialogues and powerful characters," the source shared. If all goes as planned, Vaastav 2 is poised to be one of the grandest gangster films in Indian cinema, blending the raw intensity of the original with a modern, expansive approach. The makers are reportedly considering an A-list young star for the role alongside Sanjay Dutt, further boosting the sequel’s appeal. Sanjay Dutt and Mahesh Manjrekar have a history of successful collaborations, including Kurukshetra, Hathyar, Pitaah, Viruddh, and Vaah! Life Ho Toh Aisi. Their reunion for Vaastav 2 is already generating buzz among fans and the industry alike. The original Vaastav (1999) followed the journey of Raghu (Sanjay Dutt), an innocent young man from Mumbai who unwittingly descends into the city’s underworld. Starting as a small-time worker with dreams of a simple life, Raghu is forced to commit murder in self-defense, which marks the beginning of his transformation into a feared gangster. As he rises through the ranks of the criminal world, Raghu struggles with the moral consequences of his actions and the toll it takes on his family. The film concludes with a tragic yet poignant climax, as Raghu, overwhelmed by his life of crime, meets a heartbreaking end at the hands of his own mother, fulfilling his desperate plea for redemption. tags : bollywood Sanjay Dutt Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 20:20 IST News movies Sanjay Dutt Set To Return As Raghu In Vaastav 2? Here's What We Know Read More

title: Sharvari Drops Cryptic Post Amid Rumours Of Losing Kartik Aaryan's Film To Ananya Panday: 'Just Have...'
summary: Kartik Aaryan has reportedly promised two films to Sharvari, including Patni Patni Aur Voh 2.
full_content: Sharvari Drops Cryptic Post Amid Rumours Of Losing Kartik Aaryan's Film To Ananya Panday: 'Just Have...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:55 IST Kartik Aaryan has reportedly promised two films to Sharvari, including Patni Patni Aur Voh 2. reset Follow us on Google News Ananya has bagged Kartik's film? Karan Johar, on Christmas, announced that he is teaming up with Kartik Aaryan for the ‘biggest love story’ of 2026, Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri. Earlier, it was said that Ananya Panday and Sharvari were leading the race to star opposite Kartik. Now, Ananya Panday has reportedly been locked in for Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri. Amid this, fans have speculated that Sharvari’s latest Instagram post is a cryptic note in response to these reports. Sharvari shared an image from a temple and wrote, “Prayers are always answered… Just have faith." Initially, rumours were rife that Janhvi Kapoor was in contention for the role. Then it was reported that Karan would either lock Ananya or Sharvari. related stories Sharvari insta story by u/HanaButnotMontana in BollyBlindsNGossip Bollywood Hungama quoted a source as saying, “Kartik and Karan were looking for an actress with strong pull in the youth, and after contemplating the names, they have locked Ananya to play the female lead. Ananya and Kartik are a successful pair, and this would extend their partnership further." Kartik and Ananya previously worked together in Pati Patni Aur Voh. However, as per the report, Kartik has offered the film’s sequel to Sharvari. “While Ananya is doing Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri, Kartik has promised another film to Sharvari. The duo will be teaming up on another love story by the end of 2025. Kartik is clear to maintain equations with all his female co-stars, and a promise made now will be fulfilled soon. He has also offered Pati Patni Aur Woh 2 to Sharvari," the source added. As for, Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri, the film is scheduled to go on floors in May 2025. Starring Kartik Aaryan and Ananya Panday in the lead, the film is directed by Satyaprem Ki Katha fame Sameer Vidhwans. The rom-com, produced by Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, is slated for release in 2026. tags : ananya panday bollywood kartik aaryan Sharvari Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:55 IST News movies Sharvari Drops Cryptic Post Amid Rumours Of Losing Kartik Aaryan's Film To Ananya Panday: 'Just Have...' title: 67th Grammys: Beyonce, Billie Eilish Battle For Album Of The Year Award
summary: The 67th Grammy Awards will take place at LA's Crypto.com Arena on February 3.
full_content: 67th Grammys: Beyonce, Billie Eilish Battle For Album Of The Year Award Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:46 IST The 67th Grammy Awards will take place at LA's Crypto.com Arena on February 3. reset Follow us on Google News Beyonce is a standout contender this year. (Photo Credit: X) You must be living under a rock, if you haven’t heard about the 67th Grammy Awards . The awards will take place on February 3. And, all eyes are on the prestigious Album of the Year category. According to Gold Derby, the competition is currently too close to call, with Billie Eilish’s Hit Me Hard and Soft and Beyoncé’s Cowboy Carter tied, each garnering four votes from the site’s experts and editors. This sets the stage for an intense showdown between two of music’s biggest stars. It seems like Taylor Swift, a perennial Grammy favourite, might miss out on a major win this year. Despite the success of her record-breaking concert film The Eras Tour — which became the highest-grossing music film of all time—Swift’s film was surprisingly snubbed in the Best Music Film category. Additionally, her latest album, The Tortured Poet’s Department, is also predicted to miss out on the Album of the Year award, with experts predicting a similar fate for her in other big categories. Celebrity psychic and astrologer Inbaal Honigman predicted modest results for Swift, saying that the calm Four of Swords Tarot card suggests a quieter Grammy performance for the singer this year. related stories Meanwhile, other categories are heating up as well. Sabrina Carpenter’s Espresso is seen as a strong contender for Record of the Year, while Billie Eilish’s Birds of a Feather is the favourite for Song of the Year. Chappell Roan is dominating predictions for Best New Artist. These predictions have added to the excitement surrounding the ceremony, which will be a star-studded event. Beyoncé is a standout contender this year, leading the nominations with an impressive 11 nods, including one for Album of the Year for Cowboy Carter. Her success further cements her status as one of the biggest names in the music industry. The 67th Grammy Awards will take place at LA’s Crypto.com Arena. The ceremony will not only celebrate the achievements of the music community but will also serve as a fundraiser for wildfire relief efforts. The devastating wildfires in Los Angeles have prompted the Recording Academy to dedicate the evening to supporting those affected by the disaster, as well as honoring the brave first responders who risk their lives to protect others. In these challenging times, the Grammys aim to use music’s power to heal and unite. tags : ENT Grammy hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:46 IST News movies 67th Grammys: Beyonce, Billie Eilish Battle For Album Of The Year Award Read More

title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box-Office Collection: Venkatesh Daggubati’s Film To Enter Rs 200 Crore Club
summary: A primary chunk of Sankranthiki Vasthunam’s total collection came from the Coastal Andhra region where the film featured in the top five biggest grossers of all time.
full_content: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box-Office Collection: Venkatesh Daggubati’s Film To Enter Rs 200 Crore Club Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:27 IST A primary chunk of Sankranthiki Vasthunam’s total collection came from the Coastal Andhra region where the film featured in the top five biggest grossers of all time. reset Follow us on Google News Sankranthiki Vasthunam was released on January 14. (Photo Credit: X) Sankranthiki Vasthunam, starring Venkatesh Daggubati in the lead role along with Priyanka Mohanan and Aishwarya Rajesh, is showing no sign of slowing down at the box office. The film minted a stellar Rs 152 crore approx at the Indian box office during its ten-day extended first week. The film performed well not only during the holiday period but also managed to earn a sufficient amount even after that. As for its global income, the film has grossed Rs 29.50 crore (USD 3.40 million), making a worldwide gross of Rs 182 crore. Given its blockbuster performance in theatres, the film is expected to cross the Rs 200 crore mark over the weekend. Reportedly, a primary chunk of the film’s total collection came from the Coastal Andhra region. Sankranthiki Vasthunam featured in the top five biggest grossers of all time in the region. Given its box-office collection, it is safe to say that the film made the most out of the Sankranti which is believed to be an incredibly lucrative release period in the particular belt. Such was the response that the film even turned out to be the fastest earner of all time, even surpassing the giants like RRR, Pushpa 2 and Baahubali 2. related stories During the ten days, Sankranthiki Vasthunam grossed Rs 140 crore plus in the Telugu states. Before the film, the top two highest-grossing Sankranti releases in the Telugu states were AVPL and Waltair Veeraya with a gross collection of Rs 196 crore and Rs 171 crore respectively. Seems like the latest release will easily surpass Waltair Veeraya’s box-office collection comfortably. That too, in the second week of its release itself. Sankranthiki Vasthunam hit the theatres on January 14 and has been running successfully ever since. Owing to the Telugu film’s success, the makers hosted a party, with the film’s team and stars in attendance. The official X handle of Sri Venkateswara Creations gave a peek into the success party of Sankranthiki Vasthunam. Mahesh Babu also attended the party and looked handsome in a black shirt teamed with denim pants and a red cap. His wife, Namrata Shirodkar, also joined him for the bash. ICYDK, Sankranthiki Vasthunam is an action-comedy about the story of a former IPS officer who finds himself indulged in a high-profile kidnapping case at his ex-girlfriend’s insistence. The plot takes an investing turn as his wife, suspicious of her husband’s loyalty, also joins them. tags : box office regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:25 IST News movies Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box-Office Collection: Venkatesh Daggubati’s Film To Enter Rs 200 Crore Club Read More

title: Melania Trump Explains Why Son Barron Chose Not To Live On NYU Campus
summary: Melania was living with her son in New York before recently shifting to the White House.
full_content: Melania Trump Explains Why Son Barron Chose Not To Live On NYU Campus Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:20 IST Melania was living with her son in New York before recently shifting to the White House. reset Follow us on Google News Barron Trump is making headlines. (Photo Credit: X) Barron Trump, the 18-year-old son of President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump, continues to attract attention. Recently, Melania shared why Barron chose not to live on the NYU campus while attending the prestigious Stern School of Business. Standing tall at 6-foot-7, Barron is currently pursuing his studies at New York University. When Donald Trump was elected president for his first term, Melania made it a priority to shield their son, Barron, from the public eye, keeping him largely out of the spotlight. Known for his low profile, Barron has stayed mostly private over the years. However, with his recent rise to prominence as a student at NYU, he has now captured the media’s attention. related stories Following Donald Trump’s recent win as president, the media inquired about his son Barron, to which he explained that Barron chose to attend the Stern School of Business at NYU himself. Melania added that their son decided to live at Trump Tower, the family’s New York residence because he preferred to stay at home rather than on campus. The outlet further mentioned that Melania even lived with her son in New York before recently shifting to the White House. However, it was later discovered that Melania made the decision to reside at home and she refused to allow Barron to live in on-campus accommodation. Barron has extensive protection, making him highly visible on campus. The publication also reported that Melania does not want strangers to get access to or take advantage of him. She made a command decision for Barron, citing security concerns. According to sources close to Barron, he hardly has any friends. He communicates with his peers only through video games. Melania urges him to meet new friends, but she warns him to be cautious. Donald Trump further added that he is not sure that his son ever had a girlfriend and he thinks that Barron prefers his own company. Earlier, Barron appeared at his father’s inauguration ceremony and became a crowd favourite. The young lad donned a dark-tailored suit complete with an American flag lapel pin. tags : donald trump entertainment hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:20 IST News movies Melania Trump Explains Why Son Barron Chose Not To Live On NYU Campus Read More

title: February K-Pop Comebacks Announced: BLACKPINK, Zerobaseone And SM’s Big Debut
summary: SM Entertainment is preparing to introduce its first new girl group since aespa’s debut in 2020.
full_content: February K-Pop Comebacks Announced: BLACKPINK, Zerobaseone And SM’s Big Debut Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:11 IST SM Entertainment is preparing to introduce its first new girl group since aespa’s debut in 2020. reset Follow us on Google News The eight-member group, Heart2Hearts, will officially debut on February 24. (Photo Credit: Instagram) The new year has brought renewed excitement for K-pop fans, with February set to deliver unforgettable comebacks and fresh debuts. While third-generation K-pop stars continue to dominate, BLACKPINK’s Lisa and Jisoo are reassuring fans that the group remains a powerhouse, even as they explore their solo ventures. Jisoo’s Double Comeback related stories BLACKPINK’s Jisoo is set to steal the spotlight this February with exciting ventures in both music and acting. She recently confirmed that her new single will drop on Valentine’s Day, much to the delight of her fans. Additionally, Jisoo’s new K-drama, Newtopia, a zombie comedy, will premiere just a week before her music release. This dual comeback showcases her versatility as both a singer and an actress. Meanwhile, Jennie is gearing up for her major release in March. Her upcoming album will feature collaborations with global stars like Childish Gambino and Dua Lipa, setting high expectations for her solo career. Heart2Hearts SM Entertainment, the powerhouse behind groups like NCT, Red Velvet, EXO and aespa, is preparing to introduce its first new girl group since aespa’s debut in 2020. The eight-member group, Heart2Hearts, will officially debut on February 24. Fans are eager to see how this rookie act will carve its identity under the label’s impressive legacy. STAYC, IVE and MADEIN Beloved girl groups STAYC and IVE have announced their returns with new music this month, adding to the excitement for K-pop fans. Rookie group MADEIN has also teased their comeback, though the release date remains undisclosed. Gaeun’s Exit from MADEIN Not all news has been celebratory, as MADEIN faces backlash following member Gaeun’s departure. This comes amid serious allegations against the CEO of their agency, 143 Entertainment, involving sexual assault. While the company has denied the accusations, the controversy has led to a wave of fan scepticism, with some calling for a boycott of the group’s upcoming OT6 revival. Despite the challenges, February promises to be a dynamic month for K-pop. With exciting comebacks, fresh debuts and new milestones, fans are in for a treat as the genre continues to evolve and captivate audiences worldwide. tags : BLACKPINK ENT Kpop Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:11 IST News movies February K-Pop Comebacks Announced: BLACKPINK, Zerobaseone And SM’s Big Debut Read More

title: BRB, Still Laughing Out Loud At Shehnaaz Gill’s ‘Overacting’

(Photo Credits: ) Shehnaaz Gill fans, get ready for a dose of laughter. The Bigg Boss 13 star has treated her followers to a hilarious video on Instagram, and it is too good to miss. In the clip, Shehnaaz is seen eating fruits with a fork – but, of course, she does it in her signature quirky style. Her playful expressions and over-the-top antics make the simple act of eating fruits an absolute riot. Oh, and do not miss the Punjabi girl saying “buraahhhhhhhhh" in the end. In the caption, Shehnaaz Gill wrote, “Mere overacting ke paise kaat lo …… buraahhhhhhhhh." Fans were surely amazed to check out this side of the actress. One of them wrote, “So cute," while another exclaimed, “Oh god Shehnaaz." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Shehnaaz Gill (@shehnaazgill) Shehnaaz Gill is all set to turn 32 on January 27, but the celebrations have already begun. The actress jetted off to Dubai for early celebrations and spent an unforgettable evening at Ain Dubai. In a video shared by Shehnaaz, fans got a glimpse of the lavish birthday surprises planned by her friends. With the dazzling Dubai skyline as her backdrop, the highlight of the evening was when the words “Happy Birthday, Shehnaaz" lit up on the enormous Ferris wheel behind her. Her radiant smile said it all – she was absolutely thrilled. Adding to the charm was a beautiful birthday cake on the table. “Celebrating me in style at Ain Dubai! My amazing friend made my birthday unforgettable in this stunning city of dreams Counting down to the big day—happy birthday to me in advance!" read the text attached to the post. Directed and written by Amarjit Singh Saron, Ikk Kudi is scheduled to hit theatres on June 13, 2025. Shehnaaz Gill made her Bollywood debut in Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan with Salman Khan, Raghav Juyal and Pooja Hegde. title: Tanya Shanker Draws Inspiration From 90s Pop Legends In CyberFantasy
summary: Tanya Shanker finds similarities between the past and present in her latest song CyberFantasy.
full_content: Tanya Shanker Draws Inspiration From 90s Pop Legends In CyberFantasy Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 19:06 IST Tanya Shanker finds similarities between the past and present in her latest song CyberFantasy. reset Follow us on Google News Tanya Shanker believes she would have “been a typical rockstar.”   (Photo Credits: Instagram) Tanya Shanker’s latest track, CyberFantasy, masterfully merges modern sounds with a nostalgic twist, reminiscent of the Britney Spears and Beyonce era. Tanya Shanker draws connections between past and present music, perfectly captured in this track. The music video features her in a neon-lit room, singing about the complexities of an online relationship. The song’s bold trap beats add a unique edge to the nostalgic feel. Despite drawing inspiration from iconic musicians, Shanker admits she often wishes she had been born in the 1960s or 1970s, where she believes she would have “been a typical rockstar." For this song, the Bengaluru-based artist collaborated with co-composer, producer and mentor Richard Andrew Dudley. Speaking about her inspiration, Shanker, speaking with Rolling Stone said, “I think with a lot of the themes dealing with being chronically online or being a citizen of the internet, Richard and I thought that drawing from the era when the World Wide Web had just emerged would be the most ideal way of going about making the EP." related stories With the release of CyberFantasy, and her music inspired by Britney Spears and Beyonce, Tanya Shanker shared her thoughts on which era she wishes she had been born in. The singer said, “If there was an era that I could have been born in, I would say probably the Sixties or Seventies because rock music was just starting to gain popularity at that time and it would have been amazing to see the rise of legendary artists like the Beatles, Fleetwood Mac, Pink Floyd and more. I always tell Richard that if I was born during that time, I would have certainly been a typical rockstar." Shanker has been receiving plenty of positive feedback for her latest track, but one friend’s thoughtful review truly stood out to her. This friend took the time to delve into the lyrics and production, offering detailed insights that Shanker deeply appreciated. Such meaningful and in-depth feedback was a significant boost for her. Viewing her album as just another milestone in her musical journey, Shanker is eager to explore new genres and styles, believing that this ongoing exploration is the key to her growth and evolution as an artist. Shanker is now focused on touring with her solo project, Tanya Shanker Collective, and is also working on exciting collaborations with other artists. In addition to CyberFantasy, her latest project includes tracks like Takeover, Dopamine, Mirage, and Love Me Then. tags : bengaluru Cyber Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 19:03 IST News movies Tanya Shanker Draws Inspiration From 90s Pop Legends In CyberFantasy Read More

title: Former Bollywood Star Mamta Kulkarni To Lead Kinnar Akhara As Mahamandleshwar At Mahakumbh 2025
summary: Mamta Kulkarni, the former Bollywood star known for her glamorous roles in the 1990s, is set to take on a transformative spiritual role as the Mahamandleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara.
full_content: Former Bollywood Star Mamta Kulkarni To Lead Kinnar Akhara As Mahamandleshwar At Mahakumbh 2025 Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:58 IST Mamta Kulkarni, the former Bollywood star known for her glamorous roles in the 1990s, is set to take on a transformative spiritual role as the Mahamandleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara. reset Follow us on Google News Former Bollywood actress Mamta Kulkarni transitions into a spiritual role as Mahamandleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara at Mahakumbh 2025. In a plot twist straight out of a Bollywood blockbuster, former actress Mamta Kulkarni is set to take on a deeply spiritual role as the Mahamandleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara. Known for her bold and glamorous performances in the 1990s, Mamta’s transition from the glitz and glamour of Bollywood to the sacred path of spiritual leadership has left fans and industry insiders alike both astonished and intrigued. On January 24, Mamta will officially assume her new role in a grand ceremony rich with tradition. As part of the rituals, she will perform Pind Daan at the holy Sangam, the sacred meeting point of the Ganga, Yamuna, and the mythical Saraswati rivers. The event, set to culminate in her induction into the Kinnar Akhara at 6 PM, has been confirmed by Aaj Tak. related stories Established in 2015, the Kinnar Akhara is a Hindu religious order dedicated to advocating for the inclusion and recognition of transgender individuals in spiritual and social spheres. By appointing Mamta Kulkarni as their Mahamandleshwar, the Akhara hopes to broaden its message and influence. Once a reigning star in films like Karan Arjun and Aashiq Awara, Mamta has lived far from the spotlight for years. Reports suggest she has embraced spirituality wholeheartedly, leaving her star-studded past behind. Her induction into this esteemed role marks a profound new chapter, reflecting not only her personal transformation but also her commitment to a higher spiritual calling. For her veteran fans, Mamta’s journey is as captivating as her on-screen presence once was. The upcoming ceremony is expected to garner widespread attention, attracting followers from both spiritual and entertainment circles. In a recent interview with ANI, Mamta clarified, “I have not come back for Bollywood and I am not planning to make a return as an actress." Her story is one of reinvention, a powerful testament to the unpredictable turns life can take. After 25 years away, Mamta surprised many when she returned to India in December 2024, spotted at the Mumbai airport—a moment that reignited curiosity about her path. tags : bollywood mahakumbh mamta kulkarni Location : Prayagraj, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:58 IST News movies Former Bollywood Star Mamta Kulkarni To Lead Kinnar Akhara As Mahamandleshwar At Mahakumbh 2025 Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor Says Jab We Met's Aditya Would Be 'Frustrated' With Geet: 'Who Can Put Up With Her?'
summary: Jab We Met starred Kareena Kapoor Khan as Geet.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Says Jab We Met's Aditya Would Be 'Frustrated' With Geet: 'Who Can Put Up With Her?' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:56 IST Jab We Met starred Kareena Kapoor Khan as Geet. reset Follow us on Google News Jab We Met is among Shahid's most popular films. Filmmaker Imtiaz Ali is known for creating classic love stories wherein two lovers reunite after a moment of conflict and realization. However, while the couples end up together in Imtiaz’s films, the filmmaker believes that not all of their stories should have had a happy ending. Speaking about where Kareena Kapoor Khan’s Geet and Shahid Kapoor’s Aditya from Jab We Met would be today, he once told the Indian Express, “At a divorce lawyer’s office." In a recent conversation with the publication, Shahid Kapoor agreed with Imtiaz Ali. Shahid Kapoor said, “That’s actually a fun idea that Geet and Aditya are now breaking up because they are frustrated with each other. Aditya is like, ‘She is her own favourite, who can ever put up with her?’" related stories When it was mentioned that fans wouldn’t be happy to imagine a sad ending for the cult film, Shahid said, “If our filmmaker thinks these two will divorce each other, then who am I to come in between? I am just an actor." The Imtiaz Ali directorial venture became a huge hit when it was released, praised by fans and critics alike. It went on to become a cult favourite film among fans of the romantic comedy genre. Several fans have demanded a sequel to the film. While Imtiaz Ali has denied several times that he will not make a sequel of the film, the craze around the film never lets him truly escape the question. Imtiaz previously told India Today, “When the film was re-released in theatres last year, people really gave a lot of love… Now it’s been 16 years, and I feel that the film is not mine, it’s the audience’s film and they celebrate it. I look at ‘Jab We Met’ like an old friend rather than my own film now. I wouldn’t want to make a sequel of ‘Jab We Met’ because I feel that it’s complete in itself. I haven’t thought of ever making a sequel to that film." Meanwhile, Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Deva with Pooja Hegde. In Deva, Shahid plays a rebellious cop, while Pooja portrays a journalist. The film, helmed by Rosshan Andrrews and backed by Roy Kapur Films, also features Kubbra Sait and Pavail Gulati in significant roles. Deva will be released in theatres on January 31. tags : bollywood kareena kapoor Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:56 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Says Jab We Met's Aditya Would Be 'Frustrated' With Geet: 'Who Can Put Up With Her?' title: Sidhu Moose Wala’s Legacy Continues As His Ninth Posthumous Track ‘Lock’ Dominates YouTube With 9 Million Views
summary: Sidhu Moose Wala’s ninth posthumous track, Lock, released on YouTube, has already crossed over 9 million views within just two days.
full_content: Sidhu Moose Wala’s Legacy Continues As His Ninth Posthumous Track ‘Lock’ Dominates YouTube With 9 Million Views Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:41 IST Sidhu Moose Wala’s ninth posthumous track, Lock, released on YouTube, has already crossed over 9 million views within just two days. reset Follow us on Google News Sidhu Moose Wala was just 28 when he was shot dead. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Punjabi rapper Sidhu Moose Wala, who was shot dead at a village in Mansa on May 29, 2022, continues to dominate the music industry. His ninth posthumous track, Lock has already crossed over 9 million views on YouTube within just two days. The song is Moose Wala’s first release of 2025 and the massive numbers prove that his legacy is still as powerful as ever. The video, produced by The Kid and directed by Navkaran Brar, also features Sidhu’s father, Balkaur Singh, whose presence adds emotional depth. The late singer’s first posthumous song, SYL, was released less than a month after his death in June 2022, followed by Vaar in November, and Mera Naa was dropped a month before his first death anniversary in 2023. His fourth song, Chorni, came out three months later in July and the fifth track, Watchout, was released in November. In 2024, three more songs, Drippy, 410 and Attach, were also released. related stories Before the release of Lock, Sidhu Moose Wala’s father, Balkaur Singh, was seen demanding justice for his son’s death on X (formerly known as Twitter). He wrote, “964 DAYS AFTER SIDHU. In Mumbai, Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was attacked. Speaking from Delhi, Arvind Kejriwal blamed the state and central governments, questioning how common citizens can feel safe if celebrities aren’t secure. I support his concerns, but why was he SILENT about my son, Sidhu Moose Wala’s murder? Despite conspiracy warnings from Intelligence, his party’s Punjab government reduce my son’s security & publicize it? Why hasn’t the conspiracy been fully uncovered yet? Both the state & central governments failed to protect my son—he deserves justice too." Both the state & central governments failed to protect my son—he deserves justice too.3/3 — Sardar Balkaur Singh Sidhu (@iBalkaurSidhu) January 17, 2025 Sidhu Moose Wala was just 28 when he was shot dead by unknown attackers in Punjab. Canada-based gangster Goldy Brar, a key member of the Lawrence Bishnoi gang, claimed responsibility for the murder. A year after the tragic incident shook the nation, his parents, Balkaur Singh and Charan Kaur, welcomed a son through IVF. tags : entertainment Sidhu Moose Wala Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:41 IST News movies Sidhu Moose Wala’s Legacy Continues As His Ninth Posthumous Track ‘Lock’ Dominates YouTube With 9 Million Views Read More

title: Arjit Taneja Dismisses Rumours Of His Exit From Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye: ‘Abhi Picture Baaki Hai’
summary: "The show is very close to my heart, and I would never leave it," Arjit Taneja said.
full_content: Arjit Taneja Dismisses Rumours Of His Exit From Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye: ‘Abhi Picture Baaki Hai’ Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:31 IST "The show is very close to my heart, and I would never leave it," Arjit Taneja said. reset Follow us on Google News Arjit plays Virat in Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye. (Photo Credit: Instagram) The popular TV serial Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye has been making headlines with reports of lead actor Arjit Taneja , who portrays Virat, exiting the show. Adding fuel to the speculation, the actor shared a cryptic post on X, hinting at his farewell from the beloved series. “And signing off as Virat Singh Ahuja. Thank you for the endless love and some hate at times. VSA will always be special," he wrote, leaving fans shocked. However, it appears that a major twist in the storyline might be unfolding. Talking to ETimes, the actor has now refuted the speculations of him leaving the show and has assured the viewers that he isn’t quitting. Instead, he made a big revelation that Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye is now heading towards a three-year lap and he will be seen playing a new character. related stories Speaking about the current trajectory in the show, Arjit said, “Virat falls from a cliff in the current plot, resulting in a three-year time leap. Following that, I’ll be introduced as a whole different character named Ranveer Arora, who is the polar opposite of Virat. The public will have to see how he relates with Virat and the Ahujas." He added, “Yes, after 15 amazing months as Virat, it’s time to say goodbye to the character. The show is very close to my heart, and I would never leave it, despite what people thought. My post just meant I was signing off as Virat Singh Ahuja, not from the show. Abhi picture baaki hai, and I hope we continue this journey for many more years." However, the actor’s clarification now comes as a big relief to his fans. Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye debuted in November 2023, starring Arjit Taneja and Sriti Jha in the lead roles. Their on-screen chemistry as Virat and Amruta captured the hearts of audiences. The show took an intriguing turn in mid-2024 with the addition of Pratiksha Sonmukhe to the cast. She portrayed Virat’s ex-wife. tags : entertainment TV Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:30 IST News movies Arjit Taneja Dismisses Rumours Of His Exit From Kaise Mujhe Tum Mil Gaye: ‘Abhi Picture Baaki Hai’ Read More

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Wanted This Woman 'Dead In A Trunk'; Docuseries Makes Shocking Revelation
summary: The Fall Of Diddy docuseries, which is focused on Sean 'Diddy' Combs will be aired on January 27, 2025.
full_content: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Wanted This Woman 'Dead In A Trunk'; Docuseries Makes Shocking Revelation Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:08 IST The Fall Of Diddy docuseries, which is focused on Sean 'Diddy' Combs will be aired on January 27, 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Diddy is currently imprisoned in the Metropolitan Detention Center in New York. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Amid the mounting criminal lawsuits against American rapper and record producer Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs , his rise and fall are being dissected by several of his alleged victims and former employees in the upcoming The Fall Of Diddy. The four-part docuseries will feature bombshell interviews in the hour-long episodes, building up on the previous allegations. In one of the most harrowing revelations, former Vibe editor-in-chief Danyel Smith has recalled an intense interaction with Combs, claiming that the rapper threatened her to death. In one of the episodes, Smith shared how he got furious when she didn’t show him some pictures from a story in the publication and wanted to see her “dead in a trunk." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Investigation Discovery (@investigationdiscovery) “After the shoot, Mr. Combs wanted to see the covers before they were published. It was policy for us not to show the covers to anyone before they were published. He called my office and I spoke to him. I told him that I wouldn’t be making an exception and he said that he would see me dead in a trunk if I did not show it to him," she said in the preview of the docuseries. The claims have been reportedly denied by Combs as included in the docuseries, as per Rolling Stone. Further in the conversation, Smith shared how she stood up to Combs and added, “My attorney called him to say that if he didn’t immediately fax over an apology, my attorney was going to reach out to law enforcement. It took about 90 minutes to two hours, and I received that faxed apology." Apart from Danyel Smith, many others, including producer Rodney Lil Rod Jones, Diddy’s former driver, and chef, were also interviewed. Thalia Graves, who previously accused Diddy of drugging and assaulting her in 2001, will also be seen speaking out in the series, sharing her alleged encounter with the rapper. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Investigation Discovery (@investigationdiscovery) Sean Combs is currently lodged in the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, awaiting his May 5 trial over sex trafficking charges. tags : entertainment hollywood Sean Diddy Combs Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:08 IST News movies Sean 'Diddy' Combs Wanted This Woman 'Dead In A Trunk'; Docuseries Makes Shocking Revelation Read More

title: R Madhavan Talks About His Bond With Tamil Superstar Ajith Kumar
summary: Ajith Kumar’s team, Racing by Bas Koeten, secured third place in the 991 category of the 24H Dubai 2025, and Ajith himself won the Spirit of the Race award in the GT4 category.
full_content: R Madhavan Talks About His Bond With Tamil Superstar Ajith Kumar Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:13 IST Ajith Kumar’s team, Racing by Bas Koeten, secured third place in the 991 category of the 24H Dubai 2025, and Ajith himself won the Spirit of the Race award in the GT4 category. reset Follow us on Google News R Madhavan was in Dubai to witness the race. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar made the country proud with their power-packed performance in the 24H Dubai 2025. His team, Racing by Bas Koeten, secured third place in the 991 category of the 24H Dubai 2025, and Ajith himself won the Spirit of the Race award in the GT4 category. After his victory, the actor proudly waved the Indian flag, with his wife Shalini and Bollywood actor, R Madhavan, who were cheering him on from the sidelines. Madhavan, who is a friend and long-time admirer of Ajith, never misses an opportunity to share his admiration for the racing star. related stories During the event, a heartwarming photo of R. Madhavan hugging Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar also surfaced online. It has gone immensely viral, capturing the close bond between the two. Now, the actor spoke to a media portal and talked about this touching photo. In an interview with Hindustan Times, the actor stated, “I’ve been a huge admirer of him for a long time. He’s a friend. When he was in Dubai, I happened to be there too, so I made sure to go and cheer him on." Expressing his love and bond with Ajith, Madhavan continues saying, “He’s an extraordinary human being—a man of grit and determination and someone who makes things happen in the most decent way possible. He’s not just following his passion but also making our country proud by holding the tricolour on a podium, which is rare in motorsport. That’s something really special, and I wanted to make sure I’m there for him. Also, I wanted to bring attention to the sport and Ajith’s achievement and hopefully help make the sport more popular." View this post on Instagram A post shared by R. Madhavan (@actormaddy) On the professional front, Ajith Kumar has multiple projects lined up on his plate. He is gearing up for the release of Vidaamuayarchi, which is expected to be released in February. Next, he has the highly anticipated film Good Bad Ugly, directed by Adhik Ravichandran. It is set to release on April 10. Madhavan, on the other hand, starred in the recently released film Hisaab Barabar, which dropped on Zee5 today. Now, he has Karan Singh Tyagi’s untitled film in the pipeline. Co-starring Akshay Kumar and Ananya Panday, the film revolves around the untold story of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and former president of the Indian National Congress. tags : bollywood R Madhavan regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 18:07 IST News movies R Madhavan Talks About His Bond With Tamil Superstar Ajith Kumar Read More

title: Did Ali Fazal Just Drop A Hint On Mirzapur: The Film?
summary: Ali Fazal uploaded a selfie with his co-stars from the series Shweta Tripathi and Shriya Pilgaonkar.
full_content: Did Ali Fazal Just Drop A Hint On Mirzapur: The Film? Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:58 IST Ali Fazal uploaded a selfie with his co-stars from the series Shweta Tripathi and Shriya Pilgaonkar. reset Follow us on Google News Ali Fazal was in the lead role in the Mirzapur series. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Ali Fazal recently teased an exciting update about the highly anticipated Mirzapur: The Film. Announced by Prime Video last year, the film has been the subject of much speculation, with fans eagerly wondering if Fazal will reprise his role. In an Instagram post, he shared a cute selfie with his Mirzapur co-stars, Shweta Tripathi and Shriya Pilgaonkar, alongside a detailed note. In the post, the actor not only discussed the upcoming film but also showered praise on Jaideep Ahlawat’s series Paatal Lok. The note begins with, “As Mirzapur becomes the highest-watched content of 2024 among all platforms I am reminded of the sheer goodness and craftsmanship we all have shared over the years amongst us enthusiasts." Continuing, he also mentioned learning to support each other instead of spreading hate. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by ali fazal (@alifazal9) Ali Fazal recently watched Jaideep Ahlawat’s series, Paatal Lok. About the series, the actor went on writing, “I think it’s the best damn show ever to come out of the subcontinent. I think narratives experienced are more valued than those witnessed (I think I mean it in the view and feel it way, don’t go out really experiencing sh*t plz)." Speaking of his Mirzapur co-stars Shweta and Shriya in the photo, Ali Fazal admitted to admire them. The actor went on to share that he observed how the actresses’ lives pan out from afar while also expressing love for them. The note further read, “There are some amazing photos I have with everyone from Mirzapur but then I’ll have to release a freakin coffee table book – you’ll have to wait for that. And they all know I love them more than I can show." Ali further extended his gratitude to Mirzapur creators for making him meet with his co-stars and team of the show. Concluding, he teased fans and wrote, “Movie updates coming soon." Mirzapur: The Film was officially announced through a video that featured Pankaj Tripathi, Ali Fazal and Divyenndu in the lead roles. Directed by Gurmmeet Singh, the highly anticipated is slated to release in cinemas in 2026. As for the series with the same name, the third season was released last year. Meanwhile, the second season of the crime thriller Paatal Lok was released recently on Amazon Prime Video. Jaideep Ahlawat who plays a lead role in the show has been earning applause for his nuanced performance. tags : Ali Fazal bollywood mirzapur Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:58 IST News movies Did Ali Fazal Just Drop A Hint On Mirzapur: The Film? title: Ananya Panday, Kartik Aaryan Reunite For Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri
summary: Initially, rumours were rife that Janhvi Kapoor would star opposite Kartik Aaryan.
full_content: Ananya Panday, Kartik Aaryan Reunite For Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:58 IST Initially, rumours were rife that Janhvi Kapoor would star opposite Kartik Aaryan. reset Follow us on Google News Ananya and Kartik have previously worked in Pati Patni Aur Woh.  (Photo Credits: Instagram) Bollywood heartthrob Kartik Aaryan made Christmas merrier for his fans after the announcement of his upcoming romantic comedy. On Christmas Eve, filmmaker Karan Johar annnounced that they are teaming up for the biggest love story of 2026—Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri. Ever since the film’s announcement, it has been hogging the limelight, as every top actress in B-Town has been attempting to bag the lead role alongside the Bhool Bhulaiyaa actor. Initially, rumours were rife that Janhvi Kapoor would star opposite Kartik Aaryan. Later, it was stated that Ananya Panday and Sharvari were leading the race. related stories As per the latest development, Ananya Panday has been locked in for Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri. Bollywood Hungama, in its report, mentioned that a source close to the film revealed that Ananya Panday, who previously shared the screen with Kartik in 2019’s Pati Patni Aur Woh, has bagged the role. The source said, “Kartik and Karan were looking for an actress with strong pull in the youth, and after contemplating the names, they have locked Ananya to play the female lead. Ananya and Kartik are a successful pair, and this would extend their partnership further." This isn’t it. The source further claimed that Kartik will be sharing the screen space with Sharvari again. He will apparently be seen with the Munjya actor in Pati Patni Aur Woh 2. “While Ananya is doing Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri, Kartik has promised another film to Sharvari. The duo will be teaming up on another love story by the end of 2025. Kartik is clear to maintain equations with all his female co-stars, and a promise made now will be fulfilled soon. He has also offered Pati Patni Aur Woh 2 to Sharvari," the source told Bollywood Hungama. Coming to Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri, the film is scheduled to go on floors in May 2025. Starring Kartik Aaryan and Ananya Panday in the lead, the film is directed by Satyaprem Ki Katha fame Sameer Vidhwans. The rom-com, produced by Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, is slated for release in 2026. Talking about Ananya Panday’s work front, she will be next seen with Akshay Kumar and R. Madhavan in an upcoming untitled film. The Karan Singh Tyagi directorial revolves around the untold story of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and former president of the Indian National Congress. The film is all set to release in cinemas on March 14. tags : ananya panday bollyhwood entertainment Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:56 IST News movies Ananya Panday, Kartik Aaryan Reunite For Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri Read More

title: Girls Will Be Girls Fame Preeti Panigrahi Advocates For Empowerment On National Girl Child Day: 'The Strength Of Women...'
summary: On National Girl Child Day, Girls Will Be Girls actress Preeti Panigrahi emphasizes the power of granting girls the freedom to explore their dreams and live authentically.
full_content: Girls Will Be Girls Fame Preeti Panigrahi Advocates For Empowerment On National Girl Child Day: 'The Strength Of Women...' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:54 IST On National Girl Child Day, Girls Will Be Girls actress Preeti Panigrahi emphasizes the power of granting girls the freedom to explore their dreams and live authentically. reset Follow us on Google News Preeti Panigrahi, star of Girls Will Be Girls, celebrates National Girl Child Day by advocating for women’s empowerment and the importance of creating spaces for girls to thrive. On National Girl Child Day, actress Preeti Panigrahi took the opportunity to reflect on the power of granting girls the freedom to explore their dreams and define their own paths. Known for her commitment to gender equality and her ability to bring authentic stories to life, Preeti continues to use her platform to amplify the voices of young girls and women. In her message, Preeti emphasized the importance of creating spaces where girls can thrive on their own terms. She shared, “National Girl Child Day is a day to celebrate the strength and spirit of every girl. It’s not always about challenging norms in big, visible ways. Sometimes, the act of simply being who we are without apology, without compromise, is the most profound form of resistance in a world that constantly tries to dictate who we should be." related stories Preeti also highlighted the transformative power of women supporting one another, “Every girl deserves the space to just be, to exist as herself, to grow, and to thrive. And when women support each other in that journey, we create unshakable strength," she stated. Preeti’s sentiments align closely with the themes of her recent film, Girls Will Be Girls. Written and directed by Shuchi Talati and produced by Ali Fazal and Richa Chadha, the film boldly challenges societal expectations and explores the beauty of self-discovery. Preeti’s performance in the film has been widely praised for its depth and vulnerability, capturing the complexities of women’s journeys in a patriarchal society. Her portrayal earned her the Special Jury Award for Acting at the 2024 Sundance Film Festival, solidifying her reputation as a promising and thought-provoking talent. For Preeti, the heart of both her work and her advocacy lies in fostering connections among women. She remarked, “There’s nothing stronger than women uplifting each other. When we stand together, we create a world where every girl feels seen, heard, and supported. It’s in those connections that true empowerment begins." National Girl Child Day, observed annually on January 24, is a significant day in India dedicated to promoting awareness about the rights, education, health, and well-being of girl children. Established by the Ministry of Women and Child Development in 2008, this day aims to highlight the importance of empowering girls and eliminating the deep-rooted inequalities they face in various spheres of life. Each year, the government and various organizations launch campaigns and initiatives focusing on themes such as “Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao" (Save the Daughter, Educate the Daughter) and other important initiatives. tags : bollywood National Girl child Day Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:54 IST News movies Girls Will Be Girls Fame Preeti Panigrahi Advocates For Empowerment On National Girl Child Day: 'The Strength Of Women...' title: Kapil Sharma, Rajpal Yadav Death Threat Case May Be Transferred To CBI As IP Address Traced To Pakistan | Exclusive
summary: News18 has the FIRST exclusive statement from the police regarding the death threats sent to Kapil Sharma and Rajpal Yadav via email. Read on!
full_content: Kapil Sharma, Rajpal Yadav Death Threat Case May Be Transferred To CBI As IP Address Traced To Pakistan | Exclusive Reported By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:59 IST News18 has the FIRST exclusive statement from the police regarding the death threats sent to Kapil Sharma and Rajpal Yadav via email. Read on! reset Follow us on Google News Kapil Sharma and Rajpal Yadav received death threats from Pakistan via email. Comedian Kapil Sharma, choreographer Remo D’Souza, singer Sugandha Mishra and actor Rajpal Yadav recently received death threats through email. The police have now given their first exclusive statement to News18 regarding the alarming news. The authorities confirmed that they are actively investigating the matter, treating the threats with utmost seriousness, and taking necessary steps to ensure the safety of the celebrities involved. They have also pointed the origin of the email to Pakistan and hinted that the case may be transferred to the CBI (Central Bureau of Investigation). An FIR was registered at the Amboli Police Station filing against an unidentified individual under Section 351(3) of the Bombay Police Act (BNS). related stories Sadashiv Nikam, Senior PI of the Amboli police station, told us exclusively, “We have written to our zonal officers and the communication is all getting forwarded to the CBI. We are keeping them in loop since it’s an international case but they aren’t actively involved yet. It will take some time to identify the sender of this email. But it’s true, the threat email was real. He has written his name as Bishnu. Now we don’t know if it’s a real person or somebody playing mischief. That is yet to be confirmed. The police are taking this case very seriously and we will definitely find the culprit. The investigation is still ongoing as of now." Sadashiv Nikam added, “First we had received the complaint of Rajpal Yadav that we lodged on December 17. Then there was a threat message to Kapil Sharma and his team members as well. They approached us and we immediately filed the FIR and started the investigation by joining hands with the cyber police and other officers. As of now, they are accessing the data of that IP. The IP location has been traced to Pakistan and that is why we need the CBI to intervene. But this will take time because gaining information from Pakistan is very difficult." He also revealed, “The threats sent to Sugandha Mishra and Remo D’Souza has been lodged in the Oshiwara police station." This all started in December when Kapil Sharma, along with other celebrities received a death threat via email signed off under the name “BISHNU." As per the reports, the email read, “We are monitoring your recent activities and we believe it is important that we bring to your attention a sensitive matter. This is not a publicity stunt or an attempt to harass you, we urge you to treat this message with utmost seriousness and confidentiality." The sender demanded a response within 8 hours, warning them of the consequences on personal and professional fronts. tags : bollywood Kapil Sharma Rajpal yadav Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:54 IST News movies Kapil Sharma, Rajpal Yadav Death Threat Case May Be Transferred To CBI As IP Address Traced To Pakistan | Exclusive Read More

title: Miley Cyrus’s Brother Trace Pens Emotional Letter, Expresses Concern Over Father Billy Ray Cyrus’ Health
summary: Billy Ray Cyrus’ son revealed that their family has been worried about him, especially after his performance at President Donald Trump's inauguration.
full_content: Miley Cyrus’s Brother Trace Pens Emotional Letter, Expresses Concern Over Father Billy Ray Cyrus’ Health Published By : sahas Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:20 IST Billy Ray Cyrus’ son revealed that their family has been worried about him, especially after his performance at President Donald Trump's inauguration. reset Follow us on Google News Billy Ray Cyrus’ unusual behaviour on stage raised concerns among many viewers. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Trace Cyrus, son of singer Billy Ray Cyrus , shared an emotional open letter to his father, showing concern for his well being. In the lengthy note, Trace revealed that their family has been “genuinely worried" about Billy, especially after his disastrous performance at President Donald Trump’s inauguration. Trace mentioned that he could barely recognise him during the performance and pleaded with him to take help. Trace mentioned Billy Ray Cyrus’ absence has hurt the family, especially his daughter Noah, who still misses her father. Trace wrote the message with a heavy heart and hoped that it’ll show their love and worry. Trace and his siblings still remember the good times with their father and hope he will come back soon. related stories Sharing a childhood picture with father, Trace wrote, “Since my earliest memories, all I can remember is being obsessed with you and thinking you were the coolest person ever. I wanted to be just like you. The day you adopted me was the happiest day of my life. Sadly the man that I wanted so desperately to be just like I barely recognize now. It seems this world has beaten you down and it’s become obvious to everyone but you. You may be upset with me for posting this but I really could care less at this point. Me and the girls have been genuinely worried about you for years but you’ve pushed all of us away." “Noah desperately has wanted you to be a part of her life and you haven’t even been there for her. That’s your baby girl. She deserves better. Somehow just like me, she still idolizes you though. We are all hanging on to memories of the man we once knew and hoping for the day he returns. You’re not healthy Dad and everyone is noticing it. Just like I showed up for you at mamaws funeral when you didn’t expect me to I’m still here right now," Trace Cyrus explained. Trace wrote the note with a heavy heart, hoping his father understands that it comes from love and fear of losing him too soon. He also informed Billy Ray Cyrus that he’s been sober for over a year and a half, and although he doesn’t know exactly what his father is going through, he believes he can relate and wants to help. Trace urged his dad to reach out when he’s ready, until then, he will keep praying for him. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Trace Cyrus (@tracecyrus) Billy Ray Cyrus performed at the Liberty Ball during President Donald Trump’s inauguration on January 20. While technical issues affected several other performers, Cyrus’s unusual behaviour on stage raised concerns among many viewers. Other than Trace, Billy Ray Cyrus has two daughters, Noah and Miley Cyrus, with his ex-wife Tish. He also has a daughter, Brandi Cyrus, from a previous relationship. tags : entertainment hollywood miley cyrus Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:51 IST News movies Miley Cyrus’s Brother Trace Pens Emotional Letter, Expresses Concern Over Father Billy Ray Cyrus’ Health Read More

title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu On Teaming Up WIth Raj & DK For Rakht Brahmand: 'They’ve Spoiled Me With Challenges’ | Exclusive
summary: Samantha Ruth Prabhu, on the sideline of a promotional event of her pickleball team, Chennai Super Champs, spoke to CNN-News18 about returning to Tamil, teaming up with Raj and DK for Rakht Brahmand, and more.
full_content: Samantha Ruth Prabhu On Teaming Up WIth Raj & DK For Rakht Brahmand: 'They’ve Spoiled Me With Challenges’ | Exclusive Reported By : Kirubhakar Purushothaman News18.com Edited By: Yatamanyu Narain Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:40 IST Samantha Ruth Prabhu, on the sideline of a promotional event of her pickleball team, Chennai Super Champs, spoke to CNN-News18 about returning to Tamil, teaming up with Raj and DK for Rakht Brahmand, and more. reset Follow us on Google News In an exclusive interview, Samantha Ruth Prabhu discusses her love for pickleball, her return to Tamil cinema, and reuniting with Raj and DK for Rakht Brahmand. Actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu is donning several hats now. She dabbles between her acting career, her role as a producer, and as the owner of Chennai Super Champs, the pickleball team that is part of the ongoing World Pickleball League. However, Samantha doesn’t betray any sense of urgency or wear-out as CNN-News18 caught up with her for a small chat during the jersey launch of her team at Sathyabama University in Chennai. The actress revealed the reason behind owning a pickleball team, her return to Tamil cinema after a long gap, and teaming up with Raj and DK again for Rakht Brahma. Here’s an excerpt from the interview: related stories When did you exactly fall in love with this sport? When I realized it wasn’t intimidating (laughs) Growing up, my focus was always on education, never on sports—never picked up any baggage, ever. So, I was always very intimidated by it. Again, I hate losing. I can’t lose. A sore loser. So, picking up a sport later in life means losing a lot, which is not my cup of tea. But there’s something about pickleball that isn’t intimidating. Something about pickleball players who, they’re warm, they’re mighty, they’re angry, competitive. It’s also gender and age-agnostic. Among the pickleball players, 45% are women. And it’s also fun to watch because it’s not very fast, but fast enough. But playing a game is different from owning a team? Yeah, I am gutsy like that (laughs). As an actor, for the past 15 to 16 years, everything has been about me for the longest time. Now, it’s time to be part of something bigger than me. I’m ambitious, but ambition should also have to tie you up with a higher purpose. I believe that anything that I put my money in, or my heart, has to have a greater impact on society. Otherwise, it’s useless. If not now, then when? So, anything that I do… Most of my business projects are centred around physical fitness. It all ties in very well together in this. Tell us about the Chennai Super Champs? Chennai Super Champs was a no-brainer. The first team that I wanted was immediately Chennai. I had to have Chennai. I remember being asked about other teams other than Chennai. I was like, “NO WAY." From playing on the streets of Chennai to representing the city. It has been a journey. Chennai gave me my never-die and never-give-up attitude. It gave me resilience and an equal playing field. I didn’t even know about my bad socioeconomic status back then, because Chennai never makes you feel that way. Chennai is an equal playing field for everyone. And that’s what I love about this city. That’s why I always come back and give back to the city. Is there a reason the name “Chennai Super Champs" sort of rhymes with one of the most popular teams? Yes. It does for the same reason. If you’re going for the dream, might as well just go the whole way. So why not? It’s been a while since we saw you in Tamil cinema? (Samantha was last seen in Kollywood in Vijay Sethupathi’s 2022 film Kaathuvaakula Rendu Kaadhal). Right. I know. Well, I realized that it’s easy to do many films. But… I’m at the point of time in my life where every film must feel like the last. It must have that kind of effect. If I don’t 100% believe in it, I can’t even get myself to do it. So I am waiting. Trust me. More than anyone else. I am waiting for that wonderful film. And I don’t want to let anyone down or let myself down with my choices. You’re teaming up with Raj and DK again for Rakht Brahmand. So thoughts on that? I think with Family Man, I was able to portray something that I’ve never done before. Again with Citadel Honey Bunny, it was something that I hadn’t done before. And again with Rakht  Brahmand, things are more challenging. Raj and DK have spoiled me for good reason. They are the ones who inspired me to want more and more challenges. When I go to work every day, it is extremely fulfilling as an actor. For being able to give that much to the world. And if I don’t get that feeling every day, I don’t want to go to work. tags : bollywood OTT Raj and DK regional cinema Samantha Ruth Prabhu Showsha Exclusives Location : Chennai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:40 IST News movies Samantha Ruth Prabhu On Teaming Up WIth Raj & DK For Rakht Brahmand: 'They’ve Spoiled Me With Challenges’ | Exclusive Read More

title: Kylie Jenner 'Can't Wait To Celebrate' Timothee Chalamet's Oscar Nomination
summary: Kylie Jenner wasn't present with Chalamet when the nominations were announced. However, she kept track of the announcement.
full_content: Kylie Jenner 'Can't Wait To Celebrate' Timothee Chalamet's Oscar Nomination Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:34 IST Kylie Jenner wasn't present with Chalamet when the nominations were announced. However, she kept track of the announcement. reset Follow us on Google News Timothée Chalamet has been nominated in the Best Actor category. (Photo Credits: X) Timothée Chalamet has bagged the Best Actor nomination at the upcoming Academy Awards for his performance in A Complete Unknown. With this feat, Chalamet also became the youngest multiple Best Actor nominee since James Dean, who was posthumously nominated for 1955’s period family drama East of Eden and 1956’s Giant. James Dean passed away in a car crash at the young age of 24. He was driving in his Porsche Spyder when the car got into a head-on collision on the California highway, leading to his untimely demise in 1955. While Timothée Chalamet’s nomination for the upcoming Oscars has already garnered a lot of praise and appreciation from his fans and friends, his girlfriend Kylie Jenner also can’t help but “scream with excitement" over the actor’s recent milestone. related stories Timothée Chalamet and Kylie Jenner having an intimate dinner with friends in Paris. pic.twitter.com/QMVGe1jQ9g — Timothée Chalamet Photos (@chalametphotos) January 16, 2025 According to a Page Six report, Jenner wasn’t present with Chalamet when he learned about his second Best Actor nomination but she was duly watching the announcements and lost it when she saw her boyfriend’s name. “Jenner was screaming with excitement. She had a feeling that Chalamet was going to be nominated but actually seeing his name pop up on the TV screen was incredible. She is ecstatic and is so proud of him," the source told the outlet. https://x.com/kyliejgfs/status/1872707706722906386 Oscars Best Actor Nominations On Thursday, Timothée Chalamet bagged a nominee in the Best Actor category for his latest release A Complete Unknown. He played the character of a young Bob Dylan in James Mangold’s musical biopic. Prior to this, Chalamet got his first-ever Oscar nomination for his 2018 drama Call Me By Your Name when he was just 22, making him the youngest person to be nominated at that time. This year, the actor will be competing against the likes of Adrien Brody (The Brutalist), Colman Domingo (Sing Sing), Ralph Fiennes (Conclave), and Sebastian Stan (The Apprentice). tags : hollywood Kylie Jenner Oscars Timothee Chalamet Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:34 IST News movies Kylie Jenner 'Can't Wait To Celebrate' Timothee Chalamet's Oscar Nomination Read More
