title: 'I've Earned The Moment': American Idol Winner Kelly Clarkson On Her Own Record Label
summary: Kelly Clarkson announced her record label on her talk show, On The Kelly Clarkson Show.
full_content: 'I've Earned The Moment': American Idol Winner Kelly Clarkson On Her Own Record Label Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:29 IST Kelly Clarkson announced her record label on her talk show, On The Kelly Clarkson Show. reset Follow us on Google News Clarkson provided updates on her creating music for record label. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Celebrated singer and popular talk show host Kelly Clarkson is ready to kickstart a new phase in her musical career by launching her own record label. Clarkson, who has been working tirelessly in the music industry since becoming the breakout star of American Idol in 2002 is now setting her sights on conquering another feat with her upcoming record label, which she announced on her talk show. During the Wednesday episode of On The Kelly Clarkson Show, the singer sat down with actress Keke Palmer and revealed her plans. During the conversation with Palmer, who also started her own record label Big Bosses Entertainment in 2017, Clarkson opened up about the challenges that she has faced while creating new music. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by The Kelly Clarkson Show (@kellyclarksonshow) “I’m so much older than you…and it’s the first time in my career, and I just now started my own label and I’m putting out my own stuff. And I’ve had some good teams, like, to work with, but there is nothing like being that 10-year-old again and being excited and nobody saying, ‘Oh, you should do this’ and ‘You should do this," she told Palmer, who further noted that people don’t know the hardships behind creating their own label. Acknowledging the difficulties shared in this journey, Kelly Clarkson admitted, “I’m putting together a music video, and I’m like, ‘Wait, I forgot to do what?’ I just now started it. I started writing, and I was like, ‘Wait, how do I put this out now?’ And then, I was like, ‘Well, I guess through me.'" Kelly Clarkson added that she felt like “earning the moment." It is worth mentioning that Kelly Clarkson after winning American Idol back in 2002 signed a deal with RCA, going forward to release seven studio albums including Thankful, Breakaway, My December, All I Ever Wanted, Stronger, Wrapped in Red, and Piece By Piece. In 2017, she left RCA and signed with Atlantic Groups, going on to drop more albums. Her most recent release, Chemistry came out in June 2023. tags : entertainment hollywood Kelly Clarkson movie Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:29 IST News movies 'I've Earned The Moment': American Idol Winner Kelly Clarkson On Her Own Record Label Read More

title: Varun Dhawan Makes A Special Vow To Wife Natasha On Their Wedding Anniversary: 'I Promise To Take...'
summary: Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal are also parents to baby girl Lara Dhawan.
full_content: Varun Dhawan Makes A Special Vow To Wife Natasha On Their Wedding Anniversary: 'I Promise To Take...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:29 IST Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal are also parents to baby girl Lara Dhawan. reset Follow us on Google News Varun and Natasha are childhood sweethearts. Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal are celebrating their fourth wedding anniversary. To mark this special day, Varun had made a promise to Natasha. Varun Dhawan has vowed to Natasha that he will take her on a holiday on their next anniversary. Varun Dhawan took to Instagram to share photos with Natasha Dalal to celebrate their special day. He wrote, “My ride or die. I promise to take u on a holiday next anniversary." In one of the photos, Varun and Natasha could be seen cuddling with their dog on a boat. Another photo featured them serving major couple goals on a beach. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by VarunDhawan (@varundvn) Varun Dhawan and designer Natasha Dalal sealed their longtime love in the holy bond of matrimony on January 24, 2021. After his wedding, Varun Dhawan also took to his Instagram account to share a post for his wife, Natasha Dalal, along with two beautiful pictures from their wedding. title: Paatal Lok Season 2’s Villain Prashant Tamang Is An Indian Idol Winner And A Former Cop | Watch
summary: Paatal Lok Season 2 on Prime Video has captivated audiences with its gripping narrative and standout performances.
full_content: Paatal Lok Season 2’s Villain Prashant Tamang Is An Indian Idol Winner And A Former Cop | Watch Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:24 IST Paatal Lok Season 2 on Prime Video has captivated audiences with its gripping narrative and standout performances. reset Follow us on Google News From Indian Idol winner to Paatal Lok 2’s chilling sniper, Prashant Tamang’s journey is one of resilience and transformation. The highly anticipated Paatal Lok Season 2 has begun streaming on Prime Video, and while Jaideep Ahlawat’s brilliant portrayal of Inspector Hathiram Chaudhary continues to grab attention, another star has emerged—Prashant Tamang, playing the chilling sniper Daniel Lecho. If the name rings a bell, it’s because Prashant Tamang was the winner of Indian Idol in 2007. Known for his soulful voice and humble persona, his victory became a defining moment in his life, especially among the Nepali-speaking community. Now, he has transitioned from singing to acting, earning widespread acclaim for his portrayal of a deadly and pivotal character in the crime thriller. related stories Sniper Daniel from Paatal Lok is actually Indian Idol 2007 winner Prashant Tamang.What an amazing talent 🔥 pic.twitter.com/lhOf1imKs1 — Johns (@JohnyBravo183) January 23, 2025 Prashant Tamang’s story is one of resilience and transformation. Born to Madan and Rupa Tamang, he stepped into adulthood early following his father’s untimely demise. Leaving his studies at St. Robert’s School in Darjeeling, he joined the Kolkata Police as a constable, where he continued to nurture his love for music by performing in the police orchestra. In 2007, he took a leap of faith and auditioned for the third season of Indian Idol. His heartfelt performances and grounded demeanor struck a chord with audiences across the country, leading him to win the title. His victory not only catapulted him to fame but also brought immense pride to the Nepali-speaking community. After his Indian Idol win, Prashant released his debut album Dhanyavad, featuring songs in Nepali and Hindi. His career flourished with nationwide and international concert tours, including performances in the United States. He also lent his voice to Nepali films like Himmat 2. Prashant’s foray into acting began with his debut in the Nepali film Gorkha Paltan (2010), which became a box office success. He followed it with films like Angalo Yo Maya Ko (2011), Kina Maya Ma (2011), and Nishani (2014), a tribute to the bravery of Gorkha soldiers during the Kargil War. In 2025, Prashant took on a new challenge by joining the cast of Paatal Lok Season 2 as Daniel Lecho, a skilled sniper and a key antagonist. His nuanced performance has added depth to the show’s intense narrative, earning praise from fans and critics alike. Season 2 begins with the shocking murder of a North-Eastern businessman during a high-profile event in Delhi. Investigators Hathiram Chaudhary (Jaideep Ahlawat) and Imran Ansari (Ishwak Singh) follow a trail that takes them to Nagaland, where they encounter Daniel Lecho. While Jaideep Ahlawat and Ishwak Singh’s chemistry remains a highlight, Prashant’s chilling portrayal of Daniel has been a standout performance, marking a significant milestone in his acting career. Fans have praised Season 2 for its darker tone and layered storytelling that delves deeper into crime and corruption. Directed by Avinash Arun Dhaware and created by Sudip Sharma, the season introduces compelling new characters played by Tillotama Shome, Nagesh Kukunoor, and Jahnu Barua, alongside returning stars Jaideep Ahlawat, Ishwak Singh, and Gul Panag. Premiering on January 17, Paatal Lok Season 2 continues to captivate audiences with its gripping narrative and standout performances. Whether you’re drawn by Jaideep Ahlawat’s commanding presence or intrigued by Prashant Tamang’s evolution from reality TV star to accomplished actor, the season promises to keep you hooked till the very end. tags : bollywood Indian Idol OTT Pataal Lok television Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:24 IST News movies Paatal Lok Season 2’s Villain Prashant Tamang Is An Indian Idol Winner And A Former Cop | Watch Read More

title: Emilia Perez Dominates Oscars, Here's Where You Can Watch The Musical Starring Zoe Saldana, Selena Gomez
summary: Jacques Audiard directorial Emilia Perez is leading Oscars with 13 nominations and here’s where to watch Zoe Saldana’s musical.
full_content: Emilia Perez Dominates Oscars, Here's Where You Can Watch The Musical Starring Zoe Saldana, Selena Gomez Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:14 IST Jacques Audiard directorial Emilia Perez is leading Oscars with 13 nominations and here’s where to watch Zoe Saldana’s musical. reset Follow us on Google News Emilia Perez follows a Mexican lawyer with a task to help the cartel boss and begin a new life. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The nominees for the 97th Academy Awards were recently revealed and the Spanish language thriller Emilia Perez is leading with an impressive 13 nominations. Starring Karla Sofia Gascon, Zoe Saldana, Selena Gomez, Adriana Paz, Mark Ivanir and Edgar Ramirez, the musical is now generating excitement as it competes with nine other movies, including Conclave, Wicked and Anora. After earning several awards at other shows, excitement for the Jacques Audiard directorial has reached a new level. Emilia Perez is now available to stream on OTT platforms, allowing viewers to enjoy it from the comfort of their homes. related stories Where to Watch: The intriguing film that follows the life of a Mexican lawyer tasked with an unconventional job to help a cartel boss retire and begin a new life is now available to stream on Netflix and Mubi. Although Emilia Perez has received praise for shedding light on an inspiring story and winning several awards, it has also faced criticism. Some questioned why a movie set in Mexico was directed by a French filmmaker and did not feature a single Mexican actor in the lead roles. As the controversy grew, Adriana Paz, who plays Emilia’s lover, Epifania, in the film, defended the project during an interview with IndieWire. She said, “I’ve heard people saying it’s offensive to Mexico. I really want to know why, because I didn’t feel that way. And I have questioned some people that I trust, not just as artists but as people, and they don’t feel that way, so I am trying to understand. The first time that I saw it, I told Jacques, ‘You’re a genius.’ I was crying, I felt moved, and I was, like, ‘I am so grateful that I’m part of this project’." “I really appreciate Emilia, because it’s a spectacle and its songs and dancing, but it’s not like any other musical. It’s not perfect dancing and a perfect sound. The music is dirty, full of pain, erratic, like the sensation of living in Mexico," Adriana Paz shared. Ahead of the Oscars, Emilia Perez won top honours at the Golden Globes, including the best original song and Zoe Saldana won an award in supporting female actor category. tags : entertainment hollywood Oscar Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:09 IST News movies Emilia Perez Dominates Oscars, Here's Where You Can Watch The Musical Starring Zoe Saldana, Selena Gomez Read More

title: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 14: Ram Charan’s Film Mints Rs 75 Lakh
summary: In the film, Ram Charan plays a dual role: a tough bureaucrat and a noble individual who works for societal betterment, while Kiara plays his love interest.
full_content: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 14: Ram Charan’s Film Mints Rs 75 Lakh Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:03 IST In the film, Ram Charan plays a dual role: a tough bureaucrat and a noble individual who works for societal betterment, while Kiara plays his love interest. reset Follow us on Google News Game Changer was released on January 10. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Game Changer, the Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer political action thriller had an impressive opening at the box office. Released on January 10, the film minted Rs 51 crore across all languages in India. But, it saw a gradual decline in the numbers from Day 2. As per the latest report by Sacnilk, it only managed to collect Rs 75 lakh on its second Thursday, taking the total collection to Rs 128.85 crore. Although the film is inching closer to the Rs 130 crore mark, it still seems difficult to achieve the goal as Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya’s patriotic action thriller Sky Force was released today, January 24. related stories Game Changer, earlier, faced competition from Sonu Sood’s action thriller Fateh, which was also released on January 10. A week later, Ajay Devgn’s Azaad, and Kangana Ranaut’s Emergency opened to theatres. Adding to the woes, the Ram Charan starrer fell victim to piracy on its release day. An HD print was leaked online, revealing the key points on the first day itself. Game Changer producer Dil Raju complained to cyber police, alleging extortion attempts by the pirates before the leak. Helmed by Shankar, Game Changer also stars Anjali, SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Samuthirakani, Sunil, and Naveen Chandra in significant roles. In the film, Ram Charan is seen playing a dual role: a tough bureaucrat and a noble individual who works for societal betterment, while Kiara plays his love interest. The 39-year-old actor, on the occasion of Makar Sankranti 2025, on Instagram and expressed his heartfelt gratitude to all the fans for showering love to Game Changer and director Shankar for making him a part of the film. Meanwhile, Ram Charan will be next seen in director Buchi Babu Sana’s next anticipated project opposite actress Janhvi Kapoor. Tentatively titled RC16, the film will be going on floors soon. However, an official release date of the film is yet to be confirmed by the makers. tags : entertainment kiara advani Ram Charan regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:03 IST News movies Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 14: Ram Charan’s Film Mints Rs 75 Lakh Read More

title: Meet Naomika Saran, Rajesh Khanna's Granddaughter At Sky Force Screening
summary: Naomika Saran is the daughter of former actress Rinke Khanna.
full_content: Meet Naomika Saran, Rajesh Khanna's Granddaughter At Sky Force Screening Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:00 IST Naomika Saran is the daughter of former actress Rinke Khanna. reset Follow us on Google News Naomika Saran stole the limelight at Sky Force screening. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The makers of Sky Force, starring Akshay Kumar , hosted a special screening on Thursday night, which saw the star cast and several Bollywood celebrities in attendance. Akshay Kumar was accompanied by his wife, Twinkle Khanna, for the event. Also spotted at the screening was Dimple Kapadia, who came to support her son-in-law. Joining them was Naomika Saran, whose magnetic presence has taken the Internet by storm. related stories Who Is Naomika Saran? Naomika Saran is the granddaughter of legendary actors Rajesh Khanna and Dimple Kapadia. She is the daughter of Rajesh and Dimple’s younger daughter Rinke Khanna. Settled abroad, Rinke also forayed into the entertainment industry like her sister Twinkle Khanna and mother Dimple Kapadia. After her appearance in a few films, she quit the industry and got married to Samir Saran in 2003. Naomika reportedly completed her schooling in Gurugram, Haryana. Currently, she is pursuing her studies in the New York University’s Tisch School Of The Arts, as per her Instagram bio. Naomika Saran prefers to stay low-key, away from the media’s attention. Despite being away from the industry, she often grabs the spotlight for her beauty and strong bond with Akshay Kumar’s son, Aarav. Additionally, her striking resemblance to her mother Rinke also keeps her in the limelight. Furthermore, her intriguing posts online continue to be a subject of admiration, mostly for her beautiful eyes which she has inherited from her legendary grandparents. Naomika Saran has over 97.8K followers on Instagram. Her followers’ list includes the likes of Ananya Panday, Navya Naveli Nanda, Orhan Awatramani aka Orry along with other star kids. Naomika Saran’s Viral Video With Dimple Kapadia Naomika Saran has been trending widely on social media following her appearance in the Sky Force screening last night. A video emerged online showcases her holding her grandmother Dimple Kapadia’s hands as they step out together after watching the film. For the screening, Naomika sported a stylish black sleeveless peplum top with double-toned denim jeans. Exchanging smiles with others present at the event, she looked beautiful and her chic ensemble highlighted her knack for fashion, effortlessly blending elegance and casual elements. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Snehkumar Zala (@snehzala) Meanwhile, Sky Force stars Akshay Kumar, Sara Ali Khan, Diana Penty and Veer Pahariya in the lead roles. title: Sanya Malhotra Is Proud Of Sky Force Director Abhishek Anil Kapur: ‘You Have Come A Long Way’
summary: Sanya Malhotra heaped praises on Sky Force’s director Abhishek Anil Kapur.
full_content: Sanya Malhotra Is Proud Of Sky Force Director Abhishek Anil Kapur: ‘You Have Come A Long Way’ Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 22:58 IST Sanya Malhotra heaped praises on Sky Force’s director Abhishek Anil Kapur. reset Follow us on Google News Sky Force marks Veer Pahariya’s debut. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Sanya Malhotra attended the screening of Sky Force last night in Mumbai. The film, featuring Akshay Kumar, Veer Pahariya, Sara Ali Khan and Nimrat Kaur, is based on India’s retaliatory strike on Pakistan’s Sargodha airbase during the 1965 Indo-Pakistani War. Impressed by the film, Sanya shared an elaborate note on Instagram Stories. In her note, she heaped praises on director Abhishek Anil Kapur who is making a debut through the patriotic drama. The film also marks Veer Pahariya’s Bollywood debut. The note read, “Sky force is truly a force to reckon with! I’m beyond proud of my friend for his incredible debut as a director. Abhishek Kapur and I first met on the Dangal set and it’s been amazing to watch this journey and growth over the years. Shek, mere bhaiiii you have come such a long way and I couldn’t be happier for you. Congratulations on this beautiful new beginning, the sky is the limit for you! Wishing you all the success and love." related stories Sanya Malhotra’s long-awaited film Mrs has finally partnered with an OTT platform in India after several years of participating in film festivals. Directed by Aarti Kadav, the award-winning film is set to release on ZEE5. Earlier this week, the makers of Mrs released the official teaser. It also featured Kanwaljit Singh and Nishant Dahiya in important roles. Notably, Mrs is a remake of the Malayalam film The Great Indian Kitchen (2021) which was headlined by Nimisha Sajayan. The description attached to the teaser posted on YouTube read, “A woman finds her voice and dreams lost when she marries a middle-class doctor and is expected to become a housewife. What happens next? Coming Soon!" Sanya Malhotra also has Varun Dhawan and Janhvi Kapoor’s Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari in her kitty. Helmed by Shashank Khaitan, the film also stars Rohit Saraf. A source close to the film informed Pinkvilla, “It’s a pure family entertainer with romance in its backdrop, much like the kind of films that Shashank has made over the years. The premise of SSKTK is very close to the kind of films that Dharma is known for, as it celebrates love with colour, music, scale, and a strong star cast." Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari will be released on April 18. tags : bollywood Sanya Malhotra Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 16:37 IST News movies Sanya Malhotra Is Proud Of Sky Force Director Abhishek Anil Kapur: ‘You Have Come A Long Way’ Read More

title: National School of Drama Director Says Shah Rukh Khan Is A ‘Natakwala First, Superstar Later’
summary: Chittaranjan Tripathy acknowledged the courage it takes to carve a unique path in the competitive entertainment industry while lauding SRK’s unwavering belief in his abilities.
full_content: National School of Drama Director Says Shah Rukh Khan Is A ‘Natakwala First, Superstar Later’ Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:45 IST Chittaranjan Tripathy acknowledged the courage it takes to carve a unique path in the competitive entertainment industry while lauding SRK’s unwavering belief in his abilities. reset Follow us on Google News Tripathy is known for his role in Sacred Games. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Chittaranjan Tripathy, director of the National School of Drama (NSD), Delhi, has expressed his admiration for Shah Rukh Khan , calling him a ‘natakwala’ first and then a superstar. The Do Patti actor highlighted SRK’s incredible journey as “an ordinary person from an ordinary family rose to extraordinary heights." Speaking to PTI, Chittaranjan Tripathy said, “Shah Rukh Khan has done a lot of theatre with Barry John. I consider him a theatre person. I consider him a natakwala first, he is a superstar later." related stories Chittaranjan Tripathy acknowledged the courage it takes to carve a unique path in the competitive entertainment industry while lauding SRK’s unwavering belief in his abilities. Chittaranjan Tripathy, who himself is a renowned actor, shared that he feels happy that a theatre artist has become such a big superstar. He added, “I believe that an ordinary person from an ordinary family reached extraordinary heights, I see myself in him. I am like, ‘wow’, this is me even though I am not that. It is his money, but because he is a theatre person, I feel like this is me." Meanwhile, Chittaranjan Tripathy is known for his performances in films like Delhi 6, Phantom, Shaandaar, Talvaar, Shubh Mangal Saavdhaan, Jagga Jasoos, Dasvi and Yodha. Chittaranjan Tripathy garnered much appreciation for his role as Trivedi in the hit Netflix series Sacred Games. He was also a part of Shahid Kapoor’s thriller series Farzi. Talking about Shah Rukh Khan, the actor is currently busy prepping for the action thriller film tentatively titled King. The film, reportedly being directed by Siddharth Anand, also features Suhana Khan, Abhishek Bachchan and Munjya fame Abhay Verma. It was earlier supposed to be directed by Sujoy Ghosh. The production of the film is expected to begin by the end of this month. Recently, reports suggested that producer Dinesh Vijan approached SRK for the horror-comedy titled Chamunda. The film also stars Alia Bhatt. It is slated to be released in 2026. tags : bollywood entertainment Shah Rukh Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 16:36 IST News movies National School of Drama Director Says Shah Rukh Khan Is A ‘Natakwala First, Superstar Later’ Read More

full_content: Sharvari Seeks Blessing At The Siddhivinayak Temple With Family: ‘Just Have Faith’ Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 16:47 IST She emphasised how prayers are always answered and encouraged her fans to have faith. reset Follow us on Google News Sharvari will be next seen in Alpha. title: Rajpal Yadav Shares Emotional Statement After Father’s Demise: 'Lekin Unka Aashirwad Aur Jeevan...'
summary: Actor Rajpal Yadav mourns the loss of his father, Naurang Yadav, who passed away on January 24, 2025.
full_content: Rajpal Yadav Shares Emotional Statement After Father’s Demise: 'Lekin Unka Aashirwad Aur Jeevan...' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 16:20 IST Actor Rajpal Yadav mourns the loss of his father, Naurang Yadav, who passed away on January 24, 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Rajpal Yadav’s father, Naurang Yadav, passed away on January 24, 2025. The actor shared an emotional statement, paying tribute to his late father and reflecting on his profound influence. Actor Rajpal Yadav’s father, Naurang Yadav, passed away on January 24, 2025, at AIIMS, Delhi, where he had been admitted. The actor, who had just returned from Thailand a day before the unfortunate incident, issued an emotional statement, paying tribute to his late father and acknowledging his profound impact on his life. In his official statement, Rajpal Yadav expressed his grief, saying, “Saathiyon, aaj humari energy, humari shakti, humare jeevan ke yodha, humare pujya pita, aaj nahin hai hum logon ke beech me shaaririk roop se (Friends, today my energy, my power, the warrior of my life, my revered father, is not physically present among us)." related stories He continued, “Lekin unka aashirwad aur unse li hui jeevan me prerna, woh sadaa humare sath hi hai (But his blessings and the inspiration I gained from him will always remain with me)." The actor also thanked his well-wishers, saying, “I love you all. Aap sab ke aashirwad ke liye bahut, bahut dhanyawaad (Thank you very much for all your blessings)." Just days before his father’s passing, Rajpal Yadav and several other entertainment industry figures reportedly received threatening emails. According to ANI, the emails were traced to an IP address in Pakistan, prompting the police to register an FIR and launch an investigation. On the professional front, Rajpal Yadav was last seen in the 2024 action thriller Baby John, which featured Varun Dhawan, Jackie Shroff, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi, and a cameo by Salman Khan. Directed by Kalees and produced by Murad Khetani, Priya Atlee, and Jyoti Deshpande, the film was released on December 25, 2024, during the Christmas holiday season. Looking ahead, Rajpal Yadav is part of Welcome To The Jungle, the third installment of the beloved Welcome franchise. The comedy film, led by Akshay Kumar, promises another entertaining outing for fans of the series. tags : bollywood Rajpal yadav Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 16:20 IST News movies Rajpal Yadav Shares Emotional Statement After Father’s Demise: 'Lekin Unka Aashirwad Aur Jeevan...' title: Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Used To Be Scared Of Randeep Hooda: 'Voh Mera Bohot...'
summary: Randeep Hooda was Shahid Kapoor's senior at NSD.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Used To Be Scared Of Randeep Hooda: 'Voh Mera Bohot...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 15:56 IST Randeep Hooda was Shahid Kapoor's senior at NSD. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid joked about being scared of Randeep. Shahid Kapoor and Triptii Dimri will soon share screen space for the first time in Vishal Bhardwaj’s Arjun Ustara. Vikrant Massey will reportedly play the villain in the film. Nana Patekar and Randeep Hooda are also part of the project. During his Instagram Live, Shahid not only confirmed this cast but also recalled being scared of Randeep when they were students at the National School of Drama. Shahid Kapoor said on his Instagram Live, “Randeep Hooda is also there. How can I forget? He’s my buddy from his NSD days when I also visited. I’m very excited. This is my first time working with Randeep. We’ve never worked together. Hum logo ne actually bohot saari acting workshops Naseer uncle ke saath (Naseeruddin Shah) saath main ki thi. Voh mera bohot senior tha aur main bohot darta tha usse." related stories #ShahidKapoor spoke about his next project with Vishal Bhardwaj and revealed that Vikrant Massey will also be a part of the movie 🔥🤯 pic.twitter.com/H3ymRVANpR — 𝙃𝙖𝙧𝙨𝙝. (@shanaticharsh) January 23, 2025 As for the film, it was earlier reported that Shahid Kapoor will be portraying a don inspired by the real-life figure Hussain Ustara in the film. The actor reportedly underwent intensive combat training to prepare for the action sequences in the film. Not much else is known about the script of the film as of now. However, the collaboration between Triptii Dimri and Shahid Kapoor promises a cinematic spectacle, set against the underworld backdrop in the post-Independence era. With an intensive shooting schedule planned, the makers aim to wrap up production soon, targeting a grand release in 2025. Meanwhile, on the work front, Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Deva with Pooja Hegde. In Deva, Shahid plays a rebellious cop, while Pooja portrays a journalist. The film, helmed by Rosshan Andrrews and backed by Roy Kapur Films, also features Kubbra Sait and Pavail Gulati in significant roles. Deva will be released in theatres on January 31. As for Randeep Hooda, he will soon be seen sharing screen space with Hollywood star John Cena in the upcoming action thriller Matchbox. The film is currently being shot in Budapest. The actor will be reuniting with Extraction director Sam Hargrave with the movie, which marks their second collaboration following their 2020 Netflix hit. tags : bollywood randeep hooda Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:56 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Used To Be Scared Of Randeep Hooda: 'Voh Mera Bohot...' title: Sunny Deol’s Next Action Thriller Jaat To Hit The Screens On April 10
summary: The film will also feature celebrities like Vineet Kumar Singh, Saiyami Kher and Regina Cassandra.
full_content: Sunny Deol’s Next Action Thriller Jaat To Hit The Screens On April 10 Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:45 IST The film will also feature celebrities like Vineet Kumar Singh, Saiyami Kher and Regina Cassandra. reset Follow us on Google News Jaat will be released in Hindi, Tamil and Telugu languages. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The highly anticipated action thriller Jaat, starring Sunny Deol and Randeep Hooda in lead roles, has just revealed its official release date. Directed by Gopichand Malineni, the film will hit theatres on April 10, 2025. The 67-year-old actor took to Instagram to unveil a fresh poster of the movie, captioning it, “#JAAT GRAND RELEASE WORLDWIDE ON APRIL 10th In Hindi, Telugu & Tamil. MASS FEAST GUARANTEED." In the newly released poster, Sunny Deol is seen sporting a rugged look, with a rocket launcher slung over his shoulder and a helicopter looming in the background. The Gadar star dons an olive green jacket paired with matching trousers and a black T-shirt, completing his tough appearance with dark sunglasses. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sunny Deol (@iamsunnydeol) As soon as he shared the post, the comment section was swamped with reactions from fans and admirers. An Instagram user wrote, “Blockbuster Movie loading." Another one wrote, “Tabaahi." One of them wrote, “Jaat gonna rock." Backed by Mythri Movie Makers and People Media Factory, the film will also feature celebs like Vineet Kumar Singh, Saiyami Kher and Regina Cassandra. The official teaser for Jaat was unveiled in December last year, quickly garnering an overwhelming response from both fans and critics. The film promises an adrenaline-pumping experience, featuring heart-stopping stunts and jaw-dropping action sequences, with Deol showcasing his signature style in full force. In the one-and-a-half-minute teaser, audiences are treated to explosive moments, including characters being crushed by dumbbells, police officers soaring through the air, and intense showdowns. Deol’s character is introduced as a feared figure, initially seen bound in chains before unleashing his fury on his foes. Jaat will be released in Hindi, Tamil and Telugu languages. Meanwhile, Sunny Deol was last seen in the period action drama film Gadar 2 which created a storm at the box office, with a massive worldwide collection of Rs 691 crore. Helmed by Anil Sharma, the film also featured Amisha Patel and Utkarsh Sharma in the lead roles. He will also be seen in director Rajkumar Santoshi’s upcoming period drama film Lahore,1947 opposite actress Preity Zinta. Backed by Aamir Khan, the film is expected to hit the theatres on the occasion of Independence Day 2025. It might face a big Bollywood clash with Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR’s spy-thriller film War 2. Apart from this, he also has a patriotic action drama film Border 2 with Varun Dhawan, Diljit Dosanjh and Ahan Shetty in his kitty. Produced by T-series, JP Dutta and Nidhi Dutta, the film will be hitting the theatres on Republic Day 2025. tags : bollywood entertainment Jaat Sunny Deol Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:55 IST News movies Sunny Deol’s Next Action Thriller Jaat To Hit The Screens On April 10 Read More

title: Single's Inferno 4: Kim A-rin Drops Major Spoiler On Her Romance With Kook Dong-ho
summary: In a shocking twist, Kim A-rin admitted that her feelings for Kook Dong-ho in Single's Inferno had faded by the fifth episode, which has left fans disappointed.
full_content: Single's Inferno 4: Kim A-rin Drops Major Spoiler On Her Romance With Kook Dong-ho Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 16:09 IST In a shocking twist, Kim A-rin admitted that her feelings for Kook Dong-ho in Single's Inferno had faded by the fifth episode, which has left fans disappointed. reset Follow us on Google News In Single’s Inferno, contestants must choose a partner to leave the deserted island. (Photo Credits:X) The latest season of Netflix’s popular dating show, Single’s Inferno Season 4, has fans hooked, due to shocking twists and turns. Recently, Kim A-rin unintentionally revealed a spoiler about her feelings. In a surprising twist, she admitted that she wasn’t interested in dating Kook Dong-ho, even though viewers had hoped to see them together in the future episodes. Earlier in the season, A-rin had shown interest in Dong-ho and their bond grew stronger, especially after she had a small misunderstanding with Dong-ho and another contestant, Park Hae-lin. In a shocking twist, A-rin admitted that her feelings for Dong-ho had faded by the fifth episode, which has left fans puzzled. related stories In the previous episode, while Kim A-rin and Kook Dong-ho were enjoying their time on Paradise Island, she was seen sharing her concerns with his outing with Park Hae-lin. She said, “She was looking at you while she talked. So I assumed you both became really close and talked a lot." Toward the end of their conversation, Dong-ho was captured smiling at A-rin, which left the panellists and viewers convinced that there was a spark between them. I'm sorry but that new girl should stay away from Dongho cuz Arin & him look so cute together ?Arin is only interested in Dongho & ngl I love their moments together. I hope Dongho also develop more feelings for her ?❤️ #SinglesInferno4 pic.twitter.com/KuetiimVWE — ᴅɪɴᴜ ?✨️ (@Seunggimylove) January 21, 2025 After the release of episode 5, Kim A-rin was asked if she was interested in anyone else besides Kook Dong-ho. She responded by saying, “Yes, except for Dong-ho. I don’t think I was interested in anyone else until episode 5." This revelation left many fans confused and disappointed, as they were hoping for a connection between the two based on their earlier interactions. Q: are you not interested in other men?A-rin: Yes, except for Dongho. During their time on the island, they bond and participate in activities together. Those who successfully pair up get the opportunity to visit Paradise Island, a luxurious place where they get to spend quality time. While the dating reality show is judged by Hanhae, Dex, Hong Jin-kyung, Lee Da-hee and Kyuhyun, it also features attractive hot singles, such as Lee Si-an, Chung You-jin, Kim Min-seol, Bae Ji-yeon, Kim Hye-jin, Kim A-rin, Park Hae-lin, Kim Tae-hwan, Kook Dong-ho, Theo Jang, Kim Jeong-su, Yuk Jun-seo, An Jong-hoon, Hong Seong-bo and Kwon Ki-ha. tags : entertainment films Korean Drama movies Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:48 IST News movies Single's Inferno 4: Kim A-rin Drops Major Spoiler On Her Romance With Kook Dong-ho Read More

title: Venkatesh Daggubati Reacts To IT Raids On Hyderabad Film Producers: 'I Only Take White Money'
summary: Starting from Dil Raju, the Income Tax Department has been conducting raids in Hyderabad at the offices and homes of several producers.
full_content: Venkatesh Daggubati Reacts To IT Raids On Hyderabad Film Producers: 'I Only Take White Money' Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 15:46 IST Starting from Dil Raju, the Income Tax Department has been conducting raids in Hyderabad at the offices and homes of several producers. reset Follow us on Google News Venkatesh reacted to the IT raids while promoting Sankranthiki Vasthunam. The Income Tax (IT) department has been conducting raids in Hyderabad for the last three days at eight different places. Dil Raju, the Telangana Film Development Corporation Chairman, also came under the scanner, along with Sukumar, Ravi, and Naveen. Now, Venkatesh Daggubati has reacted to it but with a humorous take. While the actor was promoting his latest film, Sankranthiki Vasthunam, in Hyderabad on January 23, 2025, he was asked about the ongoing IT raids on the offices and homes of filmmakers in the city. Venkatesh Daggubati joked that he only takes ‘white money’ and can’t speak for others. related stories At the press meet of Sankranthiki Vasthunam, a reporter discussed with Venkatesh how filmmakers would have ‘no need for black money’ if all actors take ‘remuneration in white’. To this, Daggubati replied, “I don’t know about others, but I am fully white – the whitest of white. I take so little, never too much, and only take white money. That, too, is given in my office, and I take it from there when I need it for expenses. I am a very simple person." Raju, Sukumar, Ravi, and Naveen, among others have come under the scanner of ED. Raju is also the producer of Venkatesh’s film Sankranthiki Vasthunam. It collected around Rs 133.5 crore in India and Rs 186.50 crore worldwide but the film’s team claimed it made Rs 230 crore gross worldwide. The IT department is yet to make a statement on these ongoing raids. Talking about Venkatesh, he was last seen in Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan in Hindi in 2023. In 2024, he starred in the Telugu film Saindhav. Next up, he has the second season of the Netflix show Rana Naidu with his nephew Rana Daggubati. With Sankranthiki Vasthunam, he has collaborated for the third time with director Anil Ravipudi after F2 and F3: Fun and Frustration. tags : regional cinema Venkatesh Daggubati Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:46 IST News movies Venkatesh Daggubati Reacts To IT Raids On Hyderabad Film Producers: 'I Only Take White Money' Read More

title: Mary Poppins Star Dick Van Dyke, 99, Goes To Gym Every Week
summary: The Oscar-winning actor shared how he still manages to work out three days a week.
full_content: Mary Poppins Star Dick Van Dyke, 99, Goes To Gym Every Week Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 16:09 IST The Oscar-winning actor shared how he still manages to work out three days a week. reset Follow us on Google News Dick Van Dyke shared his secret to staying healthy at age 99. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Age is just a number, and Dick Van Dyke has proven it right! The 99-year-old Mary Poppins actor recently made a surprising revelation, admitting that he still makes trips to the gym every week. Dick Van Dyke appeared on the Wednesday episode of Ted Danson’s Where Everybody Knows Your Name podcast, where he opened up about his fitness secret and mentioned exercising three days a week. “I am almost 100. This is insane," Van Dyke amusingly told Danson during the interaction. The actor recalled someone asking, “To what do you attribute your age and physical condition?" to which he revealed working out three days a week. “We go to the gym still, and I think that’s why I’m not stove up like my equals," he added. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Team Coco Podcasts (@teamcocopodcasts) Danson also shared going to the same gym as Van Dyke and expressed being amazed at the Chitty Chitty Bang Bang star’s workouts. “I would go to the same gym you did, and if I got there early enough, I would see you literally work out on some weight machine. And then, almost like you were doing circuit training, you would not walk to the next machine; you’d dance. You literally danced to the next machine," the host continued. Danson remembered asking Van Dyke about his exercise routine, to which the latter told him that he would do swim laps after going back home from the gym. “Exactly. Good routine," the Oscar-winning actor added, further sharing that his recent workouts mostly include a lot of stretching, yoga, and sit-ups. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Dick Van Dyke (@official_dick_van_dyke) Van Dyke, who celebrated his 99th birthday on December 13, 2024, enthusiastically shared that he is looking forward to making it to 100 this year, adding that there will be a “big party." Well, this is not the first time that the actor has offered insights from his life in the 90s. His 2015 book, Keep Moving and Other Tips and Truths About Aging, noted how Van Dyke never gave up on the things he enjoys the most. At the time, he told NPR, “The point is to enjoy. You have to pick what you enjoy doing, what fulfills you, and what interests you. And I realize that’s not possible for a lot of people. I can’t handle the tennis court anymore. I can still run and dance and sing." https://www.instagram.com/p/DDPSdJXIET0/ The Hollywood actor recently featured in the music video for Coldplay’s All My Love, helmed by Spike Jonze and Mary Wigmore. The video shows Van Dyke in his Malibu home, looking back at his illustrious Hollywood career and his personal life. tags : entertainment films hollywood movies Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:36 IST News movies Mary Poppins Star Dick Van Dyke, 99, Goes To Gym Every Week Read More

title: Anil Kapoor Wishes Showman Subhash Ghai 'Happy Birthday' With A Heartfelt Post
summary: Anil Kapoor celebrated Subhash Ghai's 80th birthday with a heartfelt Instagram post. The duo has delivered hits like Taal and Ram Lakhan. Anil will next star in "Subedaar," directed by Suresh Triveni.
full_content: Anil Kapoor Wishes Showman Subhash Ghai 'Happy Birthday' With A Heartfelt Post Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar IANS Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 15:23 IST Anil Kapoor celebrated Subhash Ghai's 80th birthday with a heartfelt Instagram post. The duo has delivered hits like Taal and Ram Lakhan. Anil will next star in "Subedaar," directed by Suresh Triveni. reset Follow us on Google News Anil Kapoor shared a photo with the director. Subhash Ghai has gifted many cinematic masterpieces during his long journey as a director. As the Showman turned 80 today on 24th January 2025, Anil Kapoor took to the stories section of his official Instagram handle and penned a heartfelt post. Dropping a collage of his rare pictures with Subhash Ghai, Anil Kapoor wrote as the caption, “Happy Birthday, @subhashghail saab! Your wisdom and creativity continue to inspire everyone around you. Grateful for all the memories and lessons over the years. Wishing you health, happiness, and endless success always!" related stories Over the years, Anil Kapoor and Subhash Ghai have delivered several blockbuster hits, including Taal (1999), Ram Lakhan (1989), Karma (1986), and Meri Jung (1985). Subhash Ghai’s filmography further includes Kalicharan (1976), Karz (1980), Vidhaata (1982), Hero (1983), Saudagar (1991), Khalnayak (1993), Pardes (1997), and Iqbal (2005), to name just a few. Now shifting our focus to Anil Kapoor’s professional lineup, he will next be seen in the upcoming entertainer, “Subedaar". The project will see Anil Kapoor in the titular role of Subedaar Arjun Singh, with Radhika Madan accompanying him in the cast as his daughter. The film has been helmed by Suresh Triveni with Vikram Malhotra bankrolling the drama in association with Suresh Triveni, and Anil Kapoor. The makers released the first look poster for the film back in March 2024 on Prime Video’s official Instagram handle. Shelling titbits about the plot of the drama, the makers wrote in the caption, “In an adrenaline-fueled action drama, Subedaar Arjun Singh grapples with civilian life, navigating a strained relationship with his daughter and societal dysfunction. The man who once fought for the nation must now fight enemies within to protect his home and family." Meanwhile, the makers have already unveiled the teaser for “Subedaar". Additionally, if the reports are to be believed, Anil Kapoor was also approached for Vicky Kaushal’s “Chhaava". He was reportedly in talks to play Aurangzeb, however, Anil Kapoor was eventually replaced by Akshay Khanna. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:23 IST News movies Anil Kapoor Wishes Showman Subhash Ghai 'Happy Birthday' With A Heartfelt Post Read More

title: Gay Korean YouTuber Couple Makes History By Legalising Marriage In Thailand
summary: After Thailand legalised same-sex marriage, South Korean YouTubers Mango Couple officially got married after spending 10 years together.
full_content: Gay Korean YouTuber Couple Makes History By Legalising Marriage In Thailand Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 15:25 IST After Thailand legalised same-sex marriage, South Korean YouTubers Mango Couple officially got married after spending 10 years together. reset Follow us on Google News Mango Couple tried registering marriage in South Korea in 2024. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Thailand has made a groundbreaking move by legalising same-sex marriage, becoming the third Asian country, following Taiwan and Nepal, to officially recognise gay unions. LGBTQ+ couples gathered for a historic ceremony to register their marriages, with the event drawing local participants as well as visitors from neighbouring countries, including South Korean YouTubers Mango Couple. The couple, who celebrated their 10th anniversary in 2024, shared their struggle to register their marriage in South Korea, where their request was rejected. Now, they are determined to advocate for same-sex marriage rights in their home country, inspired by Thailand’s progress. Speaking with PPTV36 TV, Backpack and Kim said, “Hi, we’re mango couple from Korea. We heard that Thailand has same sex marriage but last year in Korea, we tried to register our marriage because that was our 10th anniversary, but the Korean government didn’t accept it. So after we came here today, compared to Korea, there is a lot of love in this area, so I was so moved. We will bring this love and energy to Korea, and we will change the Korea." related stories A gay couple from South Korea ?? decided to formalise their union in Thailand on the first day of marriage equality taking effect. The vibe in Thailand right now is incredible. pic.twitter.com/XDBWjUwQgu — yammi (@sighyam) January 23, 2025 In one of their earlier YouTube videos, the Mango Couple shared their experience of trying to register their marriage in South Korea. While they were in the registration office, the official handling a non-acceptance letter said, “As you can see here, it says your marriage is a form of marriage that is not legally recognized. Under the current law, same-sex marriage is not legally recognized. So I’ll give you this notice of non-acceptance. It doesn’t have any legal effect, though." When the couple asked, “What should we do if we want our application to be processed?" The individual informed, “You need to change the law. We’re limited by the law. We can only do things that the law authorized us to do." The couple replied, “So, it seems like the only option is to request a change in the law. They can’t go against the law." With heavy hearts, the Mango Couple expressed that if they were a “normal" couple, they would have married long ago. They revealed that, in their hearts, they have felt married for years. It took them 10 years to reach this moment, and they shared their desire for all couples in love to have the freedom to marry without barriers. The couple emphasised the courage it took to finally make their commitment official and spoke proudly of the step they had taken together. Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 15:17 IST News movies Gay Korean YouTuber Couple Makes History By Legalising Marriage In Thailand Read More

title: Sonam Kapoor Looks Uber-Cool As She Heads To Her Vanity Van On Set

title: Parineeti Chopra’s Go-To Comfort Meal? Dal Chawal-Jeera Aloo, Of Course
summary: She posted a snap of her delicious meal: a plate of rice with dal, aloo jeera sabzi and sliced onions on the side.
full_content: Parineeti Chopra’s Go-To Comfort Meal? Dal Chawal-Jeera Aloo, Of Course Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:55 IST She posted a snap of her delicious meal: a plate of rice with dal, aloo jeera sabzi and sliced onions on the side. reset Follow us on Google News Parineeti Chopra is a foodie. title: Junaid Khan Says He Was 'Outside Most Of The Time' During Ira Khan's Wedding: 'Was Just Told Date, Time...'
summary: Junaid Khan said he wasn't consulted on anything during Ira Khan's wedding as he is 'useless'.
full_content: Junaid Khan Says He Was 'Outside Most Of The Time' During Ira Khan's Wedding: 'Was Just Told Date, Time...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:53 IST Junaid Khan said he wasn't consulted on anything during Ira Khan's wedding as he is 'useless'. reset Follow us on Google News Junaid and Ira are Aamir Khan's children. Aamir Khan’s son, Junaid Khan, is introverted and prefers to stay away from large gatherings. In fact, even during his sister Ira Khan’s wedding, he spent most of his time outside the venue. He said that his family was aware of his nature and didn’t expect him to contribute much inside the venue. In a chat with Siddharth Kannan, Junaid said he doesn’t enjoy parties with too many people and loud music and said, “marriage is basically that". He said, “After my sister’s wedding, even my father was like, ‘If you plan to get married, please run away and do it.'" Junaid said he wasn’t given any tasks for the wedding as his family thought he is “useless." related stories He said, “Ira knew very well that no one should expect anything from Junaid, he is very useless in all these things. So no one consulted me for anything, I was just told the date and time and was asked to reach then. They were like if we give him anything to do…I am useless actually. They try a lot to get me involved but I am so useless…" “Even at Ira’s wedding, I was outside most of the time," he said. He added, “I sit outside with few people, a few like-minded individuals. Ira has given up on me when it comes to all this." Meanwhile, Khushi Kapoor and Junaid Khan are set to make their big-screen debuts with Loveyapa, a romantic comedy filled with love, drama, and chaos. The trailer teases a humorous yet emotional exploration of trust and communication in modern relationships. The phone-swapping premise provides comedic situations and heartfelt moments, making it a fresh take on love in the digital age. Directed by Advait Chandan (Laal Singh Chaddha), Loveyapa is set to hit theatres on February 7, 2025. The film, produced by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, is a remake of the 2022 Tamil hit Love Today. It promises lively music, stunning visuals, and memorable performances. The film also features Kiku Sharda in a supporting role, adding humour to this heartwarming romantic comedy. tags : aamir khan bollywood ira khan Junaid Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:53 IST News movies Junaid Khan Says He Was 'Outside Most Of The Time' During Ira Khan's Wedding: 'Was Just Told Date, Time...' title: From Rescued Child Labourer To Anuja’s Oscar-Nominated Star: Here's Sajda Pathan’s Inspiring Story
summary: India celebrates a moment of pride as Anuja, a short film set in Delhi, secures an Oscar nomination for Best Live Action Short Film.
full_content: From Rescued Child Labourer To Anuja’s Oscar-Nominated Star: Here's Sajda Pathan’s Inspiring Story Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:53 IST India celebrates a moment of pride as Anuja, a short film set in Delhi, secures an Oscar nomination for Best Live Action Short Film. reset Follow us on Google News Anuja, India’s Oscar-nominated short film, tells a heartfelt story of resilience, starring Sajda Pathan, a 9-year-old who rose from child labor to the global stage. As the 2025 Oscar nominations were announced on Thursday, there was disappointment for some of India’s anticipated entries. Both All We Imagine As Light and Santosh, Sandhya Suri’s official UK submission for the Academy Awards, failed to make the cut. However, India still has reason to celebrate with the nomination of Anuja, a short film set in Delhi, for Best Live Action Short Film. Backed by industry powerhouses Priyanka Chopra, Mindy Kaling, and Guneet Monga, the film has garnered significant buzz, and attention is now on its 9-year-old star, Sajda Pathan. Co-directed by Adam J. Graves and Suchitra Mattai, Anuja tells the poignant story of a gifted 9-year-old girl torn between pursuing an education and working in a factory alongside her sister, a choice that will shape their futures. Sajda Pathan stars in the titular role, alongside Ananya Shanbhag as her sister. Set against the backdrop of New Delhi, the film boasts an impressive team with two-time Oscar-winning producer Guneet Monga and actors Priyanka Chopra and Mindy Kaling as executive producers. related stories Sajda Pathan’s Remarkable Journey The spotlight is firmly on Sajda Pathan, whose own life story mirrors the resilience portrayed in the film. Rescued from child labor in Delhi by the Salaam Baalak Trust, Sajda has overcome incredible odds to make her mark in cinema. Anuja is her second film, following her debut in the French movie The Braid (La Tresse), directed by Laetitia Colombani, where she acted alongside Mia Maelzer. The Salaam Baalak Trust, founded in 1988 using proceeds from Mira Nair’s Oscar-nominated Salaam Bombay, has played a pivotal role in Sajda’s life. The organization not only rescued her but also provided her with shelter at their SBT Day Care Center. Anuja is co-produced by Salaam Baalak Trust in collaboration with Shine Global and Krushan Naik Films. Oscar Race And What’s Next For Anuja The 2025 Academy Awards will take place on March 2 at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles. Anuja will compete against strong contenders like A Lien, I’m Not a Robot, The Last Ranger, and The Man Who Could Not Remain Silent in the Best Live Action Short Film category. With its powerful storytelling and inspiring real-life connections, the film is generating high hopes as it inches closer to the coveted gold statuette. Audiences can look forward to Anuja streaming on Netflix later this year, offering a global stage for this heartfelt tale of resilience and hope. tags : bollywood guneet monga hollywood mindy kaling Oscars priyanka chopra Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:53 IST News movies From Rescued Child Labourer To Anuja’s Oscar-Nominated Star: Here's Sajda Pathan’s Inspiring Story Read More

title: Vivek Agnihotri Says Jasleen Royal Is Not Good Enough For 'Mohalla Singing Contest': 'Audience Is More Sureela'
summary: Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri, Vishal Dadlani, and Antara Mitra criticized Jasleen Royal's opening performance at Coldplay's Mumbai concert, calling it "unbearable" and "out of tune."
full_content: Vivek Agnihotri Says Jasleen Royal Is Not Good Enough For 'Mohalla Singing Contest': 'Audience Is More Sureela' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:47 IST Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri, Vishal Dadlani, and Antara Mitra criticized Jasleen Royal's opening performance at Coldplay's Mumbai concert, calling it "unbearable" and "out of tune." reset Follow us on Google News Jasleen Royal opened for Coldplay. After Vishal Dadlani and Antara Mitra, filmmaker Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri has joined in the criticism of Jasleen Royal’s opening performance at Coldplay’s Mumbai concert. Jasleen made history as the first Indian artist to open for the British band, and after Mumbai, she will also perform at Coldplay’s Ahmedabad concerts. However, several concert-goers felt she was a poor fit for the vibe, with some describing her performance as “unbearable" and “out of tune." related stories On Friday (January 24), Vivek Agnihotri took to his official X account to share a video of Jasleen’s performance. Along with the post, he wrote that the audience sounded more melodious than Jasleen herself. The audience is more sureela than these auto-tuned, Instagram-generated singers. Imagine if she didn’t have followers on Instagram, would anyone have even allowed her to audition for a mohalla singing contest?Follower count over talent is the new norm. pic.twitter.com/waQRgoVhJV — Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri (@vivekagnihotri) January 24, 2025 Earlier, singer Antara Mitra also criticised Jasleen Royal’s opening performance at Coldplay’s Mumbai concert. Antara shared her thoughts on Instagram by reposting a video of Jasleen’s performance and writing, “I am shamelessly calling this out! Because someone from the same field should! I have an iron gut so I am doing it! Please all you biggies out there taking decisions of this level! My only request is please put music on top and then your number game." Earlier, playback singer and composer Vishal Dadlani took to Instagram to criticise a “basic-to-bad" singer performing before a large audience. While he didn’t name anyone, fans speculated his comments were aimed at Jasleen Royal. In his now-deleted Instagram story, which surfaced on Reddit, Vishal wrote, “I’m really sorry, but when you put a basic-to-bad singer in front of a large crowd on a large stage, all you’re doing is showing more people that the individual can’t really sing, and that sadly, systemds within labels in India aren’t geared towards really promoting the best we have. I’ve just seen some clips, and my gosh… How embarrassing! For the Country, the artiste, the public, as well as “the scene." tags : bollywood Jasleen Royal Vivek Agnihotri Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:47 IST News movies Vivek Agnihotri Says Jasleen Royal Is Not Good Enough For 'Mohalla Singing Contest': 'Audience Is More Sureela' Read More

According to the details, Saif Ali Khan told the police that he held the attacker tight. title: Bigg Boss Fame Sara Khan Says 'I Don’t Wait For Makers To Sign Me'
summary: Sara Khan reveals why she has never waited for anyone to sign her in their projects.
full_content: Bigg Boss Fame Sara Khan Says 'I Don’t Wait For Makers To Sign Me' Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:20 IST Sara Khan reveals why she has never waited for anyone to sign her in their projects. reset Follow us on Google News Sara Khan was seen in Bigg Boss 4. When it comes to bagging the right roles, it can get quite tricky. However, Sara Khan says she likes to take things under her control. The actress rose to fame with popular TV shows like Sapna Babul Kaa… Bidaai, Bigg Boss 4, and Bollywood projects like M3 – Midsummer Midnight Mumbai an Hamari Adhuri Kahani. She is currently seen in Chhathi Maiyya Ki Bitiya. “I don’t wait for the makers to sign me. In fact, I have never waited. I believe in working for myself. I focus on learning, exploring during the time I have between projects. I write, sing and focus on creating content. I live with gratitude and I am very happy in challenging myself. For me, no one is my competition and I don’t want to run in this race," she says. related stories Acting requires a lot of patience and perseverance, she says, adding, “As I’m not living to impress anyone, apart from my parents and family, I believe in always having enough. This is my way of getting through the challenges I face." When asked what is the most rewarding part of being an actor, she says, “You are recognised at most places ,You are valuable , everyone is interested in you , you are treated very well everywhere. Acting has taught me a lot as well. I have hated taking up few roles just to meet my financial requirements. That is when I worked on myself, learnt how to get out of the situation and to balance my lifestyle by exploring my hobbies , such as singing , writing , creating music and doing what I love. tags : Sara Khan TV Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:20 IST News movies Bigg Boss Fame Sara Khan Says 'I Don’t Wait For Makers To Sign Me' Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor Says He Gave '250 Auditions' Before His Debut: 'Some People Struggle In BMW...'
summary: Shahid Kapoor also recalled how even though he had made it big, he was made to feel lesser before Kabir Singh.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Says He Gave '250 Auditions' Before His Debut: 'Some People Struggle In BMW...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:08 IST Shahid Kapoor also recalled how even though he had made it big, he was made to feel lesser before Kabir Singh. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Deva. Shahid Kapoor recently opened up about his struggles as an actor. Despite being the son of Pankaj Kapoor, Shahid had to give 250 auditions and live in rented houses before making it big in Bollywood. He said that he felt victimised by his situation and at one time, didn’t even have money to buy clothes from the local market. “My father is a character actor, and my mom was a Kathak dancer since she was 15 years old. I have lived in rented houses. I have given many auditions so I don’t have that sense of privilege," he told Raj Shamani. “I went through a very long phase of feeling victimised by my circumstances… Some people struggle in a BMW, they start their journey by working with the top two-three directors in the country. I came after giving 250 auditions," he said. related stories Shahid said, “Today, people say that Shahid’s fashion sense is so good, and sometimes, I laugh at things like this, because I remember at one point, I didn’t have enough money to buy clothes in Lokhandwala," he said. He also recalled how even though he had made it big, he was made to feel lesser before Kabir Singh. He said, “This happened right before Kabir Singh. I don’t want to get into specifics, but I was made to feel like I am lesser, as an artist, as a star, as an individual. I was put in a situation where I was made to feel like I am lesser. And I would never accept that." He added, “And I fought it because I am a survivor. Through my journey of 21 years, I have learnt that I am a survivor and I can get out of such difficult situations." Meanwhile, on the work front, Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Deva with Pooja Hegde. In Deva, Shahid plays a rebellious cop, while Pooja portrays a journalist. The film, helmed by Rosshan Andrrews and backed by Roy Kapur Films, also features Kubbra Sait and Pavail Gulati in significant roles. Deva will be released in theatres on January 31. tags : bollywood Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:08 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Says He Gave '250 Auditions' Before His Debut: 'Some People Struggle In BMW...' title: SEVENTEEN's Mingyu Surprises Fans With His Blonde Hair Look
summary: While fans admired SEVENTEEN star Mingyu’s stunning look, his sudden hair transformation sparked discussions about his possible military enlistment.
full_content: SEVENTEEN's Mingyu Surprises Fans With His Blonde Hair Look Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:45 IST While fans admired SEVENTEEN star Mingyu’s stunning look, his sudden hair transformation sparked discussions about his possible military enlistment. reset Follow us on Google News SEVENTEEN is gearing for their Singapore tour. (Photo Credits: Instagram) SEVENTEEN’s Mingyu sparked excitement among fans with his latest airport appearance before the group’s Right Here world tour concert in Singapore. He was reportedly dressed in all-black as he wore a hoodie, black face mask and a hat, which covered most of his face, despite that few hairs were still visible. Following the appearance, eagle eyed fans quickly noticed that his hair was dyed blonde. This unexpected discovery quickly got fans excited, who speculated about his future military enlistment or music video. Without mentioning the reason, Mingyu later confirmed the rumours by posting several pictures of himself with his new blonde hair, which left his fans thrilled. In the picture, the South Korean star wore a white outfit that perfectly matched his blonde hair, enhancing his overall appearance. While fans admired his stunning look, Mingyu’s sudden transformation sparked discussions about his possible military enlistment. Many noticed a pattern where K-pop idols often dye their hair before joining the military. According to KoreaBoo, the process of going blonde involves multiple steps that can severely damage hair. This has led some to believe idols choose this timing because their damaged hair will be cut short when they start the duty. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by 김민규 (@min9yu_k) While Jeonghan has already started his mandatory military service in September 2024, other SEVENTEEN members, S Coups, Joshua, Jun, Hoshi, Wonwoo, Woozi, DK, Mingyu, The8, Seungkwan, Vernon and Dino, are yet to make an announcement. As per Stylecaster, Pledis Entertainment announcing Jeonghan service stated, “While JEONGHAN filmed most of the content he could in advance, he will not be able to participate in promotional activities for the 12th mini album and the SEVENTEEN [RIGHT HERE] WORLD TOUR, scheduled to start in October." SEVENTEEN members are currently in Singapore for their highly awaited Right Here World Tour. The concerts will take place on January 25 and 26 at the National Stadium. This will be their fifth performance in the country and their first time performing at this new venue. Later, the group will head to Jakarta, Indonesia, before wrapping up their tour in Bangkok, Thailand, on February 15 and 16. They previously entertained fans in the Philippines, Japan, United States and South Korea. tags : Seventeen Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 14:02 IST News movies SEVENTEEN's Mingyu Surprises Fans With His Blonde Hair Look Read More

title: Filmmaker B Unnikrishnan Faces Legal Heat for Insults and Threats to Producer Sandra Thomas
summary: A case has been registered against director B Unnikrishnan by producer and actor Sandra Thomas following the Hema Committee Report.
full_content: Filmmaker B Unnikrishnan Faces Legal Heat for Insults and Threats to Producer Sandra Thomas Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 13:57 IST A case has been registered against director B Unnikrishnan by producer and actor Sandra Thomas following the Hema Committee Report. reset Follow us on Google News A case has been filed against B Unnikrishnan by Sandra Thomas. Renowned filmmaker B Unnikrishnan finds himself at the center of a legal storm as producer Sandra Thomas has accused him of hurling insults and issuing threats to her. Sandra, a well-known producer and actor, has alleged that B Unnikrishnan made disparaging remarks and threatened her. Thomas has reportedly filed a formal complaint with the police, demanding accountability for the filmmaker’s actions. Thomas claims that the director purposely sidelined her from the industry. In her complaint, she also pointed to an incident where she gave a statement before the Hema Committee. She said that this statement allegedly led to her being ostracised by Unnikrishnan, which eventually hindered her career. Producer Anto Joseph has also been named as the second accused in the case. related stories The allegations come at a time when the Malayalam film industry has been under scrutiny for its handling of workplace ethics and safety, particularly for women. The Hema Committee Report was commissioned by the Kerala government in July 2017 following a series of high-profile incidents of harassment. According to reports by ANI, the Kerala Police have confirmed the registration of the case by Sandra Thomas. They are currently investigating the matter. In a related note, Malayalam actor Unni Mukundan, famed for his role in Marco, has announced his resignation as the treasurer of the Association of Malayalam Movie Artists (AMMA). He claimed that the increasing work commitments, especially his role in Marco, had taken a toll on his mental health. In an emotional note shared on Instagram, Mukundan said, “I have truly enjoyed my time in this position, and it has been both an exciting and rewarding experience. However, in recent months, the increasing demands of my work, particularly with Marco and other production commitments, have significantly impacted my mental health." AMMA is the organisation that represents Malayalam film artists. The association courted controversy post Hema Committee’s report, which detailed disturbing allegations of sexual abuse within the Malayalam film industry. tags : B Unnikrishnan regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 13:57 IST News movies Filmmaker B Unnikrishnan Faces Legal Heat for Insults and Threats to Producer Sandra Thomas Read More

title: Tiësto Returns To India After A Decade For Electrifying Three-City Tour; Details Inside
summary: Global dance music icon Tiësto returns to India after a decade for the HSBC Presents Tiësto India Tour 2025.
full_content: Tiësto Returns To India After A Decade For Electrifying Three-City Tour; Details Inside Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 13:56 IST Global dance music icon Tiësto returns to India after a decade for the HSBC Presents Tiësto India Tour 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Tiësto is set to return to India after 10 years. Get ready to experience the ultimate celebration of sound and energy as global dance music icon Tiësto is set to return to India after more than a decade. Presented by EVA Live, the HSBC Presents Tiësto India Tour 2025 promises to be a groundbreaking event, bringing the Grammy-winning DJ and producer to Gurugram, Mumbai, and Bengaluru this February for a series of unforgettable performances. Fresh from his sold-out Bryan Adams tour, EVA Live is raising the bar once again. Known as the godfather of dance music, Tiësto will step away from his world-renowned Las Vegas residency to headline this highly anticipated tour. The journey kicks off at Backyard Sports Club, Gurugram, on February 13, lights up NESCO, Mumbai, on February 14, and culminates in a grand finale at Terraform Arena, Bengaluru, on February 16. related stories A Sensory Odyssey Awaits Tiësto’s India Tour 2025 promises more than just a concert – it’s a sensory odyssey. Fans can look forward to a mesmerizing two-hour set that bridges the past and future of electronic dance music. Known for his ability to evolve across generations, Tiësto will deliver a mix of classic trance, progressive house anthems, and cutting-edge productions, accompanied by breathtaking visuals, state-of-the-art sound systems, and jaw-dropping stage designs. Speaking about his return to India, Tiësto expressed his excitement, “I’m beyond thrilled to return to India after 10 years! The incredible energy and passion of the people here are unlike anything else. Gurugram, Mumbai, Bengaluru – get ready to party with me because this is going to be unforgettable! India has always held a special place in my heart, and I can’t wait to experience that magic once again." A Milestone for India’s EDM Landscape Deepak Choudhary, Founder and Managing Director of EVA Live, shared his enthusiasm, “Tiësto is more than an artist – he’s a phenomenon, a visionary, and a symbol of global music culture. His return to India is a momentous occasion that underscores the evolution of the Indian EDM landscape. This tour isn’t just about music; it’s about creating memories, celebrating connection, and elevating the cultural pulse of the nation." Adding to this sentiment, Sandeep Batra, Head of International Wealth and Premier Banking at HSBC India, said: “We are delighted to present the ‘Tiësto India Tour 2025,’ a reflection of our commitment to curating extraordinary experiences for our customers. Tiësto’s return is not just a musical event; it’s a celebration of creativity, community, and innovation." Ticket Details Tickets for the HSBC Presents Tiësto India Tour 2025 will be available exclusively on the District by Zomato platform. An exclusive 48-hour presale for HSBC credit and debit cardholders will run from January 27, 2025, at 4 PM IST to January 29, 2025, at 4 PM IST, offering a 15% discount. The public sale will begin on January 29, 2025, at 4 PM IST, with HSBC cardholders enjoying a 10% discount during general sales. Ticket prices range from INR 3,599 to INR 17,499. Why Tiësto Is a Global Phenomenon Tiësto, born Tijs Verwest, is a Grammy-winning, platinum-certified pioneer who has sold over 36 million albums and amassed over 11 billion streams worldwide. From headlining every major global music festival to transforming the Las Vegas DJ residency landscape, he has redefined electronic music for the masses. With chart-topping hits and his latest album, Drive, Tiësto continues to inspire dancefloor energy around the world. Mark Your Calendar This February, don’t miss the chance to witness Tiësto’s magic live as he redefines India’s live music experience. Prepare for a sensory journey like no other, celebrating sound, culture, and community. Tour Dates and Venues: February 13, 2025 – Backyard Sports Club, Gurugram February 14, 2025 – NESCO, Mumbai February 16, 2025 – Terraform Arena, Bengaluru Get your tickets now and be part of history as Tiësto brings his legendary soundscape back to India! tags : hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 13:56 IST News movies Tiësto Returns To India After A Decade For Electrifying Three-City Tour; Details Inside Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor Recalls Childhood Bullying Due To Absent Father: ‘Parents Are Like Legs, When One Is Missing…’
summary: Shahid Kapoor reflects on his childhood, sharing how his parents’ separation and the absence of his father shaped his upbringing.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Recalls Childhood Bullying Due To Absent Father: ‘Parents Are Like Legs, When One Is Missing…’ Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 13:44 IST Shahid Kapoor reflects on his childhood, sharing how his parents’ separation and the absence of his father shaped his upbringing. reset Follow us on Google News Actor Shahid Kapoor opens up about his childhood struggles, the impact of his parents’ separation, and the absence of his father. Actor Shahid Kapoor recently opened up about his childhood experiences, reflecting on the impact of his parents’ separation and the absence of his father during his formative years. Raised by his mother, Neliima Azeem, in Delhi, Shahid revealed that he would only see his father, Pankaj Kapur, once a year, leaving a significant void in his life. In an interview with Raj Shamani on YouTube, he discussed how this shaped his understanding of parenting and the challenges he faced growing up. Shahid shared, “I did come from a home where my parents were not together from the age of three. I lived a lot with my mom. I would see my father only once a year. So the male presence in my life was less; much, much less than what is normal." He likened the absence of one parent to losing a sense of balance: “Parents are like your two feet but when one parent is not there, you feel like you can’t balance because one foot is missing. It’s naturally meant to be a certain way so the way the world is made, both parents have a role in that. You cannot define it." related stories Although his father wasn’t a daily presence, Shahid credited his maternal grandfather for being a constant and unconditionally supportive figure in his life. He said, “If I look back now, he is the deepest influence in my life, but I am sure he was filling in the shoes of my dad not being there every day. He was unconditionally there for me. My strongest memory as a child is with my Nanaji." Shahid also spoke about being bullied as a child because of his family situation. “Kids are very mean. So, at that time, when you don’t have a parent, they make you feel bad about it, that this is not normal. And other kids made me feel that. Those kids don’t know what they are doing, they are just being stupid but you end up feeling like my life is over." As a parent to daughter Misha (8) and son Zain (6), Shahid reflected on how his childhood experiences influence his approach to fatherhood. He explained how being a parent brings a mix of emotions, including questioning one’s own parents. “Sometimes you might feel that I can’t be as good as my father or mother, or sometimes you might feel like I am doing a lot, why didn’t my parents do as much? You can feel both ways and both are just as valid." He further noted the impact of a father’s presence on his children, particularly his son. “When I am not around, I feel he doesn’t feel as secure, even for my daughter, but I would say more for my son. Because I think that male energy connect between father and son, I don’t know it works but probably as father and child, we feed off each other." Shahid, who shares a close bond with his father now, acknowledged that their relationship improved significantly after he became an actor. The two have even collaborated on several films, showcasing a renewed connection and mutual respect. Married to Mira Rajput, Shahid continues to prioritize his role as a father, drawing lessons from his past to ensure a nurturing environment for his children. tags : bollywood pankaj kapur Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 13:44 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Recalls Childhood Bullying Due To Absent Father: ‘Parents Are Like Legs, When One Is Missing…’ Read More
