title: Khloe Kardashian On Being Cheated In Relationships: ‘I Know What Was Done’
summary: Khloe Kardashian went on to say that no matter what someone did to her, she was never manipulative or tried to do the same thing back.
full_content: Khloe Kardashian On Being Cheated In Relationships: ‘I Know What Was Done’ Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 13:43 IST Khloe Kardashian went on to say that no matter what someone did to her, she was never manipulative or tried to do the same thing back. reset Follow us on Google News Khloe launched her podcast Khloe in Wonderland. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Khloe Kardashian’s personal life has been a roller coaster ride over the years, and recently, the celebrity opened up about experiencing infidelity in previous relationships. Khloe was married to Lamar Odom, and following her split from her ex-husband, she began dating Tristan Thompson, with whom she shares two children. During a talk with Jay Shetty for her Khloe in Wonderland podcast episode, Khloe mentioned that she had a history of trauma and has learned to deal with it. In the episode, Khloe Kardashian stated, “I know what was done to me was not about me.I know that was about them, and they have past trauma that they’ve never healed from." Khloe also mentioned that whenever she questioned her partners about why they cheated, the response would be like “‘Oh, my parents or I came from a broken house.’ It’s always something like that. It’s never about the immediate relationship." Khloe added, “If it wasn’t for my family, my core circle, and also my relationship with God… I just learned it wasn’t about me." Khloe went on to say that no matter what someone did to her, she was never manipulative or tried to do the same thing back. related stories Khloe Kardashian married Lamar Odom in 2009. The pair split up after four years of marriage amid rumours of the latter cheating on the TV star. Khloe then met Tristan Thompson in 2016, and the couple eventually called it quits in 2021. They have two children together. In the same podcast, Khloe stated, “I’m not ashamed of my romantic past. Every relationship has shaped me in some way, and I’ve learned so much about love, forgiveness, and resilience. It’s all part of my story." Khloé in Wonder Land is officially LIVE on X! Catch my first-ever podcast episode with @ScottDisick !! title: Robert Pattinson’s ‘Snack Break In Seoul’ With Filmmaker Bong Joon-Ho Was Kind Of ‘Spicy’
summary: Before Robert Pattinson begins with the food experiment, Bong Joon-Ho is seen asking him whether it is okay, assuring him that the spice level of the food is mild.
full_content: Robert Pattinson’s ‘Snack Break In Seoul’ With Filmmaker Bong Joon-Ho Was Kind Of ‘Spicy’ Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 14:59 IST Before Robert Pattinson begins with the food experiment, Bong Joon-Ho is seen asking him whether it is okay, assuring him that the spice level of the food is mild. reset Follow us on Google News Robert Pattinson plays Mickey Barnes in Mickey-17. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Robert Pattinson is back with a new project and this time, he is collaborating with Parasite filmmaker Bong Joon-Ho for a mind-bending sci-fi movie Mickey 17. The film is gearing up for its release in March this year. Ahead of the film’s arrival in cinemas, Robert and Joon-Ho gave a glimpse of their bond through a post on Instagram. Shared by the official page of the film Mickey 17, the clip shows Pattinson trying Korean food with his director. A text attached to the post read, “Snack break in Seoul." Before Robert Pattinson begins with the food experiment, Bong Joon-Ho is seen asking him whether it is okay, assuring him that the spice level of the food is mild. But one bite and the expression on Pattinson’s face says it all. Smiling, the actor says, “It is kind of spicy though followed by asking, “That’s the medium? My God." Humorously, he also tells the filmmaker, “I am such a baby. I’m literally like – I am sweating already." Soon, Pattinson realises he was being tricked into eating the food that in fact, was heavily spicy. The duo also laughs out loud in a lighthearted moment. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mickey 17 (@mickey17) As Pattinson jokingly admitted to having a hard time, the Parasite filmmaker quickly apologises saying, “I am sorry." The clip ends on a wholesome note as the actor asks the viewers to watch their upcoming film on March 7 followed by making a heart together with Bong Joon-Ho. Set to hit theatres globally on March 7, Mickey 17 is inspired by the novel Mickey7 by Edward Ashton. Robert Pattinson portrays Mickey Barnes who works for an employer seeking extraordinary commitment: to die for a living. The intriguing storyline promises another thought-provoking story in the sci-fi genre by Joon-Ho. Apart from Robert Pattinson, the film also stars Steven Yeun, Naomi Ackie, Toni Collette and Mark Ruffalo. During a press conference, the actor shared why he signed the film. He reportedly said, “You don’t find roles like this ever, especially on this scale. It’s a massive movie and I just love the fact that Bong manages to have his sense of humour very very prominent and such a huge movie." Bong Joon-Ho also expressed confidence in the premise saying that it will bring depth to the story. tags : entertainment hollywood Robert Pattinson Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 13:38 IST News movies Robert Pattinson’s ‘Snack Break In Seoul’ With Filmmaker Bong Joon-Ho Was Kind Of ‘Spicy’ Read More

title: Akshay Kumar Shares New Stills From Sky Force On Its Release: 'More Than Just A Film'
summary: Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya-starrer Sky Force released in cinemas today, January 24, with a positive response.
full_content: Akshay Kumar Shares New Stills From Sky Force On Its Release: 'More Than Just A Film' Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 13:10 IST Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya-starrer Sky Force released in cinemas today, January 24, with a positive response. reset Follow us on Google News Akshay Kumar in new stills from Sky Force. Akshay Kumar and newcomer Veer Pahariya’s much-anticipated film Sky Force released in theatres today, January 24, 2025. Needless to say, Kumar is on cloud nine on this day. The Bollywood superstar took to his social media account to drop two new stills from the movie that shows him in his character of KC Ahuja. Along with that, Akshay also penned a heartfelt note. Sharing the two photos on his Instagram account, Akshay Kumar wrote, “Today is the day! Sky Force soars into cinemas, and I couldn’t be prouder at bringing this incredible untold story to life. It’s more than just a film—it’s a tribute to the real heroes who defend our skies with courage and honor. related stories This is a story of patriotism, sacrifice, and resilience and I hope it resonates with you as much as it has with us. See you at the movies!" Check it out: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) Sky Force sees Akshay and Veer play the roles of Indian Air Force pilots. The film is based on the true story of Squadron Leader Devayya and other members of the Indian Air Force who fought during the 1965 Indo-Pak war. This is also Veer Pahariya’s debut in Bollywood. Earlier, in an exclusive conversation with News 18 Showsha, Pahariya had sung praises of Akshay Kumar, calling him a ‘secure actor’. Veer said, “A few days ago, Akshay sir had told me that he has done a lot of two hero three hero films in his career. We remember that too. What happens in that scenario is that the box office gets pulled up by two actors combined. This didn’t happen in Bollywood for a while now. People should support each other." To this, Akshay Kumar added, “Log darte hain 2 hero 3 hero film karne mein. Unhe lagta hain unka 19 dusre ka role 20 hain. There have been times I have asked the other actor to choose what role they wanted. Kar lo yar. We have to be together." Veer carried on saying, “Akshay sir has given a chance to a lot of newcomers like myself. It is his secure nature that he let me share a poster with him. He has done this with so many actors over the years." While you’re here, watch our exclusive interview with Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya below: Sky Force also sees Sara Ali Khan playing the role of the late soldier’s wife in the film. The film is directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and produced by Jio Studios and Maddock Films tags : Akshay Kumar bollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 13:10 IST News movies Akshay Kumar Shares New Stills From Sky Force On Its Release: 'More Than Just A Film' Read More

Previously, talking about her character, Hina Khan told Hindustan Times, “I took a lot of, I wouldn’t say, inspiration, but little tiny bits from my own journey, like, how when things don’t go as planned, and when, when you go through tough times in life, adversity, like, how do you deal with it? summary: Veer Pahariya's Bollywood debut in "Skyforce," directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani, has earned praise for his performance alongside Akshay Kumar. News18 Showsha rated the film 4 stars.

The film, directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani, tells the gripping tale of India’s retaliatory strike on Pakistan’s Sargodha airbase during the 1965 Indo-Pakistani War. Despite being a newcomer, Veer has earned praise for his performance, with critics noting his ability to hold his own alongside Bollywood star Akshay Kumar. News18 Showsha gave the film 4 stars, highlighting Veer’s impressive portrayal in a demanding role. The review read, “Veer delivers a very good performance and shines bright even as he shares screen space with an actor of the stature and calibre of Akshay Kumar." The praise from critics isn’t just for his acting chops, but also for his strong screen presence, making it clear that he’s one to watch in the future of Bollywood. related stories A Star with a Powerful Legacy Veer Pahariya is the son of business tycoon Sanjay Pahadia and Sobo Films owner Smriti Sanjay Shinde. He is also the brother of Shikhar Pahariya and the grandson of prominent political figure Sushilkumar Shinde, former Chief Minister of Maharashtra. With his family’s legacy, Veer is quickly carving his own niche in the film industry, and his debut in Skyforce is just the beginning of what promises to be a promising career. Veer Pahariya’s role in Sky Force: He portrays the late Squadron Leader Ajjamada B Devaiah as T Vijaya, a daring and fearless fighter pilot. Veer was spotted attending the film’s premiere with his mother on Thursday. In viral photos and videos, Veer can be seen escorting his mother to the screening hall, exuding charm in a black t-shirt and a black bomber jacket emblazoned with the Sky Force logo. His mother, Smruti Shinde, looked elegant in a beige salwar suit and was visibly brimming with pride as she held her son’s hand, making her way into the venue. title: Kartik Aaryan Waves At Fans During Coldplay Concert In Mumbai, Video Goes Viral | Watch
summary: Kartik Aaryan and his sister, Dr. Kritika Tiwari, attended Coldplay concert in Navi Mumbai’s DY Patil Stadium.
full_content: Kartik Aaryan Waves At Fans During Coldplay Concert In Mumbai, Video Goes Viral | Watch Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 12:04 IST Kartik Aaryan and his sister, Dr. Kritika Tiwari, attended Coldplay concert in Navi Mumbai’s DY Patil Stadium. reset Follow us on Google News Kartik Aaryan's video from Coldplay concert goes viral Kartik Aaryan was recently spotted attending Coldplay’s concert in Mumbai. The videos and photos of him from the concert are going viral. Amid this, a video surfaced online in which he is seen waving at fans while he waits for the show to begin. Kartik is seen chatting with his other team members. The fan took to his Instagram handle and shared the video in which he is seen asking his other friends also to see Kartik. Suddenly the actor noticed and came forward to wave at them. They were seen screaming with excitement. Many fans dropped heart and fire emojis in the comment section. Kartik Aaryan and his sister, Dr. Kritika Tiwari, joined thousands of Coldplay fans at the band’s Music of the Spheres World Tour concert in Navi Mumbai’s DY Patil Stadium. related stories Watch the video here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Voompla (@voompla) Taking to Instagram, Kartik posted a video capturing the electric atmosphere of the concert and wrote, “Sky Full Of Stars In My College Campus Pure Magic (sic)." The post resonated with his fans, who were thrilled to see the actor enjoying himself at the venue where he once pursued his studies. Just a few days before the concert, on January 11, Kartik returned to DY Patil College for his convocation ceremony, finally receiving his engineering degree after over a decade. Reflecting on his journey, he shared, “From sitting on the backbench to standing on the stage for my convocation – what a journey it’s been. DY Patil University, you gave me memories, dreams, and now, finally, my degree (only took over a decade!)." He expressed gratitude to Vijay Patil, his teachers, and students for the warm welcome he received. On the professional front, Kartik was last seen in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 in November 2024. He is currently working on Anurag Basu’s upcoming romantic drama alongside Triptii Dimri. Kartik is also set to star in Tu Meri Main Tera, Main Tera Tu Meri, a romantic comedy directed by Sameer Vidwans and produced by Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, slated for release in 2026. Reports suggest that Sharvari Wagh will play the female lead. Kartik’s journey from being an engineering student from Gwalior to becoming one of Bollywood’s most bankable stars is inspiring. Despite having no film connections, he pursued his dream while sharing an apartment with 12 roommates in Mumbai, proving that hard work and perseverance can lead to success. tags : bollywood Coldplay kartik aaryan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 12:04 IST News movies Kartik Aaryan Waves At Fans During Coldplay Concert In Mumbai, Video Goes Viral | Watch Read More

title: Rajpal Yadav's Father Passes Away In Delhi Days After Actor Received Death Threat
summary: Rajpal Yadav rushed to Delhi from Thailand after hearing the unfortunate news.
full_content: Rajpal Yadav's Father Passes Away In Delhi Days After Actor Received Death Threat Curated By : Grace Cyril Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 12:09 IST Rajpal Yadav rushed to Delhi from Thailand after hearing the unfortunate news. reset Follow us on Google News Rajpal Yadav has lost his father. Actor and comedian Rajpal Yadav is grieving the loss of his father, Naurang Yadav, who passed away in Delhi in the wee hours of Friday (January 24). The tragic news comes just days after the actor revealed he had received death threats. He has been unwell since the last few days. Rajpal’s father was admitted to AIIMS hospital in Delhi where is died. At the time of his death, the actor was in Pattaya, Thailand, for the shoot of his upcoming film. Upon hearing the news of his father’s demise, he rushed to Delhi. related stories Rajpal has not released an official statement yet. Bach in 2018, Rajpal Yadav had posted a picture with his father on X (formerly known as Twitter) and penned a heartfelt note for him. “My father has been the biggest driving force in my life. If it wasn’t for your belief in me, I would not be where I am today. Thank you for being my father, I love you," he wrote. Check it out: My father has been the biggest driving force in my life. If it wasn’t for your belief in me, I would not be where I am today. Thank you for being my father, I love you ❤ pic.twitter.com/CFesDPMvn5 — Rajpal Naurang Yadav (@rajpalofficial) June 17, 2018 Rajpal Yadav recently made headlines after he received death threats via e-mail from Pakistan. An FIR has been filed in Mumbai, and a case has been registered at the Amboli Police Station in Mumbai based on a complaint filed by Yadav. In his audio statement, Rajpal Yadav clarified that he had already informed both the cybercrime department and the police about the threats. The actor stated, “I have informed both the cybercrime department and the police, and after that, I haven’t spoken to anyone. In fact, it’s not my job to talk about this incident when I don’t know anything about it. I am an actor, and in acting, I try to entertain people of all ages, young and old, through my work. I don’t want to say anything more than this. Whatever needs to be said about this matter, the agencies are capable of providing the information. I have shared the details I was aware of." According to the police, the threatening email was sent from Pakistan to Kapil Sharma and Remo D’Souza as well. The message read, “We are monitoring your recent activities and we believe it is important that we bring to your attention a sensitive matter. This is not a publicity stunt or an attempt to harass you. We urge you to treat this message with utmost seriousness and confidentiality." The email was signed off by the sender using the name ‘BISHNU.’ On December 14, 2024, Rajpal Yadav had received a threatening email from an individual identifying himself as Bishnu, under the ID “Don." The message warned of an attack on Kapil Sharma and his team due to their show being sponsored by Salman Khan. This prompted swift action with Yadav’s wife, Radha Rajpal Yadav, filing a formal police complaint at the Amboli Police Station in Mumbai. tags : Rajpal yadav TV Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 12:04 IST News movies Rajpal Yadav's Father Passes Away In Delhi Days After Actor Received Death Threat Read More

title: Camila Cabello Performs In Nearly Empty Stadium, What's The Truth?
summary: Singer Camila Cabello performed in a nearly empty arena where '99% percent of artists would’ve cancelled.'
full_content: Camila Cabello Performs In Nearly Empty Stadium, What's The Truth? Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 11:30 IST Singer Camila Cabello performed in a nearly empty arena where '99% percent of artists would’ve cancelled.' reset Follow us on Google News Camila Cabello performed onstage during Night 2 of 2025 AT&T Playoff Playlist Live in Atlanta, Georgia. The internet has been with reports that pop superstar Camila Cabello performed in front of a nearly empty stadium! Fans and trolls alike were scratching their heads, wondering if the Havana singer’s star power had suddenly fizzled out. It was her recent performance at the AT&T Playoff Playlist Live! concert in Atlanta, Georgia, that went viral for all the wrong reasons. A photo from the event showed the singer of being in her ‘flop era’ as there were hardly any audience at the State Farm Arena. “that s–t was EMPTY," one social media user tweeted the following day. “Why is she even performing that *** is empty," a person commented on social media. related stories A screenshot was also doing the rounds on social media claiming that only about 30 per cent of the tickets for Camila Cabello’s State Farm Arena show had been sold. A troll asked, “true question why do some singers do this? if you know u cant sell arenas why do them? isnt it just extra costs for no reason and embarrassment?" However, Mod Sun applauded Camila for performing regardless of the turnout. “99 percent of artists would’ve cancelled the show + put out a ‘mental health’ statement," the rapper, 37, wrote on Tuesday. “She just gained my respect by still performing." He explained, “That show meant the world to the people in the crowd that night. EMPTY SHOWS ARE STILL SHOWS." But the truth is probably something else. Camila was actually performing at an exclusive private event, and the “empty stadium" was part of the whole vibe, said a source to Page Six. The event was limited to a small, select group of VIPs. The insider clarified to the international media portal that the event was a corporate gathering, and only a limited number of tickets were sold to the public. So, while the stadium may have looked empty in the viral clips, it was all intentional. Cabello had headlined the event alongside artists Myles Smith and Knox. Later, she shared a heartfelt Instagram post expressing her gratitude to her devoted fans saying, “Being a fan is a transformative and creative and sacred endeavor. The artist who gives to their community also gets, in the form of love, inspiration, and trust." View this post on Instagram A post shared by c (@camila_cabello) Cabello rose to fame in 2012 on The X Factor as part of Fifth Harmony. She has enjoyed a successful solo career since leaving the group in 2016. tags : Camila Cabello hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 11:27 IST News movies Camila Cabello Performs In Nearly Empty Stadium, What's The Truth? title: BLACKPINK Star Rose’s Makeup Artist Reveals Why Her Job Is Difficult
summary: Rose’s makeup artist shared some intriguing BTS details about the challenges of preparing her for the spotlight.
full_content: BLACKPINK Star Rose’s Makeup Artist Reveals Why Her Job Is Difficult Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 11:26 IST Rose’s makeup artist shared some intriguing BTS details about the challenges of preparing her for the spotlight. reset Follow us on Google News BLACKPINK’s Rose stole the limelight in On The Ground. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Ever since she collaborated with Bruno Mars for APT., BLACKPINK’s Rose has been dominating headlines and proving her mettle as a solo artist. While APT. brings a high-energy vibe, her 2021 tracks Gone and On The Ground explore more mellower side. Recently, On The Ground achieved a remarkable milestone, surpassing 500 million streams on Spotify. It became Rose’s second single to reach this feat after the massive success of APT. While BLACKPINK’s Rose continues to dominate headlines with her music, her makeup artist recently shared some intriguing behind-the-scenes details about the challenges of preparing her for the spotlight. Despite the visually stunning appeal of On The Ground, Rose’s makeup artist, Lee Myung Sun, revealed in an interview why doing her makeup is a uniquely challenging task. related stories In an interview with Allure Korea, Lee Myung Sun was asked about the various looks Rose sported in the music video for her solo debut song On The Ground. Discussing her makeup, Lee explained, “Rose’s skin is like egg white. Her skin is incredible, but it can be challenging to apply base makeup. Her skin is so smooth, and her pores are so tight that it feels like the foundation is being pushed away." Despite the challenges, Lee Myung Sun shared how she achieved a flawless look for Rose. “With a fine foundation, I would apply it quickly, ensuring it sticks to the skin. Too many touches would make the skin push the foundation out, so I kept the base application minimal to maintain its smooth finish," she added. Nevertheless, Lee Myung Sun emphasised that whether with or without makeup, Rose remains a true visual queen. Earlier this month, On The Ground from Rose’s debut solo album R, gained 500 million plays on the streaming platform Spotify. Previously, the singer discussed the song’s lyrics on YouTube’s Released. She said, “Basically the song is kind of about looking for answers in life, for a purpose in life, and I feel like people, especially these days, can relate to it. Sometimes when you’re always kind of on that roll, you kind of forget to take care of what actually matters to you most, and it’s just a song that says that everything we need is already within us. There’s no need to go out and look for it." The track was released in March 2024. tags : BLACKPINK entertainment rose Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 11:26 IST News movies BLACKPINK Star Rose’s Makeup Artist Reveals Why Her Job Is Difficult Read More

title: Akshay Kumar DENIES Going To Bed While Vivek Oberoi Had Dinner At His Place: 'This Doesn’t Happen'
summary: Akshay Kumar, promoting Sky Force, refuted claims by Vivek Oberoi about going to bed early during a dinner. Akshay emphasized his role as a good host, ensuring guests are seen off properly.
full_content: Akshay Kumar DENIES Going To Bed While Vivek Oberoi Had Dinner At His Place: 'This Doesn’t Happen' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 11:24 IST Akshay Kumar, promoting Sky Force, refuted claims by Vivek Oberoi about going to bed early during a dinner. Akshay emphasized his role as a good host, ensuring guests are seen off properly. reset Follow us on Google News Akshay Kumar refutes Vivek Oberoi's claims. (Pic credit: STRDEL/AFP via Getty Images) Akshay Kumar, who is currently promoting his film Sky Force, was recently asked about his ‘early to bed, early to rise’ routine and how he manages to socialise. He was specifically asked about an incident where he supposedly went to bed at 9:30 pm while Vivek Oberoi and Riteish Deshmukh were still having dinner at his place. In an interview with ABP News, Akshay explained that he is a “very good host" and always sees his guests off to their cars. Refuting Vivek’s claim, he said, “No, this doesn’t happen. I drop people till their cars. I don’t leave them by themselves." He then opened up on parties at his house and said, “I am very good host. We usually don’t have parties at home but when we host a party, it’s usually an early dinner. People come over, talk a bit, those who want to drink, they drink and and then I see them off." related stories Earlier, in an interview with the same publication, Vivek praised Akshay’s discipline, calling it “commendable" as the actor sticks to his routine without fail. He recalled a dinner at Akshay’s house when, at 9:30 pm, Akshay went upstairs. “Akshay is so disciplined that one evening, we were having dinner at his place, and as soon as the clock struck 9:30 pm, he went upstairs. We thought he was just going to the washroom, but he never returned. We kept waiting for him until 11 pm, only for his wife, Twinkle Khanna, to come and tell us, ‘You guys should leave now. He’s already gone to sleep!’ That’s how disciplined he is. Hats off to him," he had said. On the film front, Vivek has three movies lined up, the first being is Masti 4. In an earlier chat with Screen, Vivek had opened up on it. “I am having a lot of fun cracking up between me, Riteish, Aftaab, and Induji, Milap Zaveri is directing it," he had said. tags : Akshay Kumar bollywood Vivek Oberoi Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 11:24 IST News movies Akshay Kumar DENIES Going To Bed While Vivek Oberoi Had Dinner At His Place: 'This Doesn’t Happen' Read More

The event was held at Sathyabama University, and the actress has shared several glimpses of herself from the special occasion. In the pictures, Samantha is seen wearing a translucent white short kurta-style top paired with a white bralette. She paired it with flared blue denim and stacked elegant chains. One of them commented, “After long gap, that smile made my day shine, Sam." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Samantha (@samantharuthprabhuoffl) Speaking about the team and the love of sports, Samantha Ruth Prabhu had earlier said, “Chennai has a vibe that’s unmatched—spirited, fiery, and always up for a challenge! That’s exactly what we wanted the Chennai Super Champs jersey to reflect. Pickleball is an exciting sport that brings people together for fun, competition, and fitness, and I couldn’t be more proud to see Chennai Super Champs take the lead." Some days back, Samantha shared her strategy to deal with difficult situations in life. The actress took to Instagram to share a photo of herself writing in a journal. Samantha revealed that she frequently writes about things she is grateful for. She emphasised that it enables her to appreciate what is good in her life rather than dwelling on the negative. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Samantha (@samantharuthprabhuoffl) Samantha was last seen in the Prime Video series Citadel: Honey Bunny. The series marked her return on screen after her long break due to health complications. The actress starred opposite Varun Dhawan in the series, which was made by Raj and DK. Samantha played Honey in the action film, and Varun Dhawan played Bunny. Moving ahead, Samantha will appear in Raj and DK’s fantasy action series, Rakt Brahmand – The Bloody Kingdom. Samantha will be featured alongside Aditya Roy Kapoor, Wamiqa Gabbi, Ali Fazal and Nikitin Dheer. tags : bollywood entertainment Samantha Ruth Prabhu Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 10:56 IST News movies Samantha Ruth Prabhu Is All Smiles At Chennai Super Champs' Jersey Launch Read More

title: Bigg Boss Narrator Vijay Vikram Singh Receives Death Threats From Rajat Dalal's Fans
summary: Fans of Vijay Vikram Singh, narrator for Bigg Boss, have mistakenly believed that he is Bigg Boss himself.
full_content: Bigg Boss Narrator Vijay Vikram Singh Receives Death Threats From Rajat Dalal's Fans Curated By : Grace Cyril Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 10:45 IST Fans of Vijay Vikram Singh, narrator for Bigg Boss, have mistakenly believed that he is Bigg Boss himself. reset Follow us on Google News Vijay Vikram Singh is receiving death threats from Rajat Dalal's fans. In a troubling turn of events, renowned voice artist Vijay Vikram Singh, best known as the narrator of the popular reality show Bigg Boss since 15 years, has been receiving death threats and online abuses from fans of Rajat Dalal. The social media influencer had lost the Bigg Boss 18 trophy to Karan Veer Mehra on January 19, 2025. He emerged as the second runner-up while Vivian D’Sena was the first runner-up of the Salman Khan-hosted show. The threats to Vijay Vikram Singh began shortly after the BB 18 finale was aired as Rajat Dalal’s fans were disappointed at his eviction. While Singh is responsible for narrating the events and providing commentary as scripted by the show’s producers, some fans of Dalal appear to have misconstrued his role as Bigg Boss himself, leading to online backlash and now, threats of violence. related stories The death threats reportedly came through social media platforms, with several users sending direct messages and public posts targeting Singh. Fans have also criticised the show’s creators, labelling it “fixed." In fact, in one of Vijay’s recent posts, Rajat Dalal’s fans were also seen abusing Vijay and his family which prompted him to turn off the comment section. A fan page of the fitness influencer wrote, “You did wrong with Rajat Dalal; your family and kids will never be happy." Back in December 2024, Vijay Vikram Singh had clarified that he is merely a narrator on Bigg Boss and not the voice of Bigg Boss himself. He explained in a video message, “Please stop abusing me in the comments section and messages. I just narrate the tasks and timings for the audience in Bigg Boss. I know nothing about the voice that speaks to the contestants. I don’t know if it’s a machine or a real person. So I request the audience to refrain from abusing me." Vijay had also faced hate messages after Digvijay Rathee’s eviction. In response, Vijay shared another video message in which he said, “Please stop sending hate messages. I am the second voice of Bigg Boss, not the Bigg Boss." tags : Bigg Boss 18 TV Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 10:45 IST News movies Bigg Boss Narrator Vijay Vikram Singh Receives Death Threats From Rajat Dalal's Fans Read More

title: Saif Ali Khan's Friend Afsar Zaidi Refutes Reports Of Him Rushing Actor To Hospital
summary: According to Afsar Zaidi, he reached the hospital after receiving a call at around 4 am, filled out the mandatory form and completed all the formalities needed for the actor's treatment
full_content: Saif Ali Khan's Friend Afsar Zaidi Refutes Reports Of Him Rushing Actor To Hospital Curated By : Prisha Vibhavari News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 10:24 IST According to Afsar Zaidi, he reached the hospital after receiving a call at around 4 am, filled out the mandatory form and completed all the formalities needed for the actor's treatment reset Follow us on Google News Actor Saif Ali Khan gets discharged from Lilavati Hospital, greets fans. The mystery of who rushed actor Saif Ali Khan to the Lilavati Hospital on the night of the knife attack continues to deepen. After reports of his elder son Ibrahim and then his younger son Taimur taking him to the hospital emerged, yesterday it was reported that his family friend Afsar Zaidi was the man who had rushed the actor. related stories On Thursday, Zaidi also refuted the reports of taking the actor to the hospital on the night when the stabbing incident took place, reported India Today. Zaidi claimed that he had reached the hospital only after receiving call from the Pataudi family. According to Zaidi, he received a call from the family of Saif Ali Khan at around 3:30 am on January 16 and was asked to come to Lilavati hospital where the actor was admitted. Saif was rushed to the hospital after he was stabbed six times by an intruder who had entered his house to carry out a robbery in Bandra. Zaidi said that he was able to reach the hospital at around 4 am where he filled out the mandatory form and completed all the admission formalities for the actor’s treatment. In Saif Ali Khan’s patient admission form, which was accessed by News18, details of injuries suffered by the actor were mentioned. The form also had the name of Afsar Ziaidi in the “brought to the hospital by" field and the relation was mentioned as “friend". It was earlier reported that Saif’s eight-year-old son Taimur Ali Khan had accompanied him to the hospital, which was also confirmed by the doctors later. What Details Were Found In Saif’s Admission Form? In the admission form of Saif Ali Khan, it was mentioned that the actor was allotted bed no. 1112 after he was admitted at 4.11 am on January 16. Image of Saif Ali Khan’s admission form. It added that the actor was subjected to “assault by an unknown person at 2:30 am while at home in Bandra, sustaining multiple laceration wounds and bleeding." As per the admission form, the actor had lacerations in the back, right side of the neck, right shoulder and lateral aspect of his left wrist and also had an elbow abrasion wound. The hospital had discharged the actor on Tuesday. He was wearing a cast on his hand there was a bandage on his neck. tags : Actor Saif Ali Khan hospital stabbed Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 10:20 IST News movies Saif Ali Khan's Friend Afsar Zaidi Refutes Reports Of Him Rushing Actor To Hospital Read More

title: Decades Later, Here's Why Coldplay Remains A Favourite, Selling Out Arenas Worldwide
summary: Coldplay's India tour highlighted their multi-generational appeal, with fans of all ages. Their concerts are known for accessibility, love-themed messages, visuals, and sustainability.
full_content: Decades Later, Here's Why Coldplay Remains A Favourite, Selling Out Arenas Worldwide Written By : Sanchita Vohra News18.com Edited By: Shreyanka Mazumdar Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 10:18 IST Coldplay's India tour highlighted their multi-generational appeal, with fans of all ages. Their concerts are known for accessibility, love-themed messages, visuals, and sustainability. reset Follow us on Google News Coldplay will perform in Ahmedabad next. Music from the early 2000s, is etched in the memory of every 90s kid, listening to the melodies that were there for them on some of the most carefree and simple days of their lives evokes a sense of nostalgia that no new hit single can ever quite compare to. So, when a beloved childhood artist goes on tour, tickets often sell out faster than the speed of light and as the D-day arrives, fans imagine that they’ll be singing along with someone from their birth cohort who shares their emotions, and this may be the case with other artists but not when it comes to Coldplay the band’s appeal extends beyond the barriers of age. Visuals from their India tour bear witness to this fact where the crowd comprised kids, adolescents and even families all which were singing their hearts out, making the evening no less than a night in paradise. related stories Evidently, a Coldplay concert is no longer just a concert, it’s a phenomenon, a once-in-a-lifetime adventure as many users on social media call it. But what sets the experience apart and why is their impact multi-generational? Let us dive in: Accessible Music for All One way or another, music is intertwined with every aspect of our lives – be it putting your playlist on repeat after a long day, listening to those tunes that take us back to the treasured days of childhood to even choosing your wedding anthem. Every moment is made a tad better by its presence. To make the experience accessible for all, there is a local sign language interpreter at every Coldplay show as well as Subpacs for those who are hard of hearing so that they can feel a stronger connection to the music. Apart from this, the group has also provided sensory bags and a mobile sensory refuge station for those with sensory sensitivities. Moreover, for those with low/no vision there is a touch tour before every show. Bearing the Emblem of Love and Kindness Right from the moment when the Love buttons are given to you as you enter the arena, the lyrics of their songs which talk about love aloud to Martin’s tattoo which says, ‘Love is God’ – the bands purpose is clear, they are here to spread love and every generation relates to it. Anisha, 23, who will soon be attending the concert and has been following the band’s journey for over a decade, says that ‘Even at fourteen I could deeply connect with their lyrics." Furthermore, she shares that what’s unique about the band is that they are ‘Universally relatable which allows their music to resonate with every age group, in fact according to her if aliens listened to their music even, they would find something meaningful in it." A Visual Treat Unlike other concerts, attending a Coldplay live show is a unique experience. The famous ‘Moon Goggles’ offer a fun way to view the world, and seeing the sky light up with hearts and stars is something many people look forward to. In addition, the Xylo bands change colour with each song, vibrant lights move across the crowd, fireworks brighten the night sky, and large video screens highlight every moment. Sustainability While the magic of Coldplay’s concerts captivates fans across generations, their commitment extends beyond the stage. In 2019, Coldplay announced they would not tour until they found a way to reduce carbon emissions during their concert, and as of 2024 they have managed to cut down 59% of carbon dioxide emissions during the MOTS tour in contrast to their previous tour. They have achieved this via reusing LED concert wristbands that are made from recycled material for different shows, by installing power bikes and kinetic floors through which fans can generate power for the show by cycling or dancing. In fact, even the vivid confetti that’s used to light up the sky is 100% biodegradable. Moreover, the band has committed to planting a tree for every ticket sold due to which 7 million trees have been planted across 24 countries. These efforts have struck a chord with Gen-Z, who according to a representative from TINEB (There Is No Earth B) considers ‘Sustainability Personal, which is why they genuinely prefer events that demonstrate real commitment to sustainability’. Meanwhile, the band is all set to play their biggest show yet at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, tickets for which are already sold out. Thus, reiterating the fact that the Coldplay fever is far from fading and will make its impact on generations to come! tags : Coldplay Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 10:17 IST News movies Decades Later, Here's Why Coldplay Remains...

title: Sonu Nigam Calls AR Rahman’s Album In Yuvvraaj ‘Bekaar’, Says 'Can't Lie And Praise A Bad Song'
summary: Sonu Nigam said that AR Rahman's work in Subhash Ghai's Yuvvraaj was a bad album.
full_content: Sonu Nigam Calls AR Rahman’s Album In Yuvvraaj ‘Bekaar’, Says 'Can't Lie And Praise A Bad Song' Curated By : Grace Cyril Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 10:12 IST Sonu Nigam said that AR Rahman's work in Subhash Ghai's Yuvvraaj was a bad album. reset Follow us on Google News Sonu Nigam has criticised AR Rahman's songs from Yuvraaj. Legendary playback singer Sonu Nigam has now made a rather controversial statement about AR Rahman’s work in the 2008 Bollywood film Yuvvraaj. Nigam, known for his velvety voice and straight-shooter personality, didn’t mince words when he described the album as “bekaar" (useless), adding that he “can’t lie and praise a bad song." Yuvvraaj, directed by Subhash Ghai, starred Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif in lead roles. The revelation came during an interview where Nigam was asked about his thoughts on his collaboration with Rahman in the film Yuvvraaj. The Kal Ho Naa Ho singer didn’t hold back while telling O2 India about the song Shano Shano from Yuvvraaj and said, “That song is pretty average. It wasn’t such a good song. Let’s not talk about it. I won’t be able to lie. I won’t be able to praise a bad song." He was then asked about the other two songs that he recorded for the same album and he said, “Voh bhool jaiye aap. Iske saare gaane bekaar the. (Just forget about it. All the songs were bad.)" related stories Yuvvraaj was a musical romantic family drama film that starred Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Anil Kapoor and Zayed Khan. The story featured a fragmented family of three brothers who try to con each other to inherit their father’s wealth. The film was about the arrogance and overconfidence of contemporary youth. The film was released on 21 November 2008 but bombed at the box-office. Subhash Ghai, the director of Yuuvraaj, had earlier told ANI that AR Rahman’s Oscar-winning song Jai Ho was originally made for his film but he did not use it. “That Jai Ho song was made for Yuvvraaj. We recorded it but after recording, I felt that it won’t work for us in that situation. Rahman gave the song to that (Slumdog Millionaire) film. It is his composition." AR Rahman went on to win two Oscars for Slumdog Millionaire. He won Best Original Song for Jai Ho and Best Original Score at the 81st Academy Awards. tags : AR Rahman bollywood Sonu Nigam Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 10:12 IST News movies Sonu Nigam Calls AR Rahman’s Album In Yuvvraaj ‘Bekaar’, Says 'Can't Lie And Praise A Bad Song' Read More

title: Congress Lodges Complaint With EC Against AAP Over 'Defamatory' Post
summary: According to the complaint, the ruling party in Delhi targeted its former president Rahul Gandhi along with other leaders.
full_content: Congress Lodges Complaint With EC Against AAP Over 'Defamatory' Post Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:45 IST According to the complaint, the ruling party in Delhi targeted its former president Rahul Gandhi along with other leaders. reset Follow us on Google News Congress leader Rahul Gandhi and AAP convenor Arvind Kejriwal | File Image/PTI Delhi Congress on Saturday approached the Election Commission of India with a complaint of a “defamatory poster" on social media uploaded by AAP against its leaders. According to the complaint, the ruling party in Delhi targeted its former president Rahul Gandhi along with other leaders. related stories “This is to bring to your kind notice that on Saturday, AAP (Aam Aadmi Party) on its authorised X handle has posted a defamatory picture against various senior Congress Leaders – Lok Sabha LoP Rahul Gandhi, AICC treasurer Ajay Maken, and Sandip Dikshit," it read. The post was headlined “Ek akela padega sab par bhaari," and bore a picture of Arvind Kejriwal with the caption ‘Kejriwal ki imaandari,’ and those of Congress leaders beneath his, captioned “sare beimano par padegi bhaar," the complaint read. “The post itself is in violation of the Model Code of Conduct as well as the provisions of Representation of Peoples Act 1951. Furthermore Kejriwal has been projected as an honest man and targeting senior Congress leaders such as Gandhi, Maken, and Dikshit are dishonest people. “It is submitted that the said post is baseless and without any authenticity thereby trying to malign the reputation of senior Congress leaders during the election time. The said post is a malicious attempt for political gains," the complaint stated. The Congress also highlighted the recent jailing several AAP leaders to claim that the party was anything but honest. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “Hence, it is most respectfully submitted to take appropriate actions to put restraint to such campaign by AAP and orders may be passed to remove the concerned post from their social media handles," it said. Voting for the Assembly polls will take pace in national capital on February 5, while the counting will be held on February 8. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) tags : aap congress delhi elections Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 20:45 IST News elections Congress Lodges Complaint With EC Against AAP Over 'Defamatory' Post Read More

title: ‘Can You Take A Dip In Delhi’s Yamuna?’ Yogi Adityanath Trains Guns On AAP For ‘Cheating’ Voters
summary: In an exclusive conversation with Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi at the Maha Kumbh, the Uttar Pradesh CM said not just the people of Delhi but those in Mathura, Vrindavan, and Agra are also suffering due to a dirty Yamuna
full_content: ‘Can You Take A Dip In Delhi’s Yamuna?’ Yogi Adityanath Trains Guns On AAP For ‘Cheating’ Voters Curated By : News Desk News18.com Edited By: Apoorva Misra Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:13 IST In an exclusive conversation with Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi at the Maha Kumbh, the Uttar Pradesh CM said not just the people of Delhi but those in Mathura, Vrindavan, and Agra are also suffering due to a dirty Yamuna reset Follow us on Google News UP Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath with Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi at the Maha Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj. (News18) Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath joined the Delhi Dangal on Saturday as he hit out at the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) for cheating voters in the Capital. Drawing a parallel between the Sangam in Prayagraj and the Yamuna in Delhi, he slammed the Arvind Kejriwal-led party for turning the Yamuna into a “dirty drain". Adityanath, in an exclusive conversation with Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi at the Maha Kumbh, said: “You are in Prayagraj, right? So here, there is a confluence of Maa Ganga (river), Maa Yamuna (river) and Maa Saraswati (mythical river) in Prayagraj. See the difference between the Yamuna here and the Yamuna in Delhi. You can also take a sip of water in the Yamuna here; you can also bathe. Is this possible in Delhi?" related stories He added: “This is what I want to say. The Aam Aadmi Party has cheated the country, cheated the people of Delhi, cheated the people of the capital. You can see it there. Yamuna-ji has been turned into a dirty drain. Not only the people of Delhi are suffering its ill effects, but the people of Mathura, Vrindavan, Agra are also suffering." “Later, when Yamuna tributaries — Chambal, Ken, Betwa — and the holy water of other rivers meets Yamuna, then a divine river flows. There are treatment plants installed for it. The results of the water harvesting done by us at various places are visible. Ganga and Yamuna can be seen so clear and uninterrupted in Uttar Pradesh. Otherwise, the kind of situation these people (AAP) have created…This is not just about a river, they have betrayed Indian culture in the same way." The BJP has been unrelenting in its attack on AAP over the condition of the Yamuna, with Home Minister Amit Shah on Saturday saying the people of Delhi were “waiting for Kejriwal’s world-famous dip in the Yamuna". top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “He [Kejriwal] promised he would purify River Yamuna in seven years and modify it just like London’s River Thames," Shah said at a rally. “He even said he would take a dip in the Yamuna in front of Delhiites. Arvind Kejriwal, the people of Delhi are waiting for your world-famous dip in the Yamuna. If not in Yamuna, he can go to the Mahakumbh and take a dip over there to get rid of his sins," Shah added. Meanwhile, Parvesh Verma, BJP candidate from New Delhi constituency, put a cut-out of Kejriwal over the Yamuna. tags : aam aadmi party arvind kejriwal delhi elections kumbh mela Prayagraj Yamuna Yogi Adityanath Location : Prayagraj, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 19:12 IST News politics ‘Can You Take A Dip In Delhi’s Yamuna?’ Yogi Adityanath Trains Guns On AAP For ‘Cheating’ Voters Read More

title: Avoid Fake Narratives, Disruptive Campaigns: CEC Rajiv Kumar To Political Parties
summary: CEC Rajiv Kumar was addressing the 15th National Voters' Day event here in the presence of President Droupadi Murmu.
full_content: Avoid Fake Narratives, Disruptive Campaigns: CEC Rajiv Kumar To Political Parties Published By : News Desk PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:31 IST CEC Rajiv Kumar was addressing the 15th National Voters' Day event here in the presence of President Droupadi Murmu. reset Follow us on Google News Kumar also flagged the dangerous trend all over the world of misinformation and fake narratives, calling them the single-biggest threat to democratic processes worldwide. (PTI photo) CEC Rajiv Kumar on Saturday requested political parties to avoid “disruptive campaigning" and “fake narratives", saying it might cause disillusionment among youngsters regarding the electoral process. He was addressing the 15th National Voters’ Day event here in the presence of President Droupadi Murmu, Union Law Minister Arjun Ram Meghwal and representatives of political parties. related stories At the same time, Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) Kumar assured political parties that the Election Commission (EC) would respond in writing to concerns flagged by them on the electoral process and the suggestions made by them to improve the system. His remarks came on a day the opposition Congress hit out at the EC, saying its “self-congratulation" on the occasion would not obscure the fact that the poll panel’s functioning had made a “mockery" of the Constitution and insulted the voters. Kumar also flagged the “dangerous trend" all over the world of misinformation and fake narratives, calling them the single-biggest threat to democratic processes worldwide. “I would also urge them to avoid disruptive campaigning so that our youth do not get disillusioned and move away from the electoral process," Kumar said. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “We assure them, with all respect and humility, that whenever they ask any question or give any suggestion to improve the electoral process, we will look into it with all sincerity, make improvements and also give them a written response. But we must avoid fake narratives, I would like to add," he added. National Voters’ Day is being celebrated for the last 15 years to mark the inception of the EC on January 25, 1950, a day before India became a republic. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:29 IST News elections Avoid Fake Narratives, Disruptive Campaigns: CEC Rajiv Kumar To Political Parties Read More

title: 50K Govt Jobs, Rs 10 Lakh Insurance For Gig Workers: Amit Shah Releases BJP’s Last Sankalp Patra For Delhi
summary: The BJP manifesto also promised free travel of up to Rs 4,000 annually for needy students in Delhi Metro under the National Common Mobility Card scheme.
full_content: 50K Govt Jobs, Rs 10 Lakh Insurance For Gig Workers: Amit Shah Releases BJP’s Last Sankalp Patra For Delhi Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:37 IST The BJP manifesto also promised free travel of up to Rs 4,000 annually for needy students in Delhi Metro under the National Common Mobility Card scheme. reset Follow us on Google News Union Home Minister Amit Shah releases BJP manifesto for Delhi elections | PTI Image With less than two weeks left for the Delhi Assembly polls, senior BJP leader Amit Shah on Saturday promised to clean Yamuna in three years, provide complete ownership rights in 1,700 unauthorised colonies, and welfare measures for gig workers and labourers. Shah slammed AAP supremo Arvind Kejriwal, accusing him of “lying" and not fulfilling his promises and asserted that “getting rid of liars and betrayers" is the biggest poll issue in the national capital. related stories The BJP manifesto also promised free travel of up to Rs 4,000 annually for needy students in Delhi Metro under the National Common Mobility Card scheme. The Union minister, who released the final part of BJP’s ‘Sankalp Patra’ for the February 5 Delhi polls, said people living in 1,700 unauthorised colonies will get full ownership rights of properties, which will pave the way for sale, purchase and construction if the BJP comes to power. He also reiterated that the BJP will not stop any ongoing welfare measures for the poor in Delhi. The BJP leader promised various new schemes and welfare measures for the gig workers and labourers. The BJP will form a gig workers welfare board and provide Rs 10 lakh insurance and Rs 5 lakh accident cover, he said. He also promised to fill 50,000 govt posts in a transparent manner, create 20 lakh self-employment opportunities and develop a grand Mahabharat corridor. Shah said the Centre has spent Rs 41,000 crore on building roads, Rs 15,000 crore on laying railway lines, and Rs 21,000 crore on airports in Delhi. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all He said that Delhi would not have been livable if the central government hadn’t invested in its infrastructure. Shah alleged the level of corruption was never so high as it is under Kejriwal-led AAP, citing alleged scams. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) tags : Amit Shah BJP delhi elections Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:37 IST News elections 50K Govt Jobs, Rs 10 Lakh Insurance For Gig Workers: Amit Shah Releases BJP’s Last Sankalp Patra For Delhi Read More

title: Delhi Polls: Rahul Gandhi Named In AAP's 'Dishonest People' List As Poster War Heats Up
summary: Delhi Assembly Elections: The poster has deepened the rift within the opposition bloc, further straining ties between the two parties- Congress and AAP.
full_content: Delhi Polls: Rahul Gandhi Named In AAP's 'Dishonest People' List As Poster War Heats Up Curated By : Ronit Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 17:01 IST Delhi Assembly Elections: The poster has deepened the rift within the opposition bloc, further straining ties between the two parties- Congress and AAP. reset Follow us on Google News AAP convenor Arvind Kejriwal with Congress MP Rahul Gandhi | File Image/PTI Delhi Assembly Elections 2025: The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) intensified the poster war ahead of the Delhi Assembly elections , targeting opposition leaders, including Congress MP Rahul Gandhi, by labelling them as “dishonest". The poster, which carries a tagline: “Kejriwal’s honesty will outweigh all the dishonest people," also features Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Home Minister Amit Shah, Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath, and Delhi BJP leaders, as “Dishonest". But what caught everyone’s attention was the special mention of Rahul Gandhi- AAP’s INDIA bloc partner. related stories The poster targeting the Congress leader came after Gandhi hit out at AAP supremo Arvind Kejriwal over his governance in the last 10 years, claiming that he could not match the progressive developments done during former Delhi Chief Minister and Congress leader Sheila Dikshit’s tenure. एक अकेला पड़ेगा सब पर भारी 🔥 pic.twitter.com/5jkvWaDXt4 — AAP (@AamAadmiParty) January 25, 2025 “Delhi now wants the real development model of former chief minister Sheila Dikshit and not the false propaganda and PR model of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and AAP convenor Arvind Kejriwal," Gandhi said while addressing a rally on Thursday. Rahul Gandhi previously accused Arvind Kejriwal of adopting PM Modi’s “propaganda and false promises" strategy, while neglecting critical issues like rising pollution, corruption, and inflation in Delhi. He also claimed that both leaders are indifferent to the rights and welfare of marginalized groups, such as Dalits and tribals. Congress Hits Back At AAP Reacting to the poster, Congress leader Alka Lamba dared the AAP supremo to quit the INDIA bloc, claiming that it was the latter that “begged" the grand old party for an alliance during the 2024 Lok Sabha polls. “If Arvind Kejriwal has guts, he should announce that he is leaving the INDIA alliance. Congress party is standing strong with 100 MPs and Arvind Kejriwal is the one who gave all the 7 seats to BJP," she said. “You (Arvind Kejriwal) were begging in front of us for alliance during the Lok Sabha elections. Congress made the biggest mistake by forming an alliance with your party for the 7 seats in Delhi. Congress party had to face a huge loss because of this," Congress candidate from Kalkaji said. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all #WATCH | Delhi: Congress candidate from Kalkaji assembly constituency, Alka Lamba says, “…If Arvind Kejriwal has guts, he should announce that he is leaving the INDIA alliance. Congress party is standing strong with 100 MPs and Arvind Kejriwal is the one who gave all the 7… pic.twitter.com/LmPNrNvcNj — ANI (@ANI) January 25, 2025 The poster has deepened the rift within the opposition bloc, further straining ties between the two parties- Congress and AAP, ahead of the Delhi Assembly Elections, scheduled to be held on February 5. tags : aap arvind kejriwal delhi elections Rahul Gandhi Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 17:00 IST News elections Delhi Polls: Rahul Gandhi Named In AAP's 'Dishonest People' List As Poster War Heats Up Read More

title: 'Failed To Deliver': BJP's Parvesh Verma Dips Arvind Kejriwal's Effigy In Yamuna Amid Pollution Row
summary: BJP candidate from New Delhi Parvesh Verma immersed an effigy of former Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal in Yamuna over his unfulfilled promise to clean the river.
full_content: 'Failed To Deliver': BJP's Parvesh Verma Dips Arvind Kejriwal's Effigy In Yamuna Amid Pollution Row Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 16:15 IST BJP candidate from New Delhi Parvesh Verma immersed an effigy of former Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal in Yamuna over his unfulfilled promise to clean the river. reset Follow us on Google News BJP candidate from New Delhi Parvesh Verma | Image/PTI BJP candidate from New Delhi Parvesh Verma immersed an effigy of former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal in the murky water of the Yamuna over his unfulfilled promise to clean the river so that people could take a dip in it. Kejriwal’s failure to fulfil his promise of cleaning the Yamuna has become evident, Verma told reporters at the riverbank near ITO. related stories “Despite having 11 long years of power and spending Rs 8,000 crore, the AAP government failed to deliver on its promise of cleaning the Yamuna. This is the biggest betrayal with the people of Delhi," he said. #WATCH | BJP candidate from the New Delhi assembly constituency, Parvesh Verma reaches Yamuna Ghat; takes a jibe at AAP National Convenor Arvind Kejriwal over the issue of cleaning Yamuna River. pic.twitter.com/uAVHPwOpDx — ANI (@ANI) January 25, 2025 Kejriwal claimed he would clean the river by 2025, but the situation has worsened. “effigy, we are exposing his failure to the people of Delhi," he said. The AAP supremo in his campaigns for the Delhi Assembly polls admitted that he could not fulfil the promise of cleaning the Yamuna. Now, he has assured people that the river will be cleaned in the next two-three years after AAP comes back to power in Delhi. Kejriwal’s tenure as chief minister has been limited to “hollow promises and false claims," Verma charged and accused the AAP convenor of lacking the intent and capability to clean the Yamuna. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “This act of immersing his effigy in the Yamuna is a reminder to the people that it is time to free Delhi from deceitful promises," Verma said. This demonstration aims to highlight the “failures" of Kejriwal and AAP government and to send a clear message that the problems of Delhi will remain unresolved as long as the politics of “lies and propaganda" continues, he added. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) tags : arvind kejriwal delhi elections Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 16:15 IST News elections 'Failed To Deliver': BJP's Parvesh Verma Dips Arvind Kejriwal's Effigy In Yamuna Amid Pollution Row Read More

title: New Delhi's King Kaun? 20,000 Balmikis And Their Votes Could Be Decisive On This High-Profile Seat
summary: This election, the New Delhi seat is witnessing two sons of former Chief Ministers and a former CM himself engaged in a triangular 'Battle Royale'.
full_content: New Delhi's King Kaun? 20,000 Balmikis And Their Votes Could Be Decisive On This High-Profile Seat Reported By : Anindya Banerjee News18.com Edited By: Pragati Ratti Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 10:25 IST This election, the New Delhi seat is witnessing two sons of former Chief Ministers and a former CM himself engaged in a triangular 'Battle Royale'. reset Follow us on Google News Former Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal, Sahib Singh’s son Parvesh Verma and Sheila Dikshit’s son Sandeep Dikshit are the main contenders in New Delhi. (Image: News18 & PTI) The New Delhi Assembly seat is one of the largest seats in Delhi in terms of area. However, this is the second smallest seat in terms of vote count. But when it comes to its VVIP stature, no seat comes close. This election, the seat is witnessing two sons of former Chief Ministers and a former CM himself engaged in a triangular ‘Battle Royale’. While former Delhi CM Arvind Kejriwal, Sahib Singh’s son Parvesh Verma and Sheila Dikshit’s son Sandeep Dikshit are the main contenders from the AAP, BJP and Congress respectively, there are a total of 23 contenders trying their luck from the seat. Kejriwal has been an MLA from this seat three times and this is the fourth time he has filed his nomination. related stories 2 NEW DELHIS — OF OFFICERS & SLUMS There were 1,46,000 voters here in 2020. Now this number is around 1,90,000. Most of the government offices are here, and most officers reside in this area and have voting rights in this seat. But New Delhi is not just about officers, it has another side — group D staff, and slums. This unique constituency has residences of union ministers, and members of Parliaments while housing their help on the back of their official residences. Government high risers like MS flats that house MPs, accommodate their helps in the rear section in the staff quarters. Everyone has a voting right, which makes them equal during elections. There are also a significant number of Other Backward Classes and Scheduled Castes in this assembly seat. The seat also has a fair number of voters from the Dhobi community. During campaigning, every political party reaches out to every section of the society. While many MPs don’t have voting rights here but in their respective constituencies , their staff and their families become an ideal catch for parties of all hues. ISSUES FOR NEW DELHI There is no dearth of issues in Delhi. But as long as one is in New Delhi, there are primarily three issues. But it all depends on which New Delhi is one talking about — Todarmal Road, Bengali Market, Mathura Road, Khan Market or Balmiki Mandir, Dhobi Ghat, Staff quarters of MS flats or JJ Clusters at ITO? The residents of the former will be vocal about air pollution. However, the moment you approach residents of the latter, jobs top their concerns. But the roughly 15,000 Dhobis or the washermen of New Delhi are not happy with the AAP given their long-standing complaints have never been heard. But Kejriwal realised that it could hurt him and announced, “If our government is formed, the Delhi government will establish a ‘Dhobi Samuday Welfare Board’. The dhobi community does not have a single platform to voice their issues." He also promised the youth from the Dhobi community to provide skill training for their traditional profession. This seems to have contained the damage, gauging the emotion of Bhurelal, who has been in this profession for ages, “He seems sincere. I will give him another chance." THE CAMPAIGN Though this is a three-way battle, the campaign has seen a sharp fight between the BJP and the AAP where much is at stake for the AAP National Convenor. Unlike previous elections, Kejriwal is not joking with his voters. Instead, a rattled AAP has complained against Parvesh Verma for distributing freebies, which Verma rubbished . This reporter caught Parvesh Verma catching some breath in between a non-stop door-to-door campaign and filling his stomach with sweet potatoes which he bought from the roadside. “We will win easily. Kejriwal will face not just defeat but a humiliating defeat this time. People are angry at the extent of corruption he has indulged in," said Verma while brisk walking. He added that pollution is a key election issue which the AAP government has much to answer for according to him. Sandeep Dikshit, whose mother Sheila Dikshit used to represent this constituency once and is running a spirited campaign for Congress, alleged, “Money is being distributed… both BJP, AAP are involved in this." He is leaning back to his mother’s legacy of the good old days when he claims promises were delivered. X FACTOR So, the legitimate question is, who has an edge? There is one X factor that will play an important role in deciding that — the Balmikis — around 20,000 of them in this constituency scattered around who can influence and switch verdicts. On Mandir Marg, there is a Balmiki Mandir where this reporter spent an hour with the residents who were basking in t...

title: 'Conspiracy To End Kejriwal's Life': AAP Makes Big Claim Against Centre, Delhi Police
summary: The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) on Friday accused the BJP-led Centre and the Delhi Police of conspiring to "kill" its supremo Arvind Kejriwal.
full_content: 'Conspiracy To End Kejriwal's Life': AAP Makes Big Claim Against Centre, Delhi Police Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 18:24 IST The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) on Friday accused the BJP-led Centre and the Delhi Police of conspiring to "kill" its supremo Arvind Kejriwal. reset Follow us on Google News Delhi Chief Minister Atishi and Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann | Image/X The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) on Friday accused the BJP-led Centre and the Delhi Police of conspiring to “kill" its supremo Arvind Kejriwal and urged the Election Commission (EC) to restore his security cover provided by the Punjab Police that was withdrawn. There was no immediate reaction from the BJP or the Delhi Police to the allegation. related stories Addressing a press conference here, Delhi Chief Minister Atishi and her Punjab counterpart, Bhagwant Mann, said they have written to the EC demanding “fair grounds" for the AAP in the February 5 Delhi Assembly polls and the restoration of Kejriwal’s security cover given by the Punjab Police, along with an audit of “life-threatening" attacks on him. They alleged that the Delhi Police, which comes under the Centre, has turned a blind eye on the alleged attacks on Kejriwal in accordance with Union Home Minister Amit Shah’s order. “There are two players involved in this conspiracy to kill Kejriwalji — the BJP and the Delhi Police. They are both conspiring to end Kejriwal’s life. Attacks have been attempted on him one after the other. In October (last year), an attack was made on Kejriwal. Upon investigation by us, it was found that the attackers were BJP workers, but police took no action," Atishi alleged. “We have written to the EC demanding that Kejriwal’s security be restored. We do not trust the Delhi Police as it is under Amit Shah’s control," she added. The AAP leaders alleged that resorting to “dirty politics" ahead of the Delhi polls, the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has conspired to get Kejriwal’s security removed. “We write to you with utmost urgency and grave concern regarding the security arrangements of Arvind Kejriwal, ex-chief minister of Delhi and the national convenor of the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), who has been consistently facing grave threats to his life and deliberate lapses in his security detail. “These lapses are not isolated incidents but appear to be part of a larger, orchestrated pattern designed to jeopardise his safety," the letter written by the AAP leaders to the EC read. It alleged that on different occasions over the last three months, multiple targeted attacks on Kejriwal, including incidents of physical assault and stone pelting during a political rally, were attempted, exacerbating their concerns. The letter complained that police “simply acted as mute spectators" and did not make an attempt to protect Kejriwal. The chief ministers called the Union home ministry’s reported order to withdraw the Punjab Police’s security cover for Kejriwal in Delhi a “politically-motivated" decision. The Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) reportedly asked to withdraw the Punjab Police’s security cover for Kejriwal in Delhi as he already enjoys Z-plus security here. “The Punjab Police, which has been a crucial and reliable component of his security detail, has been abruptly withdrawn without consultation or justification. This reckless and politically-motivated decision has left Kejriwal entirely dependent on the Delhi Police — a force directly controlled by the BJP through its government at the Centre," they said in the letter. Punjab Director General of Police (DGP) Gaurav Yadav on Thursday said the police personnel from his state deployed for Kejriwal’s security have been withdrawn. “Following directions from the Delhi Police and the EC, we withdrew the component of the Punjab Police in the security of Kejriwalji," Yadav said. The AAP leaders urged the EC to “conduct an immediate and thorough review of Arvind Kejriwal’s security arrangements and implement robust measures to ensure his safety" and “reinstate or augment the presence of the Punjab Police in his security detail to provide reliable and impartial protection". At the press conference, Mann argued that BJP leaders like Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath receive protection from other states when they require it. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “Those who receive Z-plus security are supposed to be provided protection. Yogi Adityanath, for example, gets security from his own state and also receives protection here while campaigning as he is Z-plus protectee. “West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee had also requested for help from the Punjab Police during elections. She had told me that she does not trust central forces. So we had provided security to her and charged money for it," Mann said. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) tags : delhi elections Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 24, ...

title: Congress Will Win Over 60 Seats, Form Government In Delhi: Shakur Basti Candidate Satish Luthra
summary: Delhi elections: Shakur Basti candidate Satish Luthra said during his engagement with people, he has come to realise that people are looking for change as they are fed up with the present government's lies and blame game
full_content: Congress Will Win Over 60 Seats, Form Government In Delhi: Shakur Basti Candidate Satish Luthra Reported By : Nivedita Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 24, 2025, 17:08 IST Delhi elections: Shakur Basti candidate Satish Luthra said during his engagement with people, he has come to realise that people are looking for change as they are fed up with the present government's lies and blame game reset Follow us on Google News Satish Luthra said  he aims to make Shakur Basti a model constituency in Delhi. (X) As Delhi gears up for the 2025 assembly polls on February 5, the Congress is confident that it will win over 60 seats and form a government. The grand old party had three consecutive governments in Delhi between 1998 and 2008 with a clear majority. However, after the 2015 elections, it was not able to win even a single seat in the 70-member assembly. News18 spoke to Satish Luthra, party’s candidate from the Shakur Basti assembly seat , who claimed the sweeping victory of the Congress in Delhi. He also said the Congress is ready to provide a stable and effective government. related stories “The Congress is expecting to get more than 60 seats in the Delhi elections. The Congress will form the government and will always do the positive and growing work for the people," he said, adding people remember and miss the Congress government under Sheila Dikshit. Luthra said nothing good has been done by the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) government. BOTH AAP, BJP DID NO DEVELOPMENT: LUTHRA Attacking outgoing AAP MLA Satyendar Jain, Luthra said despite being the health minister, Jain did not develop the health infrastructure in his own constituency. “He had been behind bars for months and years. No development on roads, water sanitation, health and education has been done. Jain was involved in corruption only," he said. When asked who his main contest is in the elections, Luthra said he is not considering any party – the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and AAP –  a challenge. He accused Jain of being involved in corruption, while BJP’s Karnail Singh is an outsider. He said the public doesn’t want corrupt representatives. “Jain was involved in corruption scandals, including money laundering and the liquor scam. On the other hand, Singh is an outsider who isn’t familiar with the local issues of Basti. There is no possibility for him to work on the ground level," he explained. Luthra went on to say that both AAP and BJP are responsible for the lack of development in Delhi. He cited a 2015 report “Jostling for Jhuggi Land," published in Down to Earth, explaining how thousands of the city’s most vulnerable were thrown into homelessness under BJP’s central leadership and AAP’s state governance. “The report documented the anguish of those displaced due to political indifference and endless blame games. Today, history is set to repeat itself as fresh demolition orders once again threaten the very existence of Delhi’s marginalised residents. Instead of protecting the poor, they left them abandoned, caught in a crossfire of excuses and posturing," Luthra said. On what feedback he is getting from the public, Luthra said during his engagement with people, he has come to realise that people are looking for change as they are fed up with the present government’s lies and blame games. IMPROVED ROADS, SEWAGE ON PRIORITY When asked what his vision for the seat is, Luthra said he aims to make Shakur Basti a model constituency in Delhi and plans to focus on providing clean water, a proper drainage and sewage system, improved road infrastructure and proper parking facilities and reducing pollution. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “I also aim to improve the constituency’s health infrastructure, ensuring that residents can proudly say they live in the best and cleanest constituency in Delhi. If elected from the seat, the three things which will be done on priority are road infrastructure with CCTV surveillance, sewage treatment and health infrastructure. These are the major issues for the people of the Shakur Basti constituency," he added. Along with the other 69 assemblies, Shakur Basti will vote on February 5 and the counting of votes will be done on February 8. tags : delhi election delhi elections news18 specials Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 24, 2025, 17:07 IST News elections Congress Will Win Over 60 Seats, Form Government In Delhi: Shakur Basti Candidate Satish Luthra Read More
